T04ksmadhlu:0: Ācāryakamalaśīlaviracito Madhyamakālokaḥ ajñānino ye 'tra vipannadṛṣṭyā bhāveṣu cāsaktimahāgrahāṇāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1: vaśena grastā hi praṇaṣṭaprajñā nāgārjunādīṃśca mahāmahimnaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2: kṣipanti tenātmavināśa eva teṣāṃ mahābhūtagrahopaśāntyai prārabhyate poṣakaro 'bhyupāyaḥ kāruṇyamāśritya mayādhūnātra //
T04ksmadhlu:3: bhāvābhiniveśa eva tāvat samastasaṅkleśajālamūlam, atastatparihṛtya niḥśreyasapadābhilāṣiṇāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāvyutpādanārthamidamārabhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4: paramārthagambhīrodadhinayamanavagāhya atra kecidāhuḥ - yuktyāgamābhyāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sidhyatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:5: [1] nāgamastāvacchaktaḥ, kenāpi tathābhyupagamābhāvād, vivakṣādhīnatvād vacanānāṃ tadvastusambandhābhāvācca na prāmāṇyam /
T04ksmadhlu:6: syādapi sambandhastathāpyarvāgdarśibhiravadhārayituṃ na śakyate prekṣakāstatpravacanamata - mabhyupagamyamānebhyo 'pi niḥsaṃśayaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpratipādakaṃ kimapi vacanamupadarśayituṃ na
T04ksmadhlu:8: [2] sūtreṣu keṣucit - 'niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, anutpannāḥ, ādiśāntāḥ prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ityādīni [vacanāni] āgacchanti, tānyapi neyārthānyeva veditavyāni, nānābhisandhidvāreṇa bhagavato deśanayā avatāraṇāt /
T04ksmadhlu:9: trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ parikalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannānāṃ kramaśaḥ lakṣaṇata utpattitaḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ sandhāya sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā
T04ksmadhlu:10: uktāḥ, tena niḥsvabhāvatvādanutpannā, tata ādiśāntāḥ, tena prakṛtiparinirvṛtāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:12: [3] dvaitābhāsivijñānamātreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmutpattyādayo vibhajyante, na tu svasaṃvedanamātreṇa
T04ksmadhlu:13: dvaitābhāso 'pi mithyā, tena sarvabhāvā api mṛṣā eva vyavasthāpyante /
T04ksmadhlu:14: parikalpitasya lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvadharmānutpādādayo deśitāḥ, na tu paramārthataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:17: na khalu sarve bhāvāḥ pratyakṣata evaṃ viviktāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:20: abhāvāya tāvad nīrūpatayā na kathamapi svarūpopadarśanena vijñānajanakatvaṃ yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:22: yat pratyakṣaṃ tadapi yadi sasvabhāvam, tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāpratijñāyā hāniprasaṅgaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:25: atha kaiścid arthāntarā viviktateti pakṣo gṛhyate, tadā itareṇa tāvat pratyakṣeṇa śūnyatā
T04ksmadhlu:27: sarvadharmaḥsvabhāvavādiṣu ye kecana [dharmāḥ] pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyante [te] sarve dharmā viviktāḥ pratīyeran /
T04ksmadhlu:28: sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaviviktatā tāvannāsti kimapi vastu, tasyā api sarvadharmāntargatatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:31: [5] ayaṃ tāvad [viṣayaḥ] sarvajñādīnāṃ yogināṃ pratyakṣeṇa sugamya ityucyamāne 'pi na khalu vidvadbhyastṛptimāsādayati, yuktyabhāvāttatra /
T04ksmadhlu:32: yadi tad yogijñānamapyasaditi ced? tadā kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam /
T04ksmadhlu:34: [6] nāpyanumānenāpi 'sarve bhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ' iti sādhayituṃ śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:36: svabhāvāśrayarahitaiḥ sarvahetubhiḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sādhayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:37: [7] paraiḥ siddhatvāt parābhyupagatahetvādibhiḥ svapakṣaḥ prasidhyediti cet tadāpi na yujyate,sādhanadūṣaṇayorubhayaprasiddhatvenābhimatatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:38: ithaṃ yadā parābhyupagatahetvādayo yadi na vāstavikāḥ, mohena
T04ksmadhlu:39: kalpitamātrasattākāḥ, tadā kathaṃ taiḥ svapakṣaḥ prasidhyet /
T04ksmadhlu:40: yadi te bhāvarupeṇa sanmātrāḥ, tadā na kevalaṃ te paraprasiddhamātrāḥ, tavāpi tatprasiddhatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:42: parābhyupagatasādhanādayo yadi sanmātrā evābhyupeyante tadā bhāvā api sasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ nābhyupeyante?
T04ksmadhlu:43: [8] sarvadharmaśūnyatā kutrāpi kenāpi hetunā na sambaddhā,
T04ksmadhlu:45: yadi [sambandhaḥ] siddhaḥ syāt tadā sarve tattvadarśinaḥ syuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:46: pūrvata eva siddhatvād yuktyanusaraṇamapi nirarthakaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:47: [9] api ca, na tāvat kāryasvabhāvaliṅgābhyāṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā
T04ksmadhlu:50: [kāryasvabhāvau] na sambhavataḥ tathā hi - sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena kasyāpi kenāpi saha kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānabhyupetatvāt kāryahetustāvanna sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:51: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvena kasyāpi ātmanaḥ svabhāvasyāsattvāt kutastāvat svabhāvahetuḥ
T04ksmadhlu:53: svabhāvānupalabdhiryā khalu asadvyavahāraṃ sādhayati, sā taditaraviviktasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratītau satyāmapi asacchāstraśravaṇavimūḍhamanasā kenacit taditaravivekavyavahāre 'pravṛttānāṃ tadvyavahāraprasādhanāya prayujyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:54: tava tu sādhyamānasarvadharmābhāvavyavahārasya pratyakṣataḥ jñānārthaṃ kiñcidapi nāstyeva, svapakṣahāniprasaṅgādityuktapūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:56: atyantaparokṣāt sarvadharmavivekāt sahānavasthānavirodhenāpi na kiñcidapi sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:57: yadi sidhyet tadā tadviruddhādayo bhāvatvenaiva sidhyeyurityanabhyupetā na syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:58: bhāvānāṃ virodho dvidhā vyavasthāpyate, tadyathā - sahānavasthānalakṣaṇaḥ parasparaparihāralakṣaṇaśca
T04ksmadhlu:59: ye tatrāvikalakāraṇāni tebhyo niyataṃ yasminna bhavati, tayoḥ prathamo virodho vyavasthāpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:60: / yad yasmin parihriyate yanna vicchidyate tayorubhayorabhāvayordvitīyo
T04ksmadhlu:61: virodho vyavasthāpyate, ekasmin dharmiṇi yugapat sadasattvavat /
T04ksmadhlu:62: tathāvidhau dvāvapi virodhau sarvadharmāniḥsvabhāvavādiṣu naiva sambhavataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:63: gaganāravindādiṣu na santi avikalakāraṇānyapi tathā nāsti atadvyāvṛttyā paricchedo 'pi bhāvaparyantavāt
T04ksmadhlu:64: sattāvyavacchena yadyapi paricchedo vyavasthāpyate tathāpi kutracit kācit, sattā vyavacchinnā sidhyet, kintu bhavantastāvat kutrāpi kasyāpi vyavacchedaṃ kathamapi
T04ksmadhlu:66: yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatāpratyāsannāstadā yuṣmāsu kimapyavikalakāraṇasattvaṃ na sidhyet
T04ksmadhlu:68: yadi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāvyavacchedana kecana bhāvāḥ paricchidyante, tadā ta evāsmāsu vastusantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ tadviruddhopalabdhyasambhavāt /
T04ksmadhlu:72: [13] vyāpakānupalabdhirapi vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau vyāpyaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatvaṃ tu tāvanna kasyāpi vyāpyaṃ sidhyatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:73: yadi sidhyatīti cet tad vyāpyameva hi vastutayā siddhaṃ syāt
T04ksmadhlu:74: [14] kāraṇānupalabdhirapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau kāryatvaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva siddho na bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:75: yadi siddhastadā yat kāraṇaṃ yaccāpi vā kāryaṃ tadeva vastu syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:76: [15] sarvadharmeṣu kasyāpyekasya niṣedhād eteṣāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapyekaṃ kāraṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:77: [16] kenāpi īścarādyekanimittābhyupagamaniṣedhe 'pi neme niḥsvabhāvatve sidhyanti, sarveṣāṃ svanimittotpannatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:78: eteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ nimittānyapi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyante, teṣāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:79: [17] api ca, nairātmyaṃ yadi sarvadharmagocaratāyāṃ sādhyate, tadā na dṛṣṭāntaḥ prasiddhayati
T04ksmadhlu:80: pratibimbādayo ye 'pi dṛṣṭāntāsteṣvapi kecit bāhyavastusvabhāvāḥ, anye tāvajjñānasvabhāvā abhyupagamyante, ataste vastusvabhāvā eva svīkṛtāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:81: [18] yadi prādeśikaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayitumiṣyeta, tatra yadi tairthikaparikalpitāḥ pradhānādayaḥ niṣidhyante, tadā siddhasādhanamātrameva /
T04ksmadhlu:82: [19] yadi lokaprasiddhā rupādayastadā dṛṣṭānta eva tāvannopalabhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:84: [20] yadyanumānasya pratibandhasādhanārthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇamabhayupagamyate, tadā siddha eva tāvad bhāvaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:88: yadi sa nirākriyate tadā pratyakṣasyaiva bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:89: yadi sa badhyate tadā nānumānasyāpi sausthityam /
T04ksmadhlu:90: pratyakṣasambandhādanuprāptānumānenāpi sa eva kathaṃ bādhayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:93: [21] api ca, sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sādhayitu yadi kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo hetuḥ pradarśyate, tadā viparītasādhyasādhako heturviroddho
T04ksmadhlu:95: [22] yadi abhāvasvabhāvastadā asadabhavayoḥ parasparasambandhāabhāvāt kathaṃ sādhayiṣyati?
T04ksmadhlu:97: yato hi tat sādhayituṃ nānyat kimapi pramāṇamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:98: [24] śabdamātrato 'pi na tat sidhyati, sarvataḥ sarvasiddhiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:99: śabdo 'pi viruddhaḥ, yato hi yadi niḥsvabhāvastadā kathaṃ sa siddhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:102: prasaṅgena tāvat parapakṣo bādhayituṃ śakyate, tathāpi svapakṣastu na sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:104: [26] svato notpadyate bhāvaḥ, yaścānutpannastasyāsattvena kutrāpi hetutvenānupapatteḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:106: / yadyaviśiṣṭastadā kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi na yujyate, viśiṣṭasyaiva hetutvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:108: api ca nityabhūtādapi tāvat parānnotpadyate, nityasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt
T04ksmadhlu:116: ahetuto 'pi notpadyate bhāvaḥ kādācitkatvāt, naivaṃ kathanaṃ yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:117: yanna svato nobhayato nāpi vinaṣṭāddhetornāpyahetuto nābhīṣṭānnityāddhetoḥ kāryotpattirbhavatīti tathāvādinastat [sarvaṃ] yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:119: virodhaḥ, kena hetunā tataḥ kāryotpattirniṣidhyate, nāsti tadbādhakaṃ kimapi pramāṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:120: parabhūtasya bhāvamātrasyāpyasiddhiriti na, yato hi yadanantaraṃ
T04ksmadhlu:122: kāryotpādāt prāk pareti nāmro 'siddhatve 'pi bhāvasya tu naiva hāniḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:125: sa tāvavirodhanayo 'pi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:126: yadyevamasti tadā kasmiṃścidaparasmin drāridrayamūḍhatvādidharmāṇāṃ dṛśyatvena paratvahetoḥ sarvajagaddāridrayādidharmopādānaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:135: yathā avyavahitavinaṣṭo bhāva uttarakṣaṇabhāvinā bhāvena saha yugapad vyavasthāpyo na bhavati, evameva kāryasyāpi tatsadṛśatvādaviruddhataiva,
T04ksmadhlu:137: yathā ca pūrvāparāvyavadhānena pravahamānajaladhārāyāṃ viṣayaikatvaṃ na bhavati, tathaiva asyāpi tatsadṛśatvāt samakālikatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
T04ksmadhlu:139: nāpyavidyamānasya, śaśaśṛṅgadīnāmapyutpattiprasaṅgād ityapi kathanaṃ naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:143: [30] sāṃkhyādiparikalpitasatkāryavādo yadyapyayuktastathāpyasatkāryotpāde kiṃ nāma viruddhatvam, kimarthaṃ ca tanniṣidhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:144: naiva ca syāt śaśaśṛṅgādyutpattiprasaṅgaḥ tattathāvidhahetūnāmabhāvādanutpatteḥ na tvabhāvāddhetoḥ
T04ksmadhlu:146: pratiniyatakāraṇasāmarthyamapyaśyamabhyupeyam, anyathā sāṃvṛtike 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve kathaṃ na sarvataḥ sarvotpattirbhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:147: [31] api ca, yadi vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭādayo vikalpāḥ pāramārthikīmutpattiṃ
T04ksmadhlu:148: bādhante, tadā kathaṃ na sāṃvṛtikīmapi bādhante? vastubalapravṛttasya hetorviṣasya puruṣecchāvaśena vibhāgo na yuktarūpaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:149: yadi patyakṣabādhitatvāśaṅkayā tasmin hetutvaṃ na pravartata ityucyeta tarhi sa hetureva nāsti, bādhayogyatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:151: cānekenāpyekotpattiryujyate, anyathā hetubhedena bhedo na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:154: 'bhinirvartayanti, tadā bhinnānāṃ hetūnāmabhedaḥ syāt, anekebhya ekaikasyotpatteḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:157: tadanantaraṃ yadi sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirna bhavettadā sarveṣāmandhabadhiratvādiprasaṅga ityapi kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:159: anabhyupagatatvāt, sāmagryā utpatteḥ, na hi kācidekena ekasyotpattiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:160: yenaikasmādanekotpattiḥ, anekasmād vā ekasyotpattiḥ [tataḥ sa] viruddho hetusvabhāvātikrānto janakatvenānabhyupagato bhavati, tathāpi vidyamānamātrādanekasvabhāvāt pradīpādeḥ anekasvabhāvaṃ kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:161: hetubhedo bhedako na bhaviṣyatīti na syāt, hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣasyotpatteḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:162: hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣotpāda iti yadeva kathanaṃ tadeva hetubhedasya bhedakatvapratipādakamiti
T04ksmadhlu:163: [33] yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa prakṛtyā śānta ityetadanaikāntikatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:164: pratītyasamutpannasya sasvabhāvatvena virodhābhāvāt, pratītyasamupādasya sasvabhāvatve prasiddhatvād
T04ksmadhlu:166: [34] yo hi paramārthato 'san sa saṃvṛtāvapi svabhāvato 'nutpanno dṛśyate,
T04ksmadhlu:172: ityevamabhidadhānā ye prasaṅgaṃ sādhayanti teṣāmapi tathā parairanaṅgīkārād heturasiddha eva, ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvasya na kenāpyabhyupagatatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:174: [36] anyacca, sādhyasādhane paryudāsātmake prasajyātmake vā? yadi paryudāsātmake tadā ekānekasvabhāvarahitātvasya bhāvasvabhāvatvenābhyupetatvāttadapyanabhyupagataṃ na bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:175: yadi prasajyātmake tadā nāsti gamyagamakabhāvaḥ, tayorniḥsvabhāvatvād anyo 'nyāsambaddhatvād abhinnatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:176: [37] yacca sarvābhilāpavirahalakṣaṇaṃ tanna kiñcid gamyaṃ gamakaṃ vā,
T04ksmadhlu:179: [38] yau hyanyo 'nyāsambaddhau tayornāsti gamyagamakabhāvaḥ, yathā vindhyahimālayau /
T04ksmadhlu:181: [39] yadyubhe abhāvasvabhāvatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇāpanne eveti manyase cet,
T04ksmadhlu:187: [41] atrāpi vyāvṛttyā bheda iti manyate cet? tadapyayuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:188: yadyevaṃ svād bhāva eva te syātām, nīlapītavat /
T04ksmadhlu:189: [42] api ca yathā kenāpi ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvahetunā bhāvānāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:190: niḥsvabhāvatā sādhyate, tathā dharmiṇo 'pyabhāvaḥ sādhyate tadā dharmivyāvṛttatvasiddheḥ
T04ksmadhlu:191: heturviruddhaḥ syāt, tathā niḥsvabhāvatvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:192: [43] api ca, yadi vijñānamapyanyadharmavat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvaṃ syāttadā tadanupādeyaṃ syād vitathatvādanyadharmavat /
T04ksmadhlu:193: yadyevaṃ syāttadā na syuryogino 'pi, naiva yogijñānamapi syānna ca taistattvapratibodhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:194: naiva teṣāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ syānna ca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:196: [44] saṃvṛtau yogijñānādīnāmabhyupagamād buddhā api viparyastā bhaveyuriti
T04ksmadhlu:198: [45] api cāsti bhavatāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvapratijñāyāṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ virodho 'pi /
T04ksmadhlu:202: [46] agnyādayo ye bhāvāḥ parokṣarvenābhyupagatāste 'pi abhrāntena niyatadhūmādihetunā anumānapramāṇena satsvabhāvātmakā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:205: ahetukasya tu kādācitkatvamapi na yujyate, nirapekṣatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:207: [47] yāni trāyastriṃśānāṃ nagarādīnyatyantaparokṣāṇi, tānyapi samastalokaikacakṣurbhūtena tāyinā svakīyenānāvṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā pratyakṣīkṛtya anyebhyo 'pi samprakāśitāni, ato viścastāgamena sattāyāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:209: [48] bhagavatā khalu ye āntarabahyavastūnāmanekavidhāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ samupadiṣṭāste 'pi svabhāvavirahitāḥ kathaṃ yujyante,
T04ksmadhlu:211: [49] kuśalākuśalamarmaṇāṃ phalabhūtā devanarakādigatayo bhavantīti svayambhuva upadeśāt kathaṃ na virodhaḥ, naiva yujyate atyantāsadbhūtakūrmaromādibhirvastranirmāṇopadeśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:213: [51] sūtrādiṣu āryāṇāṃ mārgābhyāsabalena yā uttarottaralokottarajñānaphalavyavasthā sāpi na
T04ksmadhlu:215: śaśaśṛṅgakṛtasopānamārge pādau nidhāya vandhyāputrasya aścaṅgasamucchritottuṅgaviśālaprāsādārohaṇaṃ na sambhavatītyato vyavadānapakṣāpavādo 'pi syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:217: [53] bījādiṣu janyajanakabhāvastāvad āgopāṅganāprasiddhaḥ, ataḥ pratijñāyāḥ prasiddhivirādho 'pi /
T04ksmadhlu:222: "cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti, no tu nīlam" ityādinā tāvannīlādayo bhāvāḥ kalpānāpoḍhalakṣaṇena pratyakṣapramāṇena jñāyanta iti pratipāditam,
T04ksmadhlu:223: naiva hi gaganotpalavartīni nīlādīni cakṣurvijñānenānubhūyanta iti /
T04ksmadhlu:224: [56] "yatkiñcit samudayadharmakam, tat sarvatra nirodhadharmakam" anena sādhyavyāptahetunānumānapramāṇenopadarśitāḥ kṣaṇasthitadharmiṇo bhāvāḥ prasiddhā iti spaṣṭamupadarśitam /
T04ksmadhlu:228: [57] "dhūmena jñāyate vahniḥ salilaṃ ca balākayā" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:229: agnyādayo bhāvāḥ kāryaliṅgena niyataṃ jñāyamānatvānniyataṃ svabhāvamavadhārayantīti suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:231: [58] abhidharmādau ye ṣaḍ hetavaścatvāraśca pratyayā abhihitāste 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:232: sarvadharmānutpādavāde tāvatkathaṃ yujyante, utpādyasya kasyacidabhāvena hetvādīnāmayuktatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:233: [59] sūtreṣu sarve dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyataneṣu saṅgṛhītāḥ samupadiṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:234: skandhādīnāṃ bhagavatā kāryakāraṇasvabhāvatvasamprakāśanāt kathaṃ te sarvedharmānutpādatāyāṃ saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:235: [60] yadi skandhadivyatiriktasya kasyacid dharmasya anutpādaḥ sādhyate
T04ksmadhlu:236: tadā nāsti [kaścit] vivādaḥ, vayamapi tadvyatiriktaṃ dharmaṃ nāṅgīkurmahe
T04ksmadhlu:237: [61] yadyevaṃ manyate yatsaṃvṛtau pramāṇādīnāmabhyupagamānnaiva eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dūṣaṇānāmavakāśo yujyata iti cet? tadā [saṃvṛtau] bhāvābhyugama evāṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt, yato hi yāni pramāṇādīni saṃvṛtāvabhyupetāni tāni
T04ksmadhlu:239: yadyevaṃ na syāttatadā lokavirodha āgamavirodhaśca kathaṃ parihataḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:242: yadi bhavantastānapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmamātramupacāramātraṃ vyavahāramātramiti pravyāharanti, tadā kāmaṃ tathābhilapantviti /
T04ksmadhlu:244: [62] api ca, kā nāma saṃvṛtirityapi vaktavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:245: yadi sarvamasaditi kathyate, tadapi na yuktam, parasparavirodhāt /
T04ksmadhlu:252: tadā nāsti vivādaḥ, bhavataḥ pratijñāyā eva hāniḥ bhavo 'pyutpadyata
T04ksmadhlu:253: eva, ataḥ saṃvṛtyā tadutpadyata iti kathamevamucyeta? tadā tvanutpanna utpadyata ityuktaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:254: saṃvṛtiviparītasyānutpādasya paramārthatvāt tadā paramārthato 'nutpāda eva syādityasambaddhabhidhānaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:257: [64] yadyanityārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha ityevaṃ cet? tadā kiṃ tāvadanityam? yadi
T04ksmadhlu:258: nityābhāvamātram? tadā kathaṃ talloke pratītaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:259: yadi nityaditaraṃ kimapyanityamiti nigadyeta? tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ]
T04ksmadhlu:260: tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ 'saṃvṛtisat' - iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:263: anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:264: [65] atha lokapratītyarthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha ityevaṃ cet? kastāvalloka iti?
T04ksmadhlu:265: śāstrakārā vā prākṛtā vā janāḥ prathame vikalpe bhāvo hyanekaparasparaviruddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt, śāstrakāraikasyāpi bhāvasya nānākāreṇādhyāropaṇāt /
T04ksmadhlu:266: dvitīye vikalpe nairātmyakarmaphalādīni nābhyupetāni syuḥ, prākṛtakairapratītatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:267: [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:268: yadi sarvamasaditi, tadā pūrvadoṣa eva samāpadyeta,
T04ksmadhlu:270: atha bhrāntijñānena māyeti cet tadā ābhyantarikajñeyanayena ko hi viśeṣaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:273: [68] atha śabdārtha iti cettadā kathabhedaḥ syāt, pratyātmādhigamyā ye sukhādayaste kutra saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ? na hi tāvat saṃvṛtau,
T04ksmadhlu:279: athaivaṃ manyate yadābhāsaparikalpyau vyāmiśrya sāmānyākārena gṛhyanta
T04ksmadhlu:280: iti? tadā paramārthe 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ syāt, tasyāpi vacanīyasvābhāvye vyavasthitatvena abhidheyatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:284: yadi pratītyotpannā rupādayaḥ, pratyāmādhigamyāḥ sukhādayaścāpi 'saṃvṛtisatyam' it nāmrā prajñapyante, tadā mudā tathā kuryuriti,
T04ksmadhlu:290: ato nāsti vivādaḥ tathā sāṃvṛtikānāṃ vastusāmānyalakṣaṇāmāṃ yā nairātmyarupā dharmatā sāsti paramārthataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:291: sāpi utpādād vā tathāganāmanutpadād vā sarvakālamavikāratayā nityābhyupeyate /
T04ksmadhlu:292: [70] atha asatyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti tadā kathaṃ sā satyamiti parasparaviruddhayoḥ satyāsatyayoraikātmyānupapatteḥ
T04ksmadhlu:293: kācana saṃvṛtirabhyupagantavyā, anyathā kathaṃ jagat tathā satyaṃ sidhyet,
T04ksmadhlu:295: [71] anyacca saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vā? yadi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ sā
T04ksmadhlu:296: saṃvṛtiḥ? athāpramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyeta?
T04ksmadhlu:298: santītyaṅgīkartavyāni, ṛte bījaṃ saṃvṛtyanutpatteḥ, yad bijaṃ tadeva
T04ksmadhlu:300: [73] api ca, yadi bhāvasvabhāvā abbhyupagamyante tadā teṣvāropito mithyāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtisatyam, anāropitastu bhāvasvabhāvaḥ paramārthasatyam /
T04ksmadhlu:303: yadi nābhyupagamyante, tadā saṃvṛtirapi vitathā syāt paramārtho 'pyaśakyavyavasthānaḥ syāt, vyavasthākārāṇānāmasattvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:304: [74] yadi yathākathañcana kañcidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāttadā kimarthaṃ sa
T04ksmadhlu:305: sādhayate? sa naiva paramārthaḥ kathaṃ sa jñānenāvadhārayituṃ śakyate, na ca paramārthaśabdenāpyabhidhātumarhaḥ evaṃ tāvannāyaṃ paramārthaḥ, na cārtho 'pi paramaḥ, nāpi paramasya jñānasyāyamarthaḥ, sādhāraṇatvāt yadi yathākathañcana kiścidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāt tadā paramārthato
T04ksmadhlu:307: [75] api ca, yadi saṃvṛtiparamārthāvabhinnāviti manyate, tadā satyadvayavyavasthānāṃ kathaṃ syāt, dvayorekatarasya parityāgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:314: 'nyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvena ekasya pratiṣedhe 'parasya vidhānaṃ na bhavettadā asattvameva
T04ksmadhlu:315: sa tadā pratiṣeddhumapi kathaṃ śaktaḥ ekasmin yugapatparyudāsaprasajyayorvirodhāt /
T04ksmadhlu:317: syātām, tadabhāve ca buddhatvamapi duṣprāpaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:318: pūjānugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate tad dānaṃ tvatyantaṃ prasādamabhinirvartayati, tacca nāsti deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalambhāśritatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:319: sa cānupalambhaḥ kiṃ deyābhāvād vā viṣayābhāvād vā bhavati? prathame tāvat pakṣe na ko 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:320: kimapi dadātīti puṇyasyaivābhāvaḥ prasajyate, sattvābhāvācca yo hi
T04ksmadhlu:321: bodhisattvānāṃ sattvārthapariśramaḥ sa nirarthaka eva syāt, ato 'sattvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:324: yadyevaṃ na syāuttadā bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ kathamarthibhyaḥ putrādidānaṃ kṛtam? bhavantastvālambanāśritaṃ dānādikaṃ 'viśuddham' iti nābhyupagacchanti, ataḥ sambhārapāripūristāvadasambhavaiva tadabhāve hetvabhāvād buddhātvamapi dūre 'pāstaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:325: [77] api ca, 'sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ' ityettasya tāvat ko hyarthaḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:326: yadi svayambhāvasya abhāvānniḥsvabhāvā ityabhidhīyante tadā siddhasādhanameva, hetupratyayādhīnavṛttitvāt sarvavastūnām, na tānyahetukānīti vayamapyabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:327: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā nirapekṣatvānnityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:328: yadyucyeta - vinaṣṭā bhāvāḥ svasvabhāvenānutpannatvāt svasvabhāvena na santīti niḥsvabhāvāḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:330: yadi cābhidhīyeta - tatsvabhāvenaiva sarvakālānavasthānānniḥsvabhāvā manyante, tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
T04ksmadhlu:332: kṣaṇikasya khalu vastuno dvitīye kṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ nābhyupeyate /
T04ksmadhlu:333: yadyucyeta yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya paramārthena svabhavato 'sattvād sasattvaṃ tathā niḥsvabhāvatvamiti tadapi
T04ksmadhlu:335: / yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:336: paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitena grāhyagrahakāreṇa virāhitā api āryajñānasya advaitātmanā gocaratvena sthitā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:337: yadyevaṃ na sthitāḥ, tathāpyasattvena niḥsvabhāvāstadā saṅkleśavyavadānau na syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:339: kiṃ tadanutpadatāyāstāvadarthaṃ manyase? yadyucyeta ādito 'nutpannatvāt sarve bhāvā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva, vayamapi saṃsāramanādiṃ manyāmahe /
T04ksmadhlu:340: atha pūrvamutpannasya vastunaḥ punaranupattyā sarve dharmā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva, vayamapi pūrvamatpannasya punarutpattiṃ nābhyupagacchāmaḥ, tasya vinaṣṭatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:343: 'pūrvasattvānabhyupagamāt, sarvadā ca pūrvavinaṣṭānāṃ sajātīyotpatteḥ atha bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitasya svalakṣaṇato 'nutpādādanutpāda ucyate, tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ, kalpitasya svabhāvata utpettaranabhyupagamāt atha svato 'nutpādād anutpāda ityucyeta tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:345: yadi sarvaśaḥ sarvānutpādād anutpāda ucyate tadā darśanādivirodho durnivāraḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:347: tathatāsvabhavatāmupādāyocyate tadā nāsti doṣaḥ,[kintu] yadi lokaprasiddhasvabhāvatāmupādāyocyate tadā kena darśanādivirodho nivārayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:349: tadāpi nāsti doṣaḥ, sarvabhāveṣu kriyāyā abhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:355: anyairanekasūtraiścāpi virodhaḥ saṃllakṣyate, tathā hi āryasandhinirmocanasūtre hyuktaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:359: "kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ dharmamayoniśaḥ śabdaśaḥ pravicayya mahāyānaprasadāyatano na bhavati
T04ksmadhlu:360: śabdaśo 'nabhipretya yoniśo manasi kṛtvā mahāyānaprasādāyatano bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:365: "kulaputraṃ, kā hi tāvannimittadṛṭiḥ? sāṃyogikasya svabhāvamabhisandhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yadasattvaṃ samprakāśitaṃ tacchabdaśo 'bhiniviśya [ye]
T04ksmadhlu:370: saiva tasya mahatī dṛṣṭiriti, ata eva sā adṛṣṭidarśanadṛṣṭirityucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:372: tato vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭisaṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭitattvāpavādadṛṣtayastāvajjāyante yadā nimittadṛṣṭyā sarvāpavādaḥ [yadā] kriyate tadā vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭerapyabhiniveśo jāyate,
T04ksmadhlu:380: ataḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ paratantrasvabhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ san, tatra parikalpitasvabhāvo 'nutpādinābhihitaṃ ityeva tāvannirdekṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:381: punastatroktamḥ na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
T04ksmadhlu:382: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:383: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ skandhānāṃ sattaiva tāvannirdiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:385: "asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate" anena tāvad vacanena
T04ksmadhlu:387: evaṃ yadi paramārthataḥ karmāpyasti vipāko 'pyasti tadā sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā bhavituṃ nārhanti /
T04ksmadhlu:388: yadi saṃvṛtau santīti cet tadā karturapi saṃvṛtau sadbhāvāt "kārakastu nopalabhyate"
T04ksmadhlu:390: āryalaṅkāvatārasūtre coktamḥ astitvaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ yathā bālaivirkalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:391: yadi te bhaved yathā dṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:393: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:394: anena yadi sarvadharmāṇāmasattvaṃ tadā saṃkleśavyadānayorapavādadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti nirdiṣṭam
T04ksmadhlu:395: punastatraivoktamḥ bāhyarthadarśanaṃ mithyā nāstyarthaṃ cittameva tu /
T04ksmadhlu:397: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:400: tathaiva āryasandhinirmocanalaṅkāvatāraghanavyūhādiṣvapi sarvadharmāṇāṃ cittamātraśarīratvaṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ 'cittamātrameva paramārthasat, netarathā'
T04ksmadhlu:402: ataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena na sidhyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:408: anena tāvad vijñānameva paramārthasattvānidarśanatvādiguṇopetaṃ śāścatocchedāntadvayavinirmuktamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:410: "kulaputra, yadi [vijñānaṃ] paramārthato nāsti, tadā brahmacaryādīni nirarthakāni syuḥ" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:412: "ye paramārthasato 'pi vijñānasyāpavādaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāmabhiniviśya śūnyatādṛṣṭikāste 'cikitsyāḥ" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:417: "paratantralakṣaṇaṃ maitreya, pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ ca saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca /
T04ksmadhlu:418: sarvathātyantaviyuktaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ yattanna tenopalabhyata idaṃ śūnyatālakṣanamuktaṃ bhavati" /
T04ksmadhlu:419: āryāṇāṃ pratyātmavedyamavaśyameva paramārthato vastusat, anyathā āryasandhinirmocanoktāni vacanāni tāvādasadarthakānītī naiva /
T04ksmadhlu:420: yadyucyeta kiṃ khalu vastu? yadāryajñānena āryadarśanena vānirvacanīyatvena
T04ksmadhlu:422: anirvacanīyadharmatāvabodhena saṃskārāsaṃskārābhyāṃ prajñaptamiti yaduktaṃ tena virodhaḥ syāditi
T04ksmadhlu:423: ekameva yānaṃ paramārthato mahāyānalakṣaṇaṃ, nāvaśiṣṭamiti yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tadapi yuktyāgamābhyāṃ viruddham, vipratipattināṃ sandarśanāt /
T04ksmadhlu:425: tathā hi kecana parahitāśayā eva pravartante /
T04ksmadhlu:428: tathaivānye svasukhasampattisādhanatatparā anyavyāghātaṃ kṛtvā tadduḥkhavinivṛttito virajyate
T04ksmadhlu:430: tathaivetare tāvad bhavāntarakhecchato viramya svamuktyarthaṃ prayatante /
T04ksmadhlu:431: aye tu kevalaṃ paravimuktimevānucintayanti saṃbodhinidānāṃ ca dānādipāramitāpravṛttimālambante
T04ksmadhlu:434: svābhilāṣadvāreṇaiva pravṛttidarśanād śraddhaiva hi pravṛttiheturiti niścitam /
T04ksmadhlu:435: sattvānāmayaṃ śraddhāviśeṣo 'pi gotraviśeṣeṇāvinābhūtaḥ, ato nānāgotratvāt sattvānāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:438: bhagavātā yatkhalu dhātujñānabalānāṃ nānātvamabhihitam, tadapi nānādhātutvaṃ kimiva asat syāt āryakaṅkavatārasūtre 'pi pañca abhisamayotrāṇyabhihitāni /
T04ksmadhlu:441: evamevānekeṣu sūtreṣvapi śrāvakādiyānatrayanirdeśād āgamato 'pi tāvannānā yānāni sidhyantīti
T04ksmadhlu:442: āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādiṣu yaddhi ekaṃ hi yānamiti vyapadiṣṭam,
T04ksmadhlu:444: dharmadhātulakṣaṇatayā yānānāṃ bhedābhāvād ekameva yānamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:445: / athavā yānīkṛtaṃ yānamiti yānikurvatāṃ śrāvakādipudgalānāṃ nairātmye
T04ksmadhlu:448: athavā aniyatagotrakāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ mahāyānenaiva niryāṇād ekameva yānaṃ deśitam /
T04ksmadhlu:452: athavā bhagavatā svayamanekadhā śrāvakayānādibhirniryāṇadvāraiḥ parinirvāṇasandarśanād ekameva yānam /
T04ksmadhlu:453: athavā nāsti mahāyānād viśiṣṭataraṃ yānāntaramiti tadadhikārād ekameva yānamiti, tadevaṃvidhābhiprāyeṇa ekameva yānamiti deśitam /
T04ksmadhlu:454: athavā aniyatānāṃ śrāvakagotrīyāṇāmākarṣaṇārthaṃ bodhisattvagotrīyāṇāṃ ca sandhāraṇārthamityabhiprāyo bhagavataiva āryadaśadharmakasandhinirmocanalaṅkāvatārādiṣu sūtreṣu spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:455: anyacca, naikabhavaparamparāyāṃ sambhārān paripūrya bodhisattvā buddhatvapadamadhigamiṣyanti
T04ksmadhlu:456: śrāvakā aśeṣabhavasaṃyojanaṃ prajahantīti teṣāṃ naikajanmasādhyaṃ buddhātvadhigantuṃ ko 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:457: sambhavati, tathā hi - mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ yaduktaṃ so
T04ksmadhlu:459: āryairātmadṛṣṭiviparītayā nairātmyamārgabhāvanayā sarvānuśayāḥ samūlamucchināḥ, tatsamucchedena teṣāṃ janmano 'pyādhārarasyābhāvāt tad [janma] api samucchidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:461: āryāsaddharmapuṇḍarīke bhagavatā yacchrāvakebhyo buddhātvādhigatervyākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu nirmitaśrāvakāṇāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:462: yairbodhau pariṇāmanā kṛtā, teṣāṃ vābhiprāyeṇa kṛtamiti draṣṭavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:464: āryasamādhirājasūtre yattāvaduktamḥ atra nāsti ko 'pi sattvo 'bhavyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:470: ataḥ paramārthatastrīṇyeva yānāni, sarve dharmāśca sasvabhāvā ityabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:473: tatra tāvad 'nāgamataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ, kenāpi tathābhyupagamābhāvād'
T04ksmadhlu:475: kiṃ kenāpyanabhyupetatvādāgama ekāntenānupādeya eva bhavatyuta utadeyo 'pīti? prathamastāvat pakṣo na yuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:476: tathā sati na ko 'pi kamapyāgamamāśrayiṣyati, kenacidapi tadanabhtupetatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:477: tatra kaścid abhimānitayā vā, anarthitayā vā, pāpamitrasaṃsargeṇa vā,
T04ksmadhlu:478: vimūḍhacittatayā vā, sukalyāmitrānupalambhena vā, parapratyaneyatayā vā,
T04ksmadhlu:479: śraddhendriyādivaikalyena vā? tadvidāṃ sudhiyāṃ viraheṇa bhagavata ādimadhyaparyavasānakalyāṇaṃ pravacanaratnamanāśritā api kiṃ tāvadadhigatasvaparahitasampādanonopāyaṃ tarkanipuṇaṃ vidvāṃsamapi
T04ksmadhlu:481: athavā, ajñā vaṇijo yathā vimugdhatayānarghaṃ ratnamapi parityajanti tathā suvijñāstarkanipuṇā api vaṇijastanna parigṛhṇantīti na /
T04ksmadhlu:482: tāpāccedācca nikaṣāt suvarṇamiva pratyakṣānumānapūrvaparāviruddhāgamairaviruddhātvāt pareṣāñcāgamānāṃ tadviparītatvād ābhyudayikanaiḥśreyasikanaiḥśreyasikaphalamāptukāmā aśeṣasampadamadhigantukāmā vipaścitastaṃ [viparītāgamaṃ] parityajya yadekāntakuśalaṃ tatpravacanaratnamevāśrayantīti yaḥ pakṣaḥ, sa cet samyagiti tadā bhavanto 'pi yadi bhagavatpravacanaṃ suparīkṣyaivābhyupayantītyato bhagavatā prajñāpārāmitādiṣu yo hi madhyamo
T04ksmadhlu:484: yadi svayaṃ tamāśrayituṃ na śaktāstathāpyāryanāgātjunapādairyo hyanekayuktipradīpaprakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭastadbalenāpi kimiva
T04ksmadhlu:485: nābhyupagacchanti? yato hi sa ācāryastāvad bhagadvacananirdiṣṭatvena prathamāṃ bhūmimāsāditatvena cāryalaṅkāvatārādau vyākṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:486: tasyāpi yadi nirdeśo viparyastaḥ syāttadā naiva tāvad bhagavatā tathā vyākṛtaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:487: ato yadayācāryavacānaṃ tyajyate bhagavadvacanamapi nūnaṃ parityaktaṃ bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:488: phalata āryanāgārjunapādapratipadītaṃ mārgaṃ parityajya anāryapudgalapradarśitapathāśrayaṇaṃ tāvānnaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:489: na vayaṃ śabdānāṃ bhāvikaḥ kaścana sambandha iti manyāmahe /
T04ksmadhlu:492: saṅketābhijñānena vyavahāre vakturicchāṃ dyotayante arthāvasthādibhirabhrāntapuruṣairabhihitāḥ śabdāḥ vivakṣitārthāsambaddhā iti na sarvathā niścetuṃ śakyate, anyathā sarvavyavahāroccheda eva syāditi
T04ksmadhlu:493: kṣīṇarāgadveṣamohānāṃ śabdā aviparītārthā iti pratipādanena sarveṣāṃ śabdā viparītārthā evati na, svasantatau viniyatatvātteṣām /
T04ksmadhlu:494: atastrirupapaliṅgāni parikṣaṇapariśuddhāni ādimadhyāntakalyāṇaniyatāni tāvad vacanāni avisaṃvādakatvād vidvadbhiḥ samāśrayaṇīyānyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:496: bhagavadvacanaprāmāṇyaṃ pratipādayāmāstathāpi yadā āgamārthaṃ vinintayāmastadā vyākaraṇapramāṇatvena sampradarśayāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:500: yadyucyeta ko 'yaṃ paramārtho nāmeti cet? pramāṇopapatraḥ paramārthādhikṛtaśceti /
T04ksmadhlu:501: athavā yadartho nānyatra netuṃ śakyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:502: sarvadharmānutpādāstāvat pramāṇopannārthaḥ,ato yuktyanvitatvāt sa paramārtha ityucyate
T04ksmadhlu:507: katipayeṣu" avameva punastatraivoktam - "tadyathāpi nāma devaputra, yacca
T04ksmadhlu:519: evamayamanutpādo 'pi paramārthānukulatvāt paramārtha ucyate, na vastutaḥ, sarvaprapañcitītatvāddhi vastutaḥ paramārthasya /
T04ksmadhlu:520: ato yāni ca yāvanti ca paramārthamadhikṛtya anutpādīni lakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni tāni sarvāṇi nītārthatvena grahītavyāni, ato viparītāni neyārthāniti /
T04ksmadhlu:523: yāvad ye sūtrāntā saṃvṛtipratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante neyārthāḥ yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ paramārthapratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:524: yāvad ye sūtrāntā nānāpadavyañcanāni nirdiśanti, ta ucyante neyārthāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:525: yāvad ye sutrāntā gambhīradurdarśadurjñeyāni nirdiśanti, ta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:526: yāvad ye sūtrāntā ātmasattvajīvapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakāravedakān anekarutairasvāmikān svāmina iva nirdiśanti, ta ucyante neyārthāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:527: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥsattvanirjīvaniḥpudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāsta ucyate nītārthāḥ - iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:528: sutrāntareṣu 'tāvadanutpādādinirdeśā abhiprāyāntareṇa nītārtha ityabhihitāḥ' - iti yaduktam, tadapi na samyak /
T04ksmadhlu:529: ekaṃ hi sthitau ātmādinirdeśā api nītārthāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:535: yadyevaṃ tadā kathaṃ bhagavatā āryasandhinirmocanasūtre trividhasya svabhāvasya trividhāṃ niḥsvabhagavatāmabhipretya sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ, proktā iti ced?
T04ksmadhlu:537: ye tāvat kecit saṃvṛtisvabhāvamapyapavadanti, atha cāsacchastraśravaṇābhiniśavaśād viparyastamatayaḥ saṃvṛtau asantamanṛtamapi nityādivasturupatayā samāropya yathā rūpapratibhāsaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:538: tathaiva parigṛhṇanti, te āropāpavādāntadvayapatitatamatitayā antadvayarahite paramagambhīre paramārthanayasāgare nānupraviśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:539: ataeva tāvad bhagavān 'anutpādādinirdeśaḥ paramārthādhikṛtaḥ' iti nirucya trividhaniḥsvabhāvatābhiprāyapratipādakamantadvayarahitaṃ0 madhyamapathaṃ madhaymapathaṃ prakāśayituṃ nītārthameva mataṃ pratiṣṭhāpitavān /
T04ksmadhlu:540: na ca mādhyamikāstrividhaniḥsvabhāvatāvyavasthānaṃ nābhyugacchantīti, anyathā darśanādiviparītaṃ kathaṃ parihareyuriti /
T04ksmadhlu:541: tatravicāritaṃ tāvad vastu yathāpratibhāsaṃ māyāvat pratītyasamutpannam,
T04ksmadhlu:546: 'yaḥ prattyasamutpannaḥ sa svabhāvataḥ śūnya iti vidvāṃso
T04ksmadhlu:549: abhūtvā bhāvaḥ bhūtvā cābhāvo 'pi tāvannasti, krameṇāpyekasya sadasattvāmyāṃ viruddhatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:553: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham //
T04ksmadhlu:554: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
T04ksmadhlu:557: yaḥpratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04ksmadhlu:558: yaḥpratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥśūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:561: yacca śūnyaṃ svabhāvena na hi taccasti kutracit //
T04ksmadhlu:563: dharmadhātupravṛttirnidiṣṭā, yaduta - "tatra bhagavan, avidyā tu avidyātvenaivāsatī /
T04ksmadhlu:565: yasmin dharme nāsti svabhāvaḥ sa na tāvad vastu /
T04ksmadhlu:566: yacca nāsti vastu tadapariniṣpannam, yadapariniṣpannaṃ tadanutpannamaniruddhaṃ ca /
T04ksmadhlu:567: yadanutpannamaniruddhaṃ tad 'atītam' iti prajñaptuṃ naiva śakyate, na ca tadanāgataṃ pratyatpannamityapi vā prajñaptuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:568: yacca kālatraye 'pyanupapannaṃ tannāma lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ prajñaptamiti vā na bhavati, yato hi tat sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ nāmamātrasaṃketamātravyavahāramātrasaṃvṛtimātrābhidheyamātraprajñaptimātrebhyo
T04ksmadhlu:571: yaśca dharmaḥ paramārthato 'nupalabdhaḥ, na tat prajñaptaḥ, na vyavahāryaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:573: ato hi bhagavan yacca nāmamātraṃ saṃketamātraṃ na
T04ksmadhlu:575: ata eva paratantrasvabhāvo na tathyatve yujyate, anyathā māyādīnāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ, tānyapi pratyayasāpekṣatāyāṃ na santi bhinnāni /
T04ksmadhlu:578: māyādito 'bhinno yo hi paratantrasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nityānityādibhiḥ paramārthata upacaritaḥ sa eva ca parikalpitasvabhāvaḥ so 'pi yathā parikalpyate tathā
T04ksmadhlu:580: sāpi niḥsvabhāvatā vastutaḥ paratantrasvabhāve eva sthitā /
T04ksmadhlu:583: ata eva yathā anityādibhiḥ parikalpitāḥ sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato lakṣaṇaśūnyatvena anutpannāḥ, ata eva cāniruddhāḥ, ata eva ādiśāntāḥ, ata eva hi prakṛtiparinirvṛtāḥ āryasandhinirmocane 'pi yathoktam -
T04ksmadhlu:584: ye tāvat svalakṣaṇenāsantaste 'nutpannāḥ, ye hyanutpannāste 'niruddhāḥ, ye cāniruddhāsta ādiśāntā, ādiśāntā, ye hyādiśāntāste prakṛtiparinirvṛtā iti
T04ksmadhlu:585: ata evāhaṃ lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhavātābhisandhāya 'sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ' iti
T04ksmadhlu:587: paratantrasvabhāvaśca yathā saṃvṛtau hyuktastathā parikalpitātmanā virahitatvena prasidhya saṃvṛtisvabhāvasyānapavādamapi nirdiśati, na tu paramārthatvena /
T04ksmadhlu:589: yathoktamḥ alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
T04ksmadhlu:590: sarve dharmāḥ paramārthataḥ sadā bhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyāmeva pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:591: ayameva tāvat pariniṣpatraḥ svabhāvaḥ, nityaṃ tasyānāropitatvena sthitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:592: sa hi pramāṇaiḥ samyugupapatrannasvabhāvatayā paramārtha ityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:601: paramārthābhiprāyanirdeśāt sa na tāvad darśanādiviruddhaḥ, na ca yathāśabdaṃ parikalpitaśca
T04ksmadhlu:604: phalataḥ anutpādideśanāṃ nītārthāṃ sādhayituṃ darśanādivirodhaṃ parihartuṃ yathāśabdaparikalpanaṃ ca nirākartum āryasandhinirmocane tāvadabhihitam -
T04ksmadhlu:605: api ca, paramārthasamudgat, paramārthaniḥsvabhāvaṃ dharmanairātmaprabhāvitamityabhipretya mayā sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ sarve dharmā aniruddhāḥ, ādiśāntāḥ, prakṛtiparinivṛttāśva deśitāḥ yadyevaṃ mahāśraddadhāsūtre "prayogajaṃ svabhāvamabhipretya yanmayā 'sarve
T04ksmadhlu:606: dharmā asantaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tatra yathāśabdamabhiniviśca saṃkleśavyavadānadharmāṇāmapyabhāvamātramabhiniviśca
T04ksmadhlu:609: ayamapi yathoktaḥ paratantrasvabhāva eva, yo hi saṃvṛtau
T04ksmadhlu:614: etadarśaṃ yo hi parikalpitasvabhāva uktaḥ so 'pyāgantuka eva kalpanābhinirhatatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:617: ataḥ sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvenānena paramārthato niḥ svabhāvāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:619: yadi sa tāvadasat svāttadā saṃkleśavyadānadharmā naiva vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyeran, yato hi tatprabhāvitā hi te, na tu paramārthena
T04ksmadhlu:622: ato ye paramārthābhiprāyaṃ naiva jānanti, te pūrvasvabhāvamapi vasturupeṇa
T04ksmadhlu:623: parigṛhya paścāttasyāpyabhāvaṃ matvā anutpannādideśanānāṃ śabdaśo 'rthābhiniveśaṃ kurvanti
T04ksmadhlu:633: yeṣu bhāvābhāvādayo nimittagrāhā bhavanti, teṣu naiva sambhavati
T04ksmadhlu:635: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
T04ksmadhlu:636: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
T04ksmadhlu:637: yo 'yaṃ bhāvābhāvābhiniveśaḥ, sa tāvad bhāvābhiniveśapūrvaka iti sūtreṣu pratipāditam /
T04ksmadhlu:640: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
T04ksmadhlu:641: ato ye khalu bhāvābhiniveśaparaśāste tāvat paratantraṃ sanimittaṃ paśyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:642: ye tu vyapagatabhāvagrāhāste tathā na kurvanti, kutrāpyanavasthitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:645: tatra nityādayo doṣāḥ sambhavanti na vā katham //
T04ksmadhlu:649: ato ye 'nutpādādideśanāsu śabdaśo 'bhiniviśante, tān pratiṣeddhuṃ nimittādidṛṣṭayo vigarhaṇīyāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:656: ye puṇyāni na kurvanti narāste kutsitā hatāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:664: yaddhi proktaṃ tatkathamiti cintāyāmatrāpi yathā kathitasya parikalpitasvabhāvasya samāropo bhavati, tasya parihārārthaṃ "nāsti
T04ksmadhlu:667: ucyamānamidaṃ dvayaṃ ye antadvayarupeṇa parikalpiyanti, te naiva madhyamamārge pravṛttā
T04ksmadhlu:676: tathā hiyathā vikalpyate tathā paramārthataḥ paratantrasyānutpannatvāt parikalpitātmanā anutpanna eva /
T04ksmadhlu:678: saṃvṛtyā paratantratayā samutpannatvāt tadāśritā anye vikalpā nirmāṇanirmitasadṛśā samutpadyante
T04ksmadhlu:683: atastatra tatra yā paratantrasvabhāvāstitatvadeśanā yāśca bhāvotpatyādideśanāstāḥ sarvāḥ deśanāḥ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ bhayahetuparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyotpādāśayena abhiprāyataḥ pravṛttā ityavagamāya, na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:686: buddhayā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
T04ksmadhlu:687: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhayā prakalpyate //
T04ksmadhlu:688: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:691: kulaputra, loko 'yaṃ jātinirādhayoradhyavasāyena tiṣṭhati, ato mahākaruṇāmayena tathāgatena lokabhayaviṣayaparivarjanārthaṃ vyavahāravaśena tasya utpattinirodhau bhavata ityupadiṣṭam kulaputra,
T04ksmadhlu:694: "āyuṣman śāradvatīputra, evaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvena śūnyam, yacca svabhāvena śūnyaṃ tannotpadyate, na ca niradhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:696: evaṃ yāvad vedanāto vijñānaparyantam" - iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:697: nātra parikalpitasya svabhāvo yuktataraḥ, āgantukatvād bhāvabahirbhūtatvācca tasya, evaṃ śabdārtho 'pi nopapadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:698: yadyapi rupādayaḥ paramārthato 'nutpannastathāpi bālapṛthagjanaiste utpādādisvabhāve parikalpyante
T04ksmadhlu:699: ityevaṃ tairyadi tatsvabhāve parikalpitatvāt svabhāvaśabdenocyante, tadā na doṣaḥ, iṣṭārthāviruddhatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:701: "kulaputra , yo bodhisattvaḥ dharmān ayoniśo manasikṛtya śabdaśaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:703: yaśca aśabdaśo 'bhisandhyarthaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti, sa mahāyānaśraddhāyatano bhavati"
T04ksmadhlu:704: yaduktaṃ tattu ye paramārthābhiprāyānabhijñāḥ saṃvṛtisvabhāvamapyapavadante te 'yoniśo dharmān pravicinvantītihetormahāyānaśraddhāyatanā na
T04ksmadhlu:707: abhipretārthāvabodhāya ca samyag yatnotpādārthaṃ sarveṣu cādhimaktyupādārthamevābhihitam, na tu mādhyamikamataniṣedhārtham, na hi mādhyamikāḥ śabdaśo 'rthaṃ parikalpayantīti pūrvamevoktatvāt āryaratnameghasūtre 'pyuktam, yathā -
T04ksmadhlu:709: bodhisattvaḥ samyak prajñayā rūpapratyavekṣaṇaṃ yāvd vijñānapratyavekṣaṇaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T04ksmadhlu:710: yadā sa rūpaṃ pratyavekṣate, tadā na rupotpādamupalabhate,
T04ksmadhlu:711: na samudayamupalabhate, na ca nirodhamupalabhate yāvad vijñānaparyantaṃ yathāvadutpādaṃ nopalabhate, yato hi so 'pi tāvad [anupalambhaḥ]
T04ksmadhlu:712: paramārthato 'nutpādapravṛttayā prajayā bhavati, na tu sāṃvyāvahārikasvabhāvena" ityevaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:714: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyāṃ paramārthe na vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:718: ityetasmin mate sthāpayanti, te sarve āryaratnameghādinirdiṣṭaiḥ
T04ksmadhlu:720: teṣu [sūtreṣu] tu rupādayaḥ sarve [dharmāḥ] paramārthato 'nutpannāḥ, saṃvṛtitaścotpannā iti nirdiṣṭāḥ satyadvayanirdeśādiṣu tāvad - devaputra, sarve dharmāḥ śāntāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:724: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:729: ityādikā yā deśānā, tayāpi virudhyante, vastutaḥ ātmano 'tisūkṣmasvabhāvasyāpi niṣiddhatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:730: yadi viparyayasyāpratiṣedhād asti viparyayaṃ vastu, tatraiva tathā proktatvāditi cet? tathā hiḥ
T04ksmadhlu:734: viparyastaṃ vastu yadi vidyeta, tadā atisūkṣmabhāvasvabhāvaniṣedhavacanaṃ kathaṃ nāmopapadyeta
T04ksmadhlu:735: asatīṣvapi samastabhāvavāsanāsu bālapṛthagjanāḥ asadviparyayopakalpitānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvānāmabhiniveśena kamāṇyabhisaṃskurvantīti yadaivaṃ sūtrārtho vivecyeta tadā evaṃvidhena tāvad vivecanena [bhavadabhyupagataṃ]
T04ksmadhlu:738: svabhāvaśūnyāḥ sada sarvadharmāḥ vastuṃ vibhāventi jinānaputrāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:739: sarveṇa sarvaṃ bhavasarvaśūnyaṃ prādeśikī śūnyatā tīrthikānām //
T04ksmadhlu:746: ityevaṃ bhavadbhiścittacaittātmakasya traidhātukasya yadasamyaktvaṃ parikalpyate tadapi asamyagākāropagrahaṇāvabhāsatvena viparyayāditayā procyate /
T04ksmadhlu:747: mithyāsvabhāvenopagrahaṇād yastasyātmatvenāvabhāsaḥ sa kathaṃ samyag bhāva iti bhavet, tattvānyatvayoḥ parasparahārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:749: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā sāṃkhyādiparikalpiteṣu pradhānādivikāreṣu bhavatāṃ ko dveṣaḥ svād, bhavadbhisteṣāmanabhyupagamāt
T04ksmadhlu:750: ata evaḥ kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:753: "devaputra, yathā ātmā, nānti paramārthata ātmā, tathaiva devaputra, kleśā
T04ksmadhlu:755: devaputra, yadyātmā paramārthatastattvaṃ svāttadā devaputra, anenaiva hetunā kleśā api paramārthatastattvāni syuḥ /"
T04ksmadhlu:757: anena tāvad ātmādīnāṃ mithyākāropagrahaṇena pravṛttatvād ātmādivat kleśā api sarve mithyākāropagrahaṇena pravṛttatvād ātmādivat kleśā api sarve mithyāsvabhāvā evetyevaṃ tāvannirdiśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:758: ityevaṃ traidhātukāḥ khalu cittacaitasikā mithyākāragraharaṇapravṛttatvāt svākāra iva tadabhinnatvācca mithyāsvabhāvā eveti nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:759: bodhisattvebhyustu viśeṣataḥ kliṣṭatvāt sarvaparikalpānāṃ te mithyā evātaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:761: yadi nāsti paramārthato vastunāṃ svakīyaḥ kaścana svabhāvastadā -
T04ksmadhlu:762: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
T04ksmadhlu:763: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:764: yadi yaduktaṃ tad yadyevamuddhriyate yadanena nioṣedhamukhena svandhādīnāṃ tāvat sattaiva nirdiśyata iti cet? tanna pramāṇayogyamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:765: yato hyatra "na te yathā vikalpyante" iti yaduktaṃ tena sattayā niṣedho vidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:766: "na ca vai na santi ca" ityamunā ca ye yathā saṃvṛtavavabhāsante, te tathaiva saditi nirdiśyante
T04ksmadhlu:768: skandhādīnāṃ tāvad vyavahāre sattvam, na tu tathatāyāmiti vispaṣṭamādiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:769: yadyevaṃ na bhavettadaikasminnasattvabhidhāya punaḥ sattvena nirdeśaḥ kathaṃ sambadhyeta
T04ksmadhlu:772: samudācarati talloke na ca loke sthitaśca saḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:774: āryaratnameghe 'pi na skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ santi, saṃvṛtyaiva te santīti
T04ksmadhlu:777: bhavati, ke ca daśeti? tadyathā - rūpaprajñaptiṃ karoti, na ca paramārthato rūpamupalabhate, nābhiniveśaṃ karoti /
T04ksmadhlu:780: "sūryadatta, evamasti, yathā vyomni citrāṅkanaṃ na bhavati, na bhaviṣyati,
T04ksmadhlu:781: yato hi tadabhūtamaniruddhamanāgamamanirgamamanutpannamacyumanabhiniṣpannam anirvacanīyatvād vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:783: tathaiva rupādivijñānaparyantaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati, ita ārabhya......
T04ksmadhlu:786: nanu mahāparamārthaśūnyatāyāṃ 'asti karma, asti vipākaḥ kartā tu
T04ksmadhlu:787: nopalabhyate' yadevamuktaṃ tattāvad etadviruddhaṃ syāt, yato hi yadā
T04ksmadhlu:788: karmādayaḥ paramārthataḥ santi, tadā na bhavanti sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ, yadi saṃvṛtitaste santi tadā karturapi saṃvṛtitaḥ satvāt
T04ksmadhlu:789: 'kartā tu nopalabhyate' ityetatkathanaṃ na yuktisaṅgataṃ syāditi cet?
T04ksmadhlu:790: yadyevamucyeta tadātrāpi nāsti virodhaḥ pūrvavadeva, karmaphalayoḥ saṃvṛtāveva sattvāt, tairthikaparikalpitasya ca kartuḥ saṃvṛtāvapyasattvāt
T04ksmadhlu:792: yadyevaṃ ced anyeṣu sūtreṣuḥ astitvaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:793: yadi te bhaved yathādṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:795: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:799: tathaiva paramārthato vidyante' iti tadā 'sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ'
T04ksmadhlu:804: saṃvṛtisattvaṃ pratipāditam 'na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭāḥ' iti vacanāt /
T04ksmadhlu:805: prajñāpāramitāyāmapi saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthā khalu vyavahārasatyamāśrityaiva kṛteti, tadyathāḥ "subhūte, prāptirabhisamayo jātirnirodhaḥ saṃkleśo vyavadānamiti vyavahārata eva saṃvidyante, na tu paramārthataḥ iti /"
T04ksmadhlu:811: "cittamātraṃ bho jinaputra, yaduta traidhātukam" iti yaduktaṃ tatkathaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:813: evameva āryāndhimirmocane āryaghanavyūhādiṣvāpi sarvadharmāṇāṃ cittamātra kāyatvena nirdiṣṭatvāccittameva hi tāvat paramārthataḥ sat, nānyaditi sādhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:814: ataśca sarve dharmāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvena na sādhyituṃ śakyante /
T04ksmadhlu:815: yadyevamucyeta, tadapi na samucitaṃ kāraṇam, yato hi yathā cittasattā nirdiṣṭā tathaiva rūpasyāpi sattāyā nirdeśastattatsūtreṣvanekadhā kṛto vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:816: atha pramānabādhitatvāt suttrāntareṣu ca niṣiddhatvāta paramārthataḥ sattvena vyavasthāpayituṃ na śakyate, tadā pudgalanairātmyamātrapraveśābhisandhinā tathāvidhavineyajanāśayāpekṣayā
T04ksmadhlu:819: sūtrāntareṣvapi niḥsvabhāvatvena nirdiṣṭatvāt paramārthato 'gṛhītāpi sā cittamātratā kramaśaḥ paramārthanayasamudrāvagāhanahetumātratayā nirdiṣṭetyevaṃ grahaṇanīyamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:820: ityevaṃ ye tāvat sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvatayā yugapajjñātumakṣamāste kadācana cittamātratāmāśritya kramaśo bāhyārthaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ praviśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:821: ata eva yuktyā nirīkṣamāṇānāṃ grahyagrāho nirudhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:823: tadanantaraṃ yadi krameṇa cittasvabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣyate, tadā tamapi niḥsvabhāvatvenāvabudhya nitarāṃ gambhīranaye praviśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:831: anye tu bruvate - cittamātratā hi tavat svaprasiddhasvabhāvā, ataḥ saṃvṛtyaiva sthitā /
T04ksmadhlu:832: bāhyārthāstu na khalu saṃvṛtyāpi, cittakāramatiricya na sidhyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:833: ata eva bhagavatā tatpradarśanārthaṃ vastūni cittamātratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāni, sāpi na paramārthataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:835: sarve buddhāḥ sadā sarvān dharmān jānanti sarvathā /
T04ksmadhlu:838: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa, parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:840: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
T04ksmadhlu:841: yannaivātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat trikālātītam
T04ksmadhlu:844: yasya nāstyutpādastasya nāsti svabhāvaḥ yasya nāsti svabhāvastasya nāstyutpādaḥ, yasya nāstyutpādastasya nāsti nirodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:848: yasya nāstyāgamo nirgamaścyutirjātistasya na santi saṃskārāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:852: "nitya iti kāśyapa, ayameko 'ntaḥ, anitya iti kāśyapa, ayameko 'ntaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:853: tathā astīti kāśyapa, ayameko 'ntaḥ, nāstīti kāśyapa, ayameko 'ntaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:858: yadevamuktaṃ tanmadhyabhūtam, na tasya vastusatā vijñānasvabhāvena sattvasiddhiḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:859: dharmadhāturhi dvābhyāmantābhyāṃ vinirmuktaḥ sarvadharmanisvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ niṣprapañca iti vacanīyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:860: sa cāpi dharmadhātuḥ 'ayaṃ saḥ - ityākāreṇa nirupayitumaśakyatvād arupyaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:861: parebhyo nidarśayitusamarthatvād anidarśanaḥ, ādhyātmike dhātau āyatane
T04ksmadhlu:862: vānavasthitatvād apratiṣṭhaḥ, bāhyānāṃ dhātūnāmāyatanānāmiva anavabhāsitatvād anābhāsaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:864: yadi madhye cittasvabhāvatāyāḥ ko 'pyaṃśaḥ paramārthasan syāttadā tatsattayā nityānityābhiniveśaḥ khalu kathaṅkārameko 'ntaḥ syād, yato hi yathā vastutattvaṃ tathā yathāvadanugamya manaskaraṇaṃ patanasthānamiti
T04ksmadhlu:867: madhye hi vastu khalu svasvabhāvasyāsattvād abhūtamiti grahaṇaṃ nāsti tāvad anta ityevaṃ yadi cintyeta, tadapi na yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:870: ataḥ yasyābhāvagrahaṇaṃ st, niyataṃ tasya sattāgrahaṇamapi sadeva /
T04ksmadhlu:872: yadi madhye vastunaḥ sattvaṃ tadā tatsattvagrahaṇaṃ kena tatsattvagrahaṇaṃ kena niṣiddhaṃ syāt? āryasamādhirājasūtre madhye sataḥ paramārthasthitasya vastuno niṣedhāya yaduktam, tenāpi saha virodhaḥ syāt -
T04ksmadhlu:878: ayaṃ tāvat sūtrārthaḥ - āśrayaṇīye madhye yadi vastusatāṃ nāsti kimapi
T04ksmadhlu:879: svarūpaṃ tadaiva 'madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti panḍitaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tad
T04ksmadhlu:880: yuktaṃ syādityucyate yadyasti kimapi vastu tadā kathaṃ na paṇḍitastasmin sthānaṃ na grahīṣyatīti
T04ksmadhlu:882: api ca, he jinaputrāḥ, trayaḥ khalu dhāvato vijñaptimātratāyāṃ pracaranti,
T04ksmadhlu:883: yato hi adhvatrayaṃ cittavat pratibudhyate, tadapi tāvaccittaṃ madhyāntarahitameva pravartate
T04ksmadhlu:887: apere khalvabhidadhate - saṃvṛtau hi vijñānavad bāhyārthā api saṃvidyanta
T04ksmadhlu:889: anyathā daśabhūmakasūtre - aṣṭabhyāṃ hi bhūmau saṃsthitā bodhisattvā lokadhātvantargatānāṃ paramāṇvādīnāṃ saṃkhyāṃ parijānanti - iti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:892: "sa paramāṇurajaḥsūkṣmatāṃ ca prajānāti, mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktiṃ ca prajānāti
T04ksmadhlu:894: asyāṃ ca lokadhātau yāvanti pṛthvīdhātoḥ paramāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti /
T04ksmadhlu:897: vijñānavad bāhyārthānāmapi prasiddhatvāt pratītivirodhaḥ, yato hi yuktibhirvicāraṇāyāṃ satyāmubhāvapi naiva parīkṣāṃ sahete, atastau avtusthitimapi na kṣamete /
T04ksmadhlu:899: vijñaptimātratākathanasya tāvat phalaṃ tu paraparikalpitānāṃ kartubhoktrādīnāṃ niṣedha eva, vyavahāre 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:901: athavā - sarvadharmeṣu pūrvaṅgamatvāccittaṃ sarvadharmāpekṣayā pradhānaṃ sidhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:902: yāvad yathā "nāstyarthaṃ cittameva tu" iti yaduktam, yathā vā "vāsanairlulitaṃ cittamārthābhāsaṃ pravartate" ityādi yaduktam, yathā vā "vāsanairlulitaṃ cittamārthābhāsaṃ pravatate" ityādi yaduktam, tadapi nirākāreṇa cittena viṣayagrahaṇaṃ kathamapi na yujyata ityavaśyaṃ tat
T04ksmadhlu:904: ataścittākāraṃ vyatiricya arthākārāvabhāsābhāvāt tanniṣedhena sākāracittameva tāvannirdiśyate, na tu tena bahyārthā bhāvo 'vabodhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:905: athavā ātmadisattānirdeśa iva tadvineyajanāpekṣayā yathā sadvaidya āturān puṣṇāti tathā bhagavanto nānavidyā deśānāḥ pravartayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:907: āture āture yadvad bhiṣag dravyaṃ prayacchati /
T04ksmadhlu:908: buddhā hi tadvat sattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti vai //
T04ksmadhlu:909: nānyān visaṃvādayatīti vineyajanānāṃ hitasukhakaratvāt sārthakaṃ vacanam /
T04ksmadhlu:910: parahitaṃ tāvadekāntatayā satyamiti heturbhagavatsu tāvannāsti mṛṣāvādo
T04ksmadhlu:916: varaṃ tāvaccittamatratā, kintu niḥsandigdhaṃ sūkṣmavastusvabhāvaṃ samyak sādhayituṃ nāsti sarvathā ko 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:919: "kulaputra, yadi bhavet paramārthato 'sattvam, tadā nirarthakaṃ brahmacaryam" iti yaduktaṃ tatkiṃ nāsti sat?
T04ksmadhlu:920: yadyevamucyeta tannaiva yujyate, yato hi tatpramāṇabhūtaṃ paramārthaṃ ko hi nāma tyajet
T04ksmadhlu:921: ayaṃ tāvat sūtrārthaḥ - iyaṃ hi pudgaladharmanairātmyalakṣaṇā tathataiva paramārthaśabdavācyā paramasya jñānasya gocaratvāt,yuktimattvācca saiva svayaṃ parameti /
T04ksmadhlu:922: yadi tadapyasat syāttadā yathā pudgalo dharmāśca bālapṛthagjaneṣu prasiddhāstathaiva syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:923: tathā sati sarve janā anāyāsena ādita eva tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:924: tattvadarśanārthaṃ ca prayatno 'pi nirarthakaḥ syāditi suspaṣṭameva /
T04ksmadhlu:928: iti uaduktaṃ tena kathaṃ na virodhaḥ syāditi cet? tarhi nāsti virodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:929: ye khalu paramārthasat vastvabhyupagamya punastasyāsattvaṃ parikalpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:930: evañca yeṣāṃ vināśārthaṃ śūnyatādeśānā, teṣāṃ rāgādīnāṃ samyak
T04ksmadhlu:931: sattvameveti parikalpayanti, te pūrvaṃ sattvaṃ parikalpya paścāt tadasattvaṃ parigṛhṇanti
T04ksmadhlu:932: ataḥ sadasadantayoḥ patitatvāt te antadvayarahitaṃ sarvaprapañcapaśamaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ naivādhigacchantīti "abhimāninaḥ' ata eva bhagavantastathāvidhāyā dṛṣṭerniṣedhena paramārthataḥ sadasatsarvaprapañcajālavirahitasya jñānārthaṃ niyojayantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:939: tatra mahāmate, kathamastitvaniśrito lokaḥ? yaduta vidyamānairhetupratyayairloka utpadyate nāvidyamanaiḥ, vidyamānaṃ cotpadyamānamutpadyate nāvidyamānam /
T04ksmadhlu:943: mahāmate, kathaṃ nāstitvaniśrito bhavati? yaduta rāgadveṣamohābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā punarapi rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhāvaṃ vikalpayati /
T04ksmadhlu:948: bhavati? mahāmatirāha - ya eṣa bhagavan abhyupagamya rāgadveṣamohān na
T04ksmadhlu:950: bhagavānāha - sādhu, sādhu mahāmate, sādhu sādhu punastvaṃ mahāmate, yastvamevaṃ prabhāṣitaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:951: kevalaṃ mahāmate, na rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhāvād vaināśiko bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:954: sandhāyoktaṃ mayāvaraṃ khalu sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirna tveva nāstyastitvābhimānikasya śūnyatādṣṛṣṭiḥ iti /
T04ksmadhlu:957: abhutvā yasya utpādo bhūtva vāpi vinaśyati /
T04ksmadhlu:958: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te śāsane sthitāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:960: tasyāsti nāsti nopaiti viviktaṃ paśyato jagat //
T04ksmadhlu:963: ataśca nāsti virodhaḥ' ityabhidadhadbhiḥ kaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ ityabhidhātavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:964: atha pramāṇaviruddhamapi yad bālaiḥ satyamiti gṛhyate taditi cet? tadāśeṣaṃ jagat paramārthato
T04ksmadhlu:965: bālairyadutpattyādikaṃ paramārthataḥ sadityāropyate tad vakṣyamāṇapramāṇairniṣiddhatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvamiti kasmānna gṛhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:967: parikalpitasvabhāvatvāchūnyāḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tasya paramārthato na santīti
T04ksmadhlu:968: vyākhyānaṃ kasmānna kriyate? pramāṇaviruddhatvāttathā vyakhyānaṃ na
T04ksmadhlu:969: karttavyamiti cet? tadā vijñānasyāpi tathā vyākhyānaṃ na kartuvyam,
T04ksmadhlu:971: pramāṇai katipayairyadi vijñānaṃ vastusat sidhyati tadā dvividhameva
T04ksmadhlu:972: parikalpitam, nānyaditi samyag vyākhyātaṃ bhavet, kintu tadapi naiva
T04ksmadhlu:974: ataśca jagadidaṃ yathoktaparikalpitasvabhāvaviviktamityasmābhirapyabhyupeyata iti nāsti sarvathā durūham /
T04ksmadhlu:977: tannālambanīkriyate, sarvaśūnyatālakṣaṇatvāttasya' iti yaduktaṃ tadapyanena nirākṛtaṃ bhavati" ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:978: tatrāpi rāgādayo ye saṃkleśātmakasaṃvṛtisvabhāvānāṃ paratantralakṣaṇānāṃ samyaktayā saṃkliṣṭakaraṇena saṃsāre niyojanena pratipakṣe ca yathākramaṃ vidhyanabhūtābhūtatvādinā cāropyante, te teṣāṃ kṛte
T04ksmadhlu:981: ataḥ pariniṣpannalakṣaṇayuktāni bodhipakṣānukūlavyavadānānyapi vipakṣātyantapratighātarupeṇa parinirvāṇe ca niyojanādinā samyaktayā vastudharmatāyāmāropitāni, tānyapi teṣāṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇameva yaśca dharmadhātuḥ prakṛtiprabhāsvarastasminnasambhavaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśādīnām /
T04ksmadhlu:988: "na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:989: na vijñānaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
T04ksmadhlu:990: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃkāravijñānānāṃ na rāgadharmatā nāpi virāgadharmatā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T04ksmadhlu:991: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ dveṣadharma vā adveṣadharmi
T04ksmadhlu:993: na vijñānaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
T04ksmadhlu:994: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dveṣadharmatā nāpi vigatadveṣadharmatā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T04ksmadhlu:995: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:996: na vijñānaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
T04ksmadhlu:997: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na mohadharmatā nāpi vigatamohadharmatā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T04ksmadhlu:998: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:999: na vijñānaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
T04ksmadhlu:1000: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānām asaṃkleśatā avyavadānatā iyamucyate prajñāpāramitā"
T04ksmadhlu:1003: "katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1005: mañjuśrīrāha - devaputra, paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā
T04ksmadhlu:1008: "saṃkṣepato hi sarve 'kuśalamanaskārāstāvat saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti, sarve ca kuśalamanaskārā vyavadānahetava iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1009: tatra ye cāpi saṃkleśahetavo vā vyavadānahetavo vā dharmāste sarve svabhāvataḥ śūnyāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1012: antaḥśāantāḥ, ye antaḥśāntāste praśāntāḥ, ye praśāntāste tāvattatprakṛtikāḥ, ye khalu tatprakṛkāste nopalabhyante, ye nopalabhyante te naivopatiṣṭhante, ye nopatiṣṭhante ta eva tāvadākāśam, ākāśaṃ cābhyavakāśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1013: sarvadharmān ākāśasamān vijñāyāpi saṃkleśaḥ vyavadānaṃ ceti vyavahiyete ākāśadharmatā cāpi nāpanīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1015: mañjuśrīḥ, jātinirodhadharmavān na ko 'pi dharmo bhavati" ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:1016: yadi punaḥ parikalpitalakṣaṇaśūnyaḥ ko 'pi dharmaḥ syāt tadāsminneva sūtre
T04ksmadhlu:1017: "mañjuśrīḥ, advayā, sarve dharmāḥ, arthānniḥsvalakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anāmikā animittā amanaścittavijñāptikā anutpannā aniruddhā ahetukā
T04ksmadhlu:1021: mañjuśrīḥ, nopalabhyate paramārthataḥ kaścana śūnyatākhyo dharmaḥ" /
T04ksmadhlu:1025: tatra ko hi nāma bhāva iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1026: yaḥ khalyavāryajñānena āryadarśanena cānirvacanīyatāyāmavabudhyate, sa eva tadanirvacanīyatāyāmavabuddhatvad asaṃskṛtanāmnā kevalaṃ vyavahiyate" /
T04ksmadhlu:1027: ityādikaṃ yaduktam, tathā bhagavatpravacaneṣu ca yadāryajñānagocaraṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ tad bhāvasvabhāvena saditi nirdiṣṭam, tatkathaṃ sambhavediti cet? na virodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1028: atrāryajñānagocarāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yo hi nairātmyalakṣaṇo dharmadhatuḥ sa eva bhāvaśabdena vivakṣayā vastvabhiniveśaśālināṃ bhayasthānaṃ parihartukāmena tathā deśitam /
T04ksmadhlu:1029: athavā āryajñānāni sarve ca dharmāḥ tathatāpannāḥ, ato vastuśabdāśrayapratipipādayiṣayā dharmadhātuvābhihitaḥ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1030: bhagavadbhitrapi vineyajanāśayānurodhena tāvat sā dharmataiva vividhairupāyairupadiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:1032: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā bālānāṃ nairātmyasantrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ nirvikalpanirābhāsagocaraṃ tathāgatarbhakhopadeśena deśayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1033: tadyathā mahāmate, kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervivadhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti
T04ksmadhlu:1035: tathāgatāstadeva dharmanairātyaṃ sarvavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairrgarbhopadeśena vā nairāmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ padavyañcanaparyāyairdeśayante" /
T04ksmadhlu:1036: tathātāpiyaṃ sarvathā vācyāpi vyavahāravaśena aśeṣasaṃskṛtadharmatā, ataḥ saṃkṛteti nāmnā vyavahiyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1037: utpādād vā tathāgatānāmanutpādād vā tathāgatanāṃ sarvakāleṣu sthitatvād asaṃskṛteti nāmnāpi vyapadiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:1039: anyathā bhavatsammatam asaṃskṛtastvapi tat kathaṃ bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:1043: vadanti ye vai tathatāmasaṃkṛtāṃ tathaiva cānye kṛtakāṃ yatastām /
T04ksmadhlu:1044: notsāhavanto hyubhaye bhavanti dharmasya jñāne sugatopadiṣṭe //
T04ksmadhlu:1045: atastaditthaṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayorvastutvagrāhastāvad antagrāha iti athavā śrāvakapratyekabuddhanāṃ yad gocaraṃ tatsvalakṣaṇaṃ vastitvatyabhyupagacchātāṃ bālānāṃ kevalaṃ santrāsapadavivarjanārthameva āryajñānagocaraṃ vastusadityabhihitam /
T04ksmadhlu:1046: buddhabodhiattvānām atyantalokottarajñānasya viṣayastu pāramārthikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvathāsat, sarvadharmānutpādānirodhaviṣayakatvāt sadasatpakṣavirahitameva taditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1049: kimatyantalokottarajñānam? buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirābhāsadharpravicayena anutpādānirodhadarśanāt sadasatyakṣavivarjitaṃ taditi /"
T04ksmadhlu:1050: śrāvakādayastāvat tathyasaṃvṛtisaṃgṛhītaṃ skandhamātraṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇākareṇa bhāvayanti, ataḥ pudgalanairātmyamātragṛhītatvātteṣāṃ tajjñānaṃ vastuviṣayakamiti
T04ksmadhlu:1052: yadi buddhabodhisattvānāṃ jñānasya viṣayaḥ paramārthalakṣaṇena sahaikībhūtaṃ tadā kathaṃ tajjñānaṃ satpakṣavivarjitaṃ syāt? ata eva hi
T04ksmadhlu:1054: na tu paramārthato vastu svalakṣaṇasaditi kathanārtham /
T04ksmadhlu:1056: tadā buddhāṃ bodhisattvāśca sadvikalpasambaddhā na bhavantīti? yathā bālānāṃ santrāapadavivarjanārthamityuktam, na tu paramārthato vastusaditi
T04ksmadhlu:1057: pratipādanārtham, tathā bhagavatāpi sūtrāntareṣu deśitam, tathā hi āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre - "kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyasidṛṣṭiṃ vinivārya vastusvabhāvābhiniveśena
T04ksmadhlu:1058: āryajñānagocaraviṣāabhiniveśānnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnipātyate, viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaśca kriyate āryajñānasvabhāvavastudeśanayā? bhagavānāha - na mayā mahamate,
T04ksmadhlu:1059: viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaḥ kriyate, na ca na cāstītvadṛṣṭirnipātyate āryavastusvabhāvanirdeśenaḥ kintu uttrāsapadavivārjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate, mayā anādikālabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭānāmāryajñānavastusvabhāvābhiniveśālakṣaṇadṛṣṭyā viviktadharmopadeśaḥ kriyate, na mayā māhamate, bhāvasvabhāvopadeśaḥ kriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1062: ato yadāryajñānagocaraviṣayo vastusvalakṣaṇatvena nirdiṣṭa nirdiṣṭaḥ sa tāvad bhagavata upāyenaiva deśanāmātram /
T04ksmadhlu:1065: te tāvābhimānino bhagavantamapi apavādya svayaṃ vinaśyanti parāṃścāpi nāśayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1066: evamitthamasninneva sūtre vastusabhāvābhiniveśinaḥ ātmagrāhagṛhītatvānna muktā bhaviṣyantītyevaṃ samupadiṣṭam - "punaraparaṃ mahāmate,
T04ksmadhlu:1067: pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtyā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1068: na ca mahāmate, cittamano manovijñānacittaparāvṛttyāśrayāṇāṃ svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tathāgatabhūmipratyātmāryajñānagatānaṃ yogināṃ bhāvābhāvasaṃjñā
T04ksmadhlu:1069: pravartate, sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt" /
T04ksmadhlu:1070: api ca, yadi paramārthataḥ syāt kimapi vastusat tadā tadavaśyaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā syād, aparāyāḥ koṭerabhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1071: tasmin vastūni nityānityatvacintayā pravṛttā yā prajñā, sā vastuno yathāsvabhāvajñānānukūlatayā samyak prajñaiva, na tu prajñāpāramiteva
T04ksmadhlu:1073: ata eva tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yaduktaṃ tenāpi virodhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1074: tathā hi - "kauśika, ye kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitāro vā yadā prajñāpāramitāmupadiśanti tadā prajñāpāramitāvadevopadiśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1076: yato hi rūpamanityamityupadiśanti, tathaiva duḥkhatāṃ nirātmatāmaśucitāṃ copadiśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1077: evameva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni dhyānāpramāṇārupānusmṛtisatmyakprahāṇārddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni tathāgatasya daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇīkā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā ceti sarvaṃ duḥkhamanātmakaśucītyupadiśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1080: tatra ye prajñāpāramitāvanna kaurvanti tatkathamiti cet? te itthumupadiśantikulaputrāḥ, atrāgacchatha,
T04ksmadhlu:1083: yatho hi rūpamitisvabhāvataḥ śūnyam, rūpasya yo 'pi svabhāvaḥ, sa
T04ksmadhlu:1087: yataśca yatrarūpameva nāsti tatra kuto nityamanityaṃ vāāa?
T04ksmadhlu:1090: apitvevamupadeṣṭavyam - kulaputrāḥ, atrāgacchatha, prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatha mā ca kamapi dharmaṃ samatikramatha, mā ca kasmitrapi dharme tiṣṭhatha /
T04ksmadhlu:1091: tat kimarthamiti cet? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāsti ko 'ma dharmaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1093: yato hi sarve dharmā svabhāvataḥ śūnyāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1094: ye svabhāvataḥ śūnyatā te 'santaḥ, saiva prajñāpāramitā /
T04ksmadhlu:1095: yā ca prajñāpāramitā, tasyāṃ na ko 'pi grāhyo heya utyādyo nirodhyaśceti /
T04ksmadhlu:1097: ataḥ sarve vastuvādinastāvad dharmatathatāṃ viparītatayā nirdiśantyataḥ [tannirdeśaḥ]
T04ksmadhlu:1099: sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāvādinastvaviparītatayā nirdiśantyataḥ sopattikā eva ta iti bhagavatā suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:1105: tāvadāgamadvara sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ'
T04ksmadhlu:1107: tatra yadyalpamatitayā evaṃvidhaṃ gambhīradharmatāṃ nādhimoktuṃ pārayanti tathāpi savikalpamātmano mandaprajñatvadosamavalokayadbhistatparityāgo naiva
T04ksmadhlu:1109: ātmānaṃ vināśya pareṣāmapi mahārthavirahaṃ kṛtvā praṇāśo naiva samīcīnaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1110: evaṃ hi sati svaparadroha eva sa syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1111: ataḥ prajñāvantaḥ śraddhāvantaśca gambhiradharmaparityādagṛṣṭiṃ parivarjya bhagavantaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya ātmano 'jñānadoṣakāraṇāt tadaparijñānaṃ sambhāvyata iti
T04ksmadhlu:1112: vicārya gambhīrasūtreṣu śraddhāmutpādya śravaṇacintābhāvanādiṣu yogaṃ kuryuḥ, parāṃścāpi samyak tadadhigantumavatārayeyuḥ, svayaṃ ca tadadhimoktuṃ praṇidadhyuriti /
T04ksmadhlu:1114: 'sya gambhīradharmasya gāmbhīrya prajñayā avaboddhumaśaknuvānāste tathāgatameva pramāṇaṃ kurvanti, anantā buddhobodhiriti kṛtvā /
T04ksmadhlu:1115: yataśca vividhādhimokṣānusāraṃ tathāgatā eva dharmopadeśe pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:1117: nāsmādṛśairjñātuṃ śakyata iti vicārya tatparityāgo naiva yuktarūpaḥ" /
T04ksmadhlu:1118: ityuvamāgamamukhena sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā eveti siddhā bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1119: [3] ye 'pi tāvadutpattyādivibhāgaṃ dvayābhāsinā jñānenaiva kurvanti, na tu svasaṃvittimātreṇa, te dvayābhāsasya mithyātvena tadvyavasthāpitaḥ svabhāvo 'pi mithaivetyabhidadhate /
T04ksmadhlu:1122: vyavasthāpyate, tadā kathaṃ sā paramārthasatī bhavet? dvayābhāso 'pi yadi mithyaiva tadā katajjñānarūpamavaśiṣyate yat khalu paramārthasad bhavet?
T04ksmadhlu:1123: anyattad vijñānaṃ grāhakākārarahitaṃ tadarvāgdarśibhiḥ nānubhavituṃ yujyate, sarveṣāṃ sarvadarśitvaprasaṅgāt
T04ksmadhlu:1128: na ca kāryaheturapi, yato hi kāmaṃ syāttadadvayaviruddhaṃ tathāpi tena kāryakāraṇabhāva eva na siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1131: tathā sati bhavanmatenādvayameva kāryaṃ syāt, kintu sādhyāvasthāpannatvānnaiva tat pramāṇaiḥ prasidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1134: ataśca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sādhyabhūtasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya siddhaye paramārthe 'dvayajñānena
T04ksmadhlu:1138: sa tatsvabhāvaviviktaḥ, yathā śītasvabhāvaviruddhamuṣṇatvaṃ śītasvabhāvaviviktam, tathā ca pratītiṣvabhāvo dharmī,
T04ksmadhlu:1140: na cāpi hetorāśrayāsiddhiḥ sāamānyasukhaduḥkhākāravedakasya dharmiṇo jñānākhyapratītisvabhāvena siddhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1142: grāhyākārasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena asattve tadāśritaḥ parikalpito grāhakākāro 'pi niḥsvabhāva eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1143: na cāpi sarvābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, kevalena kartukarmasvabhāvena kalpitatvānmithyaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:1145: yadi sāmānyena paramārthato dvayaviviktastvaṃ sādhayitumiṣyate tadā siddhasādhanameva, yato hi vayamapi paramārthato dvayasya mithyātvād
T04ksmadhlu:1147: yadi hyabhāvasvabhāvaḥ khalu paramārthata ākāravirahitavijñānatvena sādhayitumiṣyate, tadāpi siddhasādhanameva, yato hi vayamapi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpannatvāt sarvavijñānāni tāvat paramārthato 'siddhāni dvayākārasuviyuktānītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1148: yadi vijñānākhyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ dvayaviyuktatvena vastusattvena ca sādhayitumiṣyate tadā dṛṣṭāntavayāsiddhatvādanaikāntikattvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1150: ekasminneva jñāne jñānatadavabhāsayoravabhāsitatvena avirodho 'pi syādataḥ sādhyavikalaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapi syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1151: yadi vijñānaṃ dvayaviyuktaṃ sidhyati tadā tadbalena svabhāvasattvamapi sidhyatīti cet? durmatireṣā, sambandhābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1152: yaddhi dvayaviyuktaṃ tadavaśyaṃ samyag vastusaditi ko hyatra sambandhaḥ? yato hi yadi tannivartate tadānarthopasaṃhitaṃ pramāṇamapi nivartate /
T04ksmadhlu:1158: śītādisparśaviyuktānāmūṣmādīnāṃ svabhāvavat dvayasvabhāvātiriktaḥ tadviyuktasvabhāvatvena siddhaḥ pratītisvabhāvabhinnastatsamānasvabhāvaḥ kaścidapi dharmī nāstyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:1160: evaṃ hi anyavyaktinirapekṣaḥ san yaśca svayamevātmanābhivyajyate, sa pratītilakṣaṇaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1161: kāyabhūmiparvatanadī sāgarādayo vividhākārā ye pugato 'vabhāsamānā bāhyārthāste svayamevātmanā abhivyajyamānatvāt pratītisvabhāvātikrāntā eva pravartante /
T04ksmadhlu:1162: evamapi ye mithyatmanā kuleṣu gṛheṣu ca pravṛttimācaranti, teṣāṃ svakāyopagūḍhadayitayā pratītisvabhāvāliṅganamiva ācaraṇād asaddvayasamāyogo 'yaṃ dūṣitatvānna viśvāsayogyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1163: tathā ca dvayasvabhāvātmakāt priyatamād viyoge sati kimiva nānyena saha samāyogaḥ syādataḥ kevalamasyaiva dharmitvāvasthā naivopapadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1169: ye 'nyaiḥ pramāṇairbāhyārthā nirākriyanta iti bruvate, teṣāṃ jñānamapi kinna tathā /
T04ksmadhlu:1173: tathā sati ye nīlādivividhacittākārā bāhyārthatvena vijñāne 'vabhāsante te karmakartṛvyavahārānabhijñaiḥ kalpanādoṣavinirmukte citte spaṣṭato 'nubhūtā bhaviṣyantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1175: cet? tasya tāvad viśeṣasya bālaparyantaṃ nāsti suspaṣṭāvabodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1176: yadi niyatadeśakālāvasthitasya tasyākārarāśeḥ tathāvidhaspaṣṭāvabhāsato bhinnānubhavo mithyaiveti bhavantaḥ svīrkunti tadā vimiktikāṃkṣiṇo bhavantaḥ tirobhūtadvayasvabhāvarahitātmakaṃ pratītisvabhāvaṃ viviktasvabhāvatvenābhiniviśya āsaktā eveti kimanyat /
T04ksmadhlu:1178: ataśca svatīkṣṇaprajñākhaḍgena tāmāsaktiṃ chittvā kaścana tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattikṣaṇo vā sammbandhaḥ satyāsatyayoranyoparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tādārmyavirodhaḥ asato 'pi na kutaścidapyutpattibhyupeyate utpattau satyāmapi na yugapattādātmyenāvabhāso yujyate, kāryakāraṇayoḥ kālasvabhāvābhyāṃ bhinnatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1181: ityevamavaśyaṃ kalpanābhinnasya asatsvabhāvākārāvabhāsasya svīkāraṇāt tallakṣaṇānvita evābhyupagantavyaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1183: yadyevaṃ na syāt kathaṃ nāma mithyākārakalpanāsvabhāvoyostādātmyenānubhavo jāyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:1186: dharmastathāgatenābhisambuddhaḥ, sa na satyaṃ nāpi mṛṣā" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1188: evaṃ katipayaiḥ pratyakṣaiḥ 'sarve dharmā viviktā' iti jñātumaśakyatvat /
T04ksmadhlu:1189: vastveva teṣāṃ viṣaya ityabhidadhānāstāvat praṣṭavyā kiṃ sarvesāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ yāni pratyakṣāṇi tāni sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ nāvaboddhauṃ samarthāni utāho ghanājñanatimiropahatamatiyanānāṃ bhavadṛśānāṃ pratyakṣāṇi nāvaboddhumiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1190: tatra prathamastāvat pakṣo naiva yujyate, pramāṇābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1191: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣāṇi na pravartanta iti niścāyakasya pramāṇasyābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1194: tadā yato hi kāraṇāt svenānupalambhaḥ, tasmin apravṛttijñānāṃ sarveṣāṃ strīpurusāṇāṃ cittasantatau pravartamānā yā cittapravṛtiḥ sā tāvānnaiva
T04ksmadhlu:1196: ataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣeṇa tajjñānaṃ naiva bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1198: vayamapi hi arvāgdarśibhistathāvidhasya tāvad gambhīradharmatattvasya pratyakṣato darśanaṃ naiva manyāmahe /
T04ksmadhlu:1201: anurūpakṛtsnopāyasamanvitāḥ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajamyajñānaprabhābhirnirastasamastāvaraṇāndhakārāsteṣaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tāvat sarvadharmanairātmyabodho bhavatyeveti kasmātra sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:1204: evamarvāgdarśināṃ yāni pratyakṣāṇi tāni timiropahatapratyakṣavad rupādimithyāviṣayakatvād vastusvabhāvaviṣayatvena samyagviṣayatvena vā tāvannaiva yujyante, anyathā sarveṣāṃ khalu tattvadarśitvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1205: buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyogināṃ cāpi jñānāni naiva tāvad vastuviṣayakatvena prasidhyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1206: yasmānna taiḥ kaścanāpi aviparīto vastusvabhāvaḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1208: yaduta sarve tairdharmā nisvabhāvāḥ aniruddhāḥ prakṛtyopaśāntāḥ atyantamajātāḥ atyantamabhūtāḥ atyantaparinirvṛtā eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1209: taistāvad yena dṛṣṭaṃ tadapyanidarśanamavidarśanaṃ ca, yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad yena dṛṣṭaṃ tadapyanirdarśanamavidarśanaṃ ca, yato hi tat
T04ksmadhlu:1211: kiṃ punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathāvad darśanamiti cet? tadeva yadanidarśanamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1216: yaddhi asad bhavati vastu, tanna kathamapi vijñānamutpādayituṃ kṣamamiti
T04ksmadhlu:1221: ye marīcipratiśabdanibhān sarvadharmān yathāvad bhāvayanti, teṣu samyagarthabhāvanābalena
T04ksmadhlu:1222: 'nuttarācintyaprabhāvasampannatayā tatpratyakṣeṣu sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ bhavatyeva, aśeṣadharmanairātmsākṣātkāri suspaṣṭaṃ tāvajjñānamudetyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:1225: atha yattāvat pratyakṣaṃ tat sasvabhāvamiti yaduktaṃ tat sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādaikarasatvat pratyakṣamapi paramārthato niḥsvabhāvameva,
T04ksmadhlu:1226: tathāpi yā saṃvṛtisatyāśritā pratyakṣavyavasthā sā sarvā tāvadavyāhayaiva
T04ksmadhlu:1227: / sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi mādhyakāḥ sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ vyāvahārikāṇāṃ yogijñānānāmapareṣāṃ pṛthagjanajñānānām āryapudgalādīnāṃ ye hetavastātānnaiva nābhyupagacchanti, kintuṃ ye tāvat
T04ksmadhlu:1229: yat sat tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvamapi tāvadutpadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1235: yathaiva hi mantroṣadhādiprabhāveṇa gajādivividhamāyāprādurbhāvastathaiva karmakleśādiprabhāveṇ sattvānāmutpādādayaḥ prādurbhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1236: yagināṃ tāvat svakīyapuṇyajñānasambhārasañcayavaśena yogijñānādimāyāprādurbhāvaḥ, yato hi vividhairhi pratyayaiḥ sā māyāpi vividhaivāvabhāsate /
T04ksmadhlu:1238: pratyekabuddhanirmitaḥ] kaścid bodhisattvanirmitaḥ kaścit tathāganitmitaḥ kaścit karmanirmitaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1241: bālapṛthagjanebhyastāvad yogināmetadeva vaiśiṣṭayaṃ yatte māyākāra iva yathāvanmāyāṃ parijānanti, na ca tathaiva tasyāmabhiniviśante /
T04ksmadhlu:1243: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:1246: yathā bālapṛthagjanajātīyadarśakeṣu utpattyādimāyabhāso bhavati, tathaiva ye tasmin satyato 'bhiniviśante, te viparītābhiniveśavaśād "bālāḥ"
T04ksmadhlu:1248: ataḥ saṃvṛtiyogahini yogipratyakṣe tathā sthitatvātteṣāṃ śaśaśṛṅga ivātyantābhāvo naiva bhavati
T04ksmadhlu:1252: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi yoginaḥ pṛthagjana iva vyavahāratayā vyavasthāpayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1255: 'yadarthāntaraviviktapākṣikena pratyakṣeṇa parigṛhya taditaraśūnyapratyakṣeṇa tāvadavabudhyate' - ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi
T04ksmadhlu:1256: naiva yujyate, itaretaraśūnyatvādasya nayasya, na tu lakṣaṇaśūnyatvāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1257: lakṣanaśūnyatve u sarve dharmāstāvat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvenaivābhyupagamyante, yatasteṣāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇāni paramārthato yathā vyavasthitāni, tebhyastacchūnyatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1258: yā hi vastūnāmitaretaraśūnyatā sā naiva paramārthaḥ, vyavahārasatyamāśritā khalu sā /
T04ksmadhlu:1261: ata evātra yathāprasiddhimarthāntaraviviktagrahaṇamukhena tāvaditaretaraśūnyatā vyavasthāpyate, na tu paramārthatayā /
T04ksmadhlu:1262: yato hi svapnamāyādisadṛśavastūnāṃ svabhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ parasparamabhinnaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1266: "evaṃ mahāmate, itaretaraśūnyatā sarvajaghanyā, sā ca tvayā
T04ksmadhlu:1268: yā khalu sarvadharmalakṣaṇaśūnyatā, yā ca tasyāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1269: svasāmānyakakṣaṇavyavasthā, sā upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāpi satī yogibhiḥ paramārthatayā anupalabdhākāraiva
T04ksmadhlu:1270: ataḥ sarve dharmā nirābhāsajñānotpattyā jñātā bhavantīti vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1271: ata eva ca itaretaraśūnyatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ parikalpanāmaśrityaivābhihitā,
T04ksmadhlu:1273: [5] sā ca 'yogipratyakṣeṇa samyagavagamye' ti kathanaṃ naiva viduṣāṃ rucikaram /
T04ksmadhlu:1274: yuktyabhāvastatreti yat kathanaṃ tadapi nāsti yuktisaṅgatam,
T04ksmadhlu:1279: pramadādyavabhāsi spaṣṭaṃ jñānamupajāyate yena te tān puraḥsthitaniva dṛṣṭvā sahasā vividhaśarīrakampādibhiśceṣṭamānā dṛśyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1280: ataśca yathoktatatvaṃ bhāvayatsu tajjñanamutpatsyata eveti sambhāvyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1283: prayogaḥ - ye tāvat kecinnirantaraṃ sādaraṃ bhāvanāmanutiṣṭhanti, te bhāvanāphalaṃ prakarṣaparyantajaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1285: yatra cirakālaṃ nirantaraṃ sādaraṃ sarvadharmanairātmyabhāvanaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ, tatra pramāṇopapannārthavisayakamavisaṃvādakaṃ [jñānaṃ] bhavatyeva, vyavahāreṇa dhūmādiliṅgajanitaniścayenotpannāgnyādijñānavat /
T04ksmadhlu:1288: spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad yajjñānamavisaṃvādaṇaṃ janayati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:1290: sarvadharmanairātmyaviṣayakaṃ yogināṃ jñānamapi spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad avisaṃvādakamiti svabhāvahetuḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1291: yadyevaṃ sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ yuktibhiḥ susādhyaṃ tadā kathamiva vidvāṃsastatra na pritāḥ? yadapi yogijñānaṃ tadasaditi yaducyate, tatpūrvamasmābhiḥ samyaguttaritam,
T04ksmadhlu:1295: vyavahārāstāvanniṣidhyante, na ca te 'smābhirnābhyupeyanta iti yaduktaṃ tattathā /
T04ksmadhlu:1296: [6] yaistāvat "anumānenāpi sarvavastuni niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayitumaśakyāni, kasyāpi dharmino viṣayasyāsiddhatvāt, dṛṣṭāntādīnāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1297: cānutpannatāvat, sarvasāṃ yuktīnāṃ viṣayasya svabhāvasya cāsiddhatvāt"
T04ksmadhlu:1299: itthamasmābhirniḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupete sati yadā bhavantaḥ prasaṅgamāpādayanti tadā sa prasaṅga eva nāsti /
T04ksmadhlu:1300: yaiḥ khalu hetubhirasmābhirvastūnāṃ niḥsvabhāvatābhyupeyate, tatra paramārthato hetudṛṣṭāntadharmiṇāmasattvād
T04ksmadhlu:1301: yadyanumānānumeyādisarvavyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgo 'smāsvāpādyate, tadā sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati, iṣṭāpatteḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1305: vayaṃ tāvad bhavadbhiḥ prayuktaṃ dūṣṇamapi paramārthato
T04ksmadhlu:1312: yat paramārthato 'sat tad vyavahāre 'pi pravartituṃ na śakyata
T04ksmadhlu:1313: ityevaṃ yo hi prasaṅgaḥ, sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati, vyāptyasiddheḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1314: yato hi yena kāraṇena yasyātmanivartanaṃ tena tasya vyavahāranivartanaṃ tu nāsti paramārthasvabhāvavyāptam, api tu tadviparyayavyāptamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1316: paramārthasvabhāvavirāhitā api svapnādayo vividhavyavahāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1321: sarvatra sādhyadharmyādīnāṃ paramārthabhūtatvādeva anumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartanta iti hetoḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve sati nānumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartsyanta iti yo hi doṣa āropyate, so 'pi tāvad doṣābhāva eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1322: nirvivādarūpatayā saprasaṅgatvāt paramārtadharmyādibhiḥ anumānādivyavahārāḥ kutrāpi naiva siddhāḥ, tathāpi loke yathāprasiddha eva dharmiṇi vyavahārā bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1323: yato hi pravādino hi tattvānirṇayārthameva anumānādivyavahārān prayuñjanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1334: pramāṇasya tāvat sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tattvapravṛtyarthameva bhavanti, anyathā vyarthānyeva tāni syuriti /
T04ksmadhlu:1335: pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstrāṇyanadhīyānāsu gopālakāṅganāsu evamupadeśābhāve 'pi dhūmādiliṅgadarśanato 'gnyādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1336: ata eva vayamapi tattvapraveśāya tathatāvyavahārābhyāmanumānādipravartanād doṣarahitā eva
T04ksmadhlu:1337: api ca, ye vyavahāreṇānumānādipravṛttau yatrānityādi vastudharmaṃ satsvabhāvaṃ sādhayanti, teṣāṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ tatra vyavahāreṇa vastubhūtadharmādayaḥ syureva, yato hi tatra tathāvidhā āśrayahīnā sādhyadisthitirnaiva siddhā /
T04ksmadhlu:1338: yadi tatra tathāvidha āśrayo nāsti tadā sādhyaniṣedhanād āśrayā siddhyākhyo doṣo dīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1340: niḥsaṃśayaṃ sādhyādidharmiṇo 'vinābhāvasya niṣedhaṃ karoti, yato hi asiddhe sati hetvasiddhayādidoṣā dīyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1341: svayamupakalpitānāṃ katipayadharmiṇāṃ nivṛttāvapi sādhayādeḥ kasyāpi niṣedhasyābhāvād asiddhayādidoṣā naiva yujyante, tadabhilaṣitārthasiddhau bādhābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1342: ye vastudharmaṃ sattsvabhāvaṃ sādhayituṃ nābhilaṣante, api tu tadāropitadharmāṇāṃ vyavacchesiddhimātraṃ vivakṣante, tebhyo
T04ksmadhlu:1348: prativādina upaghātakāmanayā dharmiṇaḥ sadasattvamanveṣayanti, na tu kāmacārataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1350: 'codako doṣahīnaḥ' ityapi kathanaṃ viparyayadoṣāṇuparipūrite paridhāvanamātrameva, anyatrābhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1351: ata eva sādhyadharmaṃ tadanukūladharmiṇaṃ cāvagantuṃ pakṣalakṣaṇavelāyāmeva yuktividbhirviśeṣeṇa 'svadharma' ityabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1352: evaṃ yastāvat svakāryāṇi yugapanna sādhayati, sa na bhavatyapratihatanityaikasvabhāvaḥ, vandhyāputravat /
