T04ksmadhlu:1359: hetvabhāvamātreṇa ca nasti svabhāvo 'pyasiddhaḥ, vastutāyā abhāve 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:1361: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati, na tu dharmāntarayukto
T04ksmadhlu:1362: dharmītyevaṃ nirdeśakāle sveṣṭapratyakṣānumānāptaprasiddhidvārā niṣedhamavidhāya svabhāvasyaiva tāvanniṣedhaḥ svadharmī bhavatītyatra pakṣadharmatāvasthāyāmācāryeṇa svadharmī kathita iti vārtikakāraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1363: tathāhiḥ sarvatra vādino dharmo yaḥ svasādhyatayepsitaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1367: vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ coktamḥ yathā parairanutpādyāpūrvarūpaṃ na khādikam /
T04ksmadhlu:1374: anyathā kramayaugapadyābhyāmabhivyaktena arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogena paraparikalpitaḥ padārthāḥ kathamiva niṣeddhuṃ śakṣyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1376: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato 'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva
T04ksmadhlu:1380: nāsti tat kṣaṇikaṃ vāpi saccāpi na hi vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1383: tairthikaiḥparikalpiteṣu dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyādiṣu niṣeddhumiṣyamāṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā naiva pravartsyante? yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā
T04ksmadhlu:1385: phalata ekāntenaiṣāmabhāvo vyavahāre kathaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, pramāṇāpekṣitātvāttasya /
T04ksmadhlu:1386: atha pramāṇameva prasaṅgasādhanamiti cettadā kimiva tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā na pravartante? yukttibalena āgantuśīleṣu doṣeṣu prekṣāvadbhiḥ svataḥ [svapakṣataḥ] siddhirnaiva yuktimatī atha bāhyārthādīn niṣeddhukāmānāṃ vidyata eva vastubhūto buddhilakṣaṇo dharmī, yatastenaiva bāhyārtheṣu pradhānādiṣu cotpattiniṣedhaḥ sādhayate, ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra
T04ksmadhlu:1387: na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo hetavastadā aprasiddhataddharmatvadharmiṇi abhīṣṭasādhyadharmaṃ sādhayiṣyantyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:1389: yadyevaṃ syāttadā cākṣuṣatvamapi śabdadharmaṇi kathamanityatvasādhane 'śaktam? yadi te tatprasiddhatvamabhyupagacchanti tadā bāhyapradhānādivat buddhireva śaktatvaikānekatvavyāptadharmaviyuktatvanniḥsvabhāvaiva tāvat
T04ksmadhlu:1393: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāttadā] tato bahyapradhānādayo na niḥsvabhāvāḥ setyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1394: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye 'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1396: bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva, ākārāntaratvāttasya /
T04ksmadhlu:1397: yadyasiddha eva saḥ, tadā parakalpitāḥ pradhānādayo 'santa eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1400: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1401: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati, yato hyanye [vādinaḥ] teṣu tayā utpattimattvābhāvadharmaṃ nābhyupayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1403: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī, tadādhāreṇa pradhānādīnāṃ niṣedhyamānatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1404: sa paramārthataḥ svabhāvavirahito 'pi bhrāntyā bāhyamiva pradhānādyabhinnamiva sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ ca sarvadharmasamavetamiva kalpayati /
T04ksmadhlu:1405: tatra pradhānādisvarūpaniṣedhe pradhānādisvarūpaniṣedhastāvat sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaḥ sidhyati, yato hi sa
T04ksmadhlu:1407: sa hi yadyapi [sarvathā] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva, tathāpi tadākāratayā buddhirityevamupacaryate vastuto 'yaṃ nāsti [kathamapi]
T04ksmadhlu:1409: ataḥ siddhe 'pi tasya niḥsvabhāvatve buddhiniḥ svabhāvatāyā nāsti prasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1410: yato hi bāhyapradhānādīnāṃ tāvanniṣedhastu pramāṇaiḥ sādhyate, na tu [kadācit] tattvaniṣedhāya hetavaḥ prayujyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1412: bāhyaśabdādayastabhinnāśca buddhistha upacāradharmiṇyevāśrayante, yato hi te deśakālādibhīnnāvasthāniyatā bāhyaśabdādayo vādiprativādināṃ buddhau svasvabhāvena naiva pratyakṣībhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1415: sarve vyavahārā buddhistha eva dharmiṇyāśritāḥ pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:1417: yadyevaṃ tadā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve parikalpitadharmiṇaṃ niḥśritya niṣedhādisiddhayartham āśrayāsiddhādidoṣāṇāmapravṛttavapi kāmaṃ balenāsmāsu apālambhāḥ kriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1418: yathā hi paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ bhavantaḥ pradhānādiniṣedhye parikalpitadharmiṇyeva sādhyasādhanādīn manasikurvanti, tathaiva vayamapi prasiddheṣu rūpaśabdādiṣu ye tāvat sadasadādisvabhāvā āropyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1420: tatra yathā āropite dharmiṇi vastutvāropaṇaniṣedhae 'pi vādiprativādiṣu pratībhāsamānatvād asadādidoṣā na pravartante, tathaiva rupādayo 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:1422: avabhāso hi tatkāraṇanivṛttyā jāyamānena satyasvabhāvena tāvannasti
T04ksmadhlu:1424: yadyevaṃ no cettadā sarve puruṣāstadarśinaḥ syuḥ, kevalasya tattvasyaivāvabhāsamānatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1425: yathaiva hi tasmin parikalpitadharmiṇi sāmarthyaśūnyatvavyāptyupanyāsena niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ prasādhya pradhānādayaḥ sādhyante, tathaivāsmābhirapi parikalpitavastuni tat [niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ] samyaktāa sādhayituṃ yathoktaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1427: prekṣāvadbhistu svīkaraṇaṃ vicārārham, bhāvātmakatāyā nirṇayasyāyuktatvāt, vicarāvasthāyāṃ tu nāstyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:1428: atatstannirṇayo na kṛtaḥ vicāro 'pi nirṇayārthaka eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1429: yataḥ pramāṇādvārā siddhāntanirṇayakāle ko 'pi siddhānto nābhyupagato bhavatītyatastasmin kāle kasmin āśrayāsiddhimukhena dharmyasiddhayādidoṣaḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1430: atha vādī pramāṇaistattvanirṇayaṃ kṛtvā parebhyastatpratipādayituṃ pravṛtaḥ, ataḥ sa siddhāntābhyupagamāt
T04ksmadhlu:1433: pūrvata eva siddhāntamanabhyupagacchanto vādinaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇatastattvajñānaṃ kurvanti, taireva cāparānapi bodhayantīti kathaṃ siddhanto 'bhyupagataḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1434: pūrvaṃ svayaṃ pramāṇaistattvaściyaṃ kṛvā siddhāntena aparebhyo 'vabodhanamapi nāsti siddham
T04ksmadhlu:1437: ataḥ svamirṇayavad aparebhyo 'pi nirdeśasamaye tādavasthyāt sarvatra pramāṇaireva tattvanirṇayaḥ kriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1439: ata eva kathaṃ tena dharmiṇastāvadasiddhādayaḥ pratīpādyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1441: tebhyo doṣā jāyante' iti ye vadanti kiṃ teṣāṃ yuktyantaramiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1444: yathā bauddheṣu śabdādayo bhautikā ityabhyupagamyante, na tathā vaiśeṣikādiṣu,
T04ksmadhlu:1446: yadi tathāvidho dharmi siddho na syāttadā na ko 'pi kutrāpi tatsādhanārthaṃ pratvarteta /
T04ksmadhlu:1447: yadi tathāvidho siddhastadā taddharmoṃ 'pi ubhayasammataḥ siddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1449: ata eva sarve tattvajijñāsavaḥ siddhāntaviśeṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamapahāya āgopālaprasiddhameva tamāśritya sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaṃ cintanaṃ parivardhayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1453: [7] "yatkhalu paraprasiddhapramāṇaiḥ svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyaḥ" iti yaducyate tad dūṣaṇameva tāvanna bhavati, anabhyupagamāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1454: ato vyavahāre vayam ubhayasiddhairhetvādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayāma ityevaṃ paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1455: [8] "sarve dharmā viviktāḥ, na kenāpi samyagliṅgenāliṅgitā atiparokṣatvād"
T04ksmadhlu:1456: iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tāvannaiva yujyate, siddhe 'pi sādhyarmiṇi sādhyadharmasamyagliṅgayoḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1458: tathāpi katipayeṣu dharmisu sa siddhaḥ, katipayeṣu ca sandigdha iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1459: ataḥ avinābhāvaniyamanirdeśena sāmānyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmaṃ sādhayeyuriti kathanaṃ yujyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1460: tadvadatrāpi māyāmaricisvapnagandharvanagarādisadṛśeṣu katipayeṣveva dharmiṣu sa sidhyatītyataḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvād ekānekasvabhāvādidharmeṣu vyāptiḥ siddhaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:1461: api ca, asmābhiranyatra savivādeṣu rupādiṣu vyāptidharmopadarśanena sādhitatvānnāsti doṣa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1462: [9-10] ye kecana - "kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ naiva sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti sādhayituṃ śakyante, vastusādhanatvāttayoḥ" iti yat kathayanti, tadapi naiva yujyate, paramārthato bhāvasvabhāvasādhanāvetāviti kutrāpyanullikhitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1463: yadā sādhanasvarupāntaḥpraviṣṭatvādimau vastusādhanāvityucyete tadā niḥsvabhāvatāyāmapi prayogaviśeṣavaśena sādhanasvabhāvāveva /
T04ksmadhlu:1464: atastatsādhyāmānāyāṃ kathaṃ na tau [hetū] sambhavataḥ? svabhāvahetureva kāryādihetubhyaḥ prayogabhedena vividhākāreṣu prapañcitaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1465: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ "pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ" iti sāmānyena hetulakṣaṇaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1470: tatra sarve dharmā paramārthato 'nutpannā niḥsvabhāvāśca, tathāpi imau dvāvapi teṣu vyavahārasatyatvena vidyete eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1472: "kevalaṃ samyak kāryamātreṇa svabhāvamātreṇa vā hetunā bhavitavyam" iti yaduktam, tasyāpi kimapi kāraṇaṃ nāsti, yato hi pratibimbaphalamapyunumānameva svahetutayālambanīkaroti /
T04ksmadhlu:1474: pratibimbo hi tāvadanyadekaṃ rūpam" iti yaduktam, tadapi na yucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1479: yadyapi pratibimbādaya ādarśadyāśrayāśritā bhavanti, tathāpi yadi viṣayākārādibhedānurūpatayā ālambyeran, tadā tadrūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1484: [ākāraḥ] vijñāsvabhāvena vastusan' idi yaduktaṃ tadapi na yuktiyuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1485: yato hi amūrtaṃ nīlādivijñānaṃ niraṃśatayā sthitaṃ vividhākārarahitameva bhavatītyucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1486: pratibimbavastu tadvilakṣaṇatayā pratibhāsata ityataḥ kathaṃ sa [ākāraḥ] tatsvabhāvena san syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1487: yathoktaṃ bhavatāpi triṃśikāyāṃ pudgalaniḥsvabhāvataṃ pratipādayatā yad yo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa sarvathā nithyaiva, vandhyāputrādivat /
T04ksmadhlu:1489: tathaivānye 'pi paraparikalpitadharmā naivālambitā bhavantīti kathaṃ nocyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1490: yathācāryairnirdiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsādhanāyāṃ vyāpyānupalabdhikṣaṇā dharmāḥ kathaṃ noktāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1495: [11-12] viruddhopalabdhyādayo 'sambhavā iti yaduktaṃ tā atyasambaddhā eveti /
T04ksmadhlu:1496: yato hi sarve dharmā viviktāḥ katipaye ca sahaviruddhā iti na
T04ksmadhlu:1497: sidhyanti, tathāpi māyākhapuṣpādayaśca sāmānyatayā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sahaviruddhāśceti sidhyantyeva
T04ksmadhlu:1498: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā katham bhavadbhiḥ paraparikalpitā īśvarādayo niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1499: ataḥ sāmānyena niḥsvabhāvatāmātreṇa yadi vyavahāre viruddhādayaḥ sidhyanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1500: paramārthataḥ sattvābhyupagame virusśādharmādīnupadarśaya niḥsvabhāvatvena teṣāṃ samyak sādhanāt kimatra tāvad virodha /
T04ksmadhlu:1501: tadviruddhādīnāṃ vastutāyāṃ prasaṅgo na yuktarūpaḥ, yato hi paramārthato niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhūtarupābhivyaktistu, kutrāpi samyagbhāvasvabhāve notpatiṣṭhati /
T04ksmadhlu:1503: ato yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥsahānavasthānaviruddhāśca sidhyantyatastadviruddheṣu vastutāprasaṅga iti na vaktavyam, viruddhādīnāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1505: evameva dīpakādau adṛḍhalakṣaṇe vastuni paricchinne sati dṛḍhākāraviviktataiva tāvat paricchidyate, yato na vyavahāre vyavacchedaḥ, ataḥparicchedānupapattireva tatra /
T04ksmadhlu:1506: yo yathā parichidyate, yatra ca tathā paricchedo nāsti, sa abhāva eva tāavat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo viradho vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1510: prasiddhe 'pi tasmin virodhe dīpakādayo hi vasturupeṇātyantamanupapannāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1511: māyādimithyāvastuṣvapi jātivināśayoravabhāsamānatvāt ata eva ācāryaiḥ paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ yathā dīpakādiṣu nityānityādivirodho 'vabhāsate,
T04ksmadhlu:1513: dīpakādayo bāhyārthatvena vijñānarūpatvena vā paramārthato 'siddhāḥ, ubhayoḥ svabhāvayostaireva nirākṛtatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1514: paramārthavastusvabhāvena sahānavasthānalakṣaṇavirodhasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ paramārthavastusvabhāve na kathañcit pravartate, arvāgdarśināṃ darśanamārge 'pravṛtatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1515: sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhastāvat sāṃvṛtika eva, vastūnāṃ svayameva vinaśyamānatvānnānyakāraṇaiḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1516: yadi pratyayāntarairvināśa iti tadā na vināśahetubhistatra kimapyupakriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1519: yadyavastutvād vināśasya tattvena anyatvena vā tasya vijñaptirna yujyata iti cintyate tadā ātyantikatayā sa vināśakāraṇairna kriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1521: ato 'kiñcitkarā agnyādayo hi kathaṃ nāma paramārthato viruddhāḥ setsyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1522: tathāpyagnyādayaḥ śītādīn kramaśo niḥsāmarthalakṣaṇān anityān prakarṣatamān utpādayantyata eva te hyagnyādayo viruddhā iti kevalaṃ vyavahriyanta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1523: ata ācāryairvirodhanayo 'yamityukto na tu virodha evetyuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1524: ataśca virodho 'yaṃ vyavahāramātrāśrita evokto na tu paramārthāśritaḥ agniśītādayaśca na paramārthato bāhyārthasvabhāvāḥ sidhyanti, teṣāṃ tāvajjñānākārasvabhāvo 'pi ca kalpita eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1526: anekāni sajātīyavijñānāni yugapannaiva sambhavanti, ataḥ śītādayaḥ svapnādinmithyāvabhāsa eva, ato nāsti teṣu paramārthato virodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1532: tathāpyukṣitatattvarthā vidvāṃso gajāvalokanamiva svapnadṛṣṭakhadirādivividhamithyāviṣayāṇāmanubhūtivad vṛkṣādivastūnāṃ mṛṣātvamevāśritya tathatāyāṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ paramārthānukūlatayā vyāpyavyāpakādivyavasthāṃ kurvate /
T04ksmadhlu:1533: tathaiva bījāṅkurādīni kāraṇakāryādīnyapi saṃvṛtyāśrayeṇaiva vyavahriyante, na tu paramārthasattayā, bījādīnāṃ paramārthato 'siddhatvād bitathānāmapi svapnādīnāṃ tathaivāvabhāsamānatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:1535: atastāni vyāvahārikeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvena vastusvabhāvatvena vyāptāni bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1536: kintu tāvatā tāni paramārthasvabhāvatayā na samavatiṣṭhante /
T04ksmadhlu:1537: yato hi vyāpake vidyamāne 'pi sati vyāpyasya siddhirna niyatā /
T04ksmadhlu:1538: tathāpi vastusvabhāvatvena suvyāptāni kāryakāranavastūni yadi nivatante, tadā māyādivat paramārthataḥ parikalpito vastusvabhāva eva nivartate /
T04ksmadhlu:1541: tairthikaparikalpitatāni pramāṇādīnī tathātāyā ananukūlatvāt parītyājyānītī sanyakpramāṇalakṣaṇapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇayanaṃ kṛtamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1542: itthaṃ katipaye tairthikāḥ piṇḍātmādikaṃ mithyāvastutattvaṃ sisādhayiṣayā sarvajñatāvirāgitākarmaphalasambandhādīnāṃ sāṃvṛtikīṃ vyavasthāṃ nirākartuṃ pramāṇānāṃ viparītalakṣaṇāni kurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1543: ataḥ sudhiyastāvattanniṣidhya pudgaladharmanairātmyatathatāyāṃ praveśānukūlāṃ sāṃvṛtikīṃ karmaphalasambandhādivyāvasthāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ viśuddhāni pramāṇalakṣaṇāni viracitavantaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1546: ato virodhādivyavahārāṇāṃ svīkṛtiātreṇa yo hi bhāvasvabhāvābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ, sa tāvadanaikāntika eva, tadabhyupagame
T04ksmadhlu:1548: [20] nanvevamanumānena saha sambandhaprasidhyarthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate tadā vastunastāvat siddhireva,
T04ksmadhlu:1550: abhrāntajñānenādhyavasitaḥ khalu vastusvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nāmānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate? yadi nirakriyate tadā pratyakṣameva tāvad bādhitaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1552: yadi tad bādhitaṃ syāttadānumānameva tāvanna syāt sisthitam /
T04ksmadhlu:1553: pratyakṣasambaddhenāpyunumānena pratyakṣaṃ bādhyata iti kathanato naivācitamanyat /
T04ksmadhlu:1555: prāpyasya prāptyā susthita eva tāvad vastuvādīti kathanamapi samyaṅnirākṛtameveti /
T04ksmadhlu:1557: tatra yaddhi sādharaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat paramārthamadhikṛtya nāstyabhrāntam /
T04ksmadhlu:1558: anyathā sarvaṃ yogipratyakṣameva syānna ca syuḥ kecanāpyarvāgdarśinaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1559: yogipratyakṣātiriktaṃ sāmānya pratyakṣaṃ yadyapi [abhrāntaṃ] nāsti tathāpi vyavahāre svapnādivad yathāprasiddhenārthena sahāvisaṃvādāttadabhrāntamucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1562: kevalaṃ bhagavata eva pratyakṣaṃ sarvākāratattvagocaram, atastadeva tāvadaviparītamavisaṃvādakam phalato yadeva sarvākāratattvamadhikṛtyābhrāntaṃ tadeva sarvākāratattvāvisaṃvādād yathārthamabhrāntamiti
T04ksmadhlu:1563: ata eva bhagavadbhireva tāvat sarvadharmalakṣaṇarahitatā parijñātā /
T04ksmadhlu:1570: sa yadā bālairvastutaḥ paramārthatveropyate, tadā sa anumānabādhito bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:1577: arvāgdarśinastāvadanumānena pratyakṣasambaddhatve 'pi na paramārthatvaprāptā bhavanti, apitu kevalaṃ saṃvṛtāveva [tiṣṭhanti] /
T04ksmadhlu:1578: yato hi arvāgdarśibhirvāstavikaḥ paramārśasvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣatayā pṛthak pṛthak nānubhūyate
T04ksmadhlu:1579: ato naiva vastusvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtimapi bādhate kintu yo hi tatra satyākāratvāropastannirākṛtireva sādhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1580: phalano vastuvādino arthābhāve 'pi arthābhiniveśinaste kathaṃ susthitā iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1581: ekato 'numānaṃ vyavahāreṇa pratyakṣasambaddhaṃ sat sthitiṃ pratnoti,
T04ksmadhlu:1582: aparataśca pratyakṣaṃ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajatitāgniriva tadbādhāṃ karotīti bādhitameva taditi cennaitāvatāsmāsvaniṣṭāpattiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:1583: yathā sarve jāgatikadharmā yathāvatpravicayāgnerindhanāni bhavanti, sa ca mithyendhanāni bhasmīkṛtya svayamapyupaśāntaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1587: tān yathāvatyravicayya jvālairdagdhvopaśāmyati // ato yadi tattvajñānamutyadyate tadānumānalakṣṇā kalpanā nivṛttā satī nirāśrayāpi nānabhyupagatā [bhavatī] /
T04ksmadhlu:1588: ata eva bhagavatā ratnakūṭe savikalpāpi sampratyavekṣaṇā nirvikalpajñānaphalotpatteḥ kāraṇamiti [matvā] mahāphalābhinirvṛttaye kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajanitāgnerdṛṣṭāntena nirdiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:1589: [21] api ca, sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane yadyeko hetubhūto dharmo nīrdiśyate tadā nivṛtisādhakaḥ sa dharmo viruddho jāyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1590: [22] yadyasan sa dharmastadā asato 'bhāvenāsambaddhatvāt kathaṃ hi sa
T04ksmadhlu:1595: yato hyanena tāvat sadasadubhayadharmāṇāṃ paramārthatvasādhane hetorasambhavatvavocyate yuktijñaiḥ na tu niḥsvabhāvatādisāmānyadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasādhane
T04ksmadhlu:1596: [sambhavatvamiti], yadi tathaiva syāttadā paraparikalpitānāmīśvarādīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane kathaṃ nāma te sarve codyā nābatariṣyantītī?
T04ksmadhlu:1597: tad yathā īśvarādiṣu sāmarthyavyāpyavastutvaniṣedhārthaṃ vastusvabhāve samāropaṃ ca nisedhārthaṃ asaddharmā na bhavantyasambaddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1598: evameva paramārthataḥ kāryakārāṇādivastudharmeṣu vyāpakaniṣedhena samāropaniṣedhaṃ sādhayituṃ kathaṃ nāsmāsu sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1599: anyathā praśānādayo 'śakyaniṣedhābhaveyuḥ, yato hi vastusati svabhāve na tathā kartuṃ śakyate yadi asatā asambaddhatayā asāmarthaṃ tadā kutra sāmarthyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1600: paramarthato 'sadvastuni na bhavati kaścana sambandho nāma /
T04ksmadhlu:1602: yathā sadvastuni dharmadharmibhāvādisarvāṇi vastujātāni kalpitānīti vyavasthāpyante tathā asadvastunyapi kathaṃ tāni naiva vyavasthāpyante?
T04ksmadhlu:1603: api ca, yadā ko 'pi kadācidapi svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvatvena paramārthato naiva sidhyati, tadā vastulakṣaṇasya tathābhūtatvāt tadabhāvo 'pyasiddha
T04ksmadhlu:1605: atasteṣāṃ prativādo vā parīkṣaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ yujyeta, sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyādivat sadasadubhayadharmātītatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1606: sattvasya tadabhāvasya cāpi hetorānukūlyena vādiprativādinoryathāprasiddhatvena te prasiddhayavinābhūtā evoktāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1607: atasteṣu dharmadharmitvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryatvādīni ca yathā ābhāsante tathaiva sarvā api vyavasthā aviruddhā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1608: kaiścid vidvadbhiryadi darśanasyāsya dharmadharmiviruddhādyādhāreṇa prativādaḥ kriyate tadā tatra paramārthavyavahāranayānavabodha eva kāranaṃ bhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1611: [24] tadapi na śabdamātreṇa sidhyatīti yaduktaṃ tanna
T04ksmadhlu:1614: [25] na ca prasaṅgamātreṇa, api tu samyakprāmāṇenaiveti /
T04ksmadhlu:1615: ityevaṃ yadi vastuṣu paramārthasvabhāva eko bhavati tadā prakāradvayameva tatra bhavet hetupratyayāpekṣitatvāt sarveṣām, utpadyamānasvabhāvatayā anityatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:1616: yathātra sautrāntikayogācārāṇāmaikamatyam, svabhāvena siddhatvādāśritantarbhūtaṃ vā tairthikaparikalpātmādivat
T04ksmadhlu:1621: yadi pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā tatra sādhakapramāṇaṃ tadā vastusvabhāva eva pūrvaṃ tāvadubhābhyāṃ na siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1622: sa tu[vastusvabhāvaḥ] tadaiva syāt, kintu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tāvat pratyakṣeṇa na paramārthataḥ siddhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1623: so 'pi tāvadindriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa vā sidhyati, yato hi nārvāgdarśino
T04ksmadhlu:1624: mānasapratyakṣaṃ vyavaharanti, nāpi ca tanmānasapratyakṣaṃ kutrāpi sidhyatīti tatrāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate
T04ksmadhlu:1625: tatra kecidindriyapramāṇena na sidhyatīti bruvate, pṛthagarthaviṣayitvena
T04ksmadhlu:1626: nirdiṣṭatvāttasya, kintu kāryakāranabhūtasya tasyānyārthasya paramārthato jñānagrāhyatvaṃ naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1627: vijñāne svapratibhāsa iva yo hi jñānetarasvabhāvo 'nyāvabhāsaḥ [pratīyate], sa naiva [jñānād] anyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1629: atastadākāreṇa jñānenānyasya pratītiriti yaducyate, tadapi nopapadyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1630: yadyevaṃ tadā ghaṭādayaḥ, ye 'nyaprakārānanuvidhāya prādurbhavanti, te 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:1632: yo 'pi tadākārastajjñānākārameveti viśeṣābhidhāne satyapi vijñānasadṛśyenaivānyāvabodhaḥ saṃjāyate, na ghaṭamātrādinetyevaṃ viśeṣo nāsti /
T04ksmadhlu:1634: yadi nāsti viśeṣastadārthakriyārthinaḥ svato vastvanudhānena samprayujyate, tathāpi pratiniyatārthakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kutrāpi na sidhyati, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1635: nāṭayacandramalladarśanavad yugapadanekadarśanena tadvijñāneṣvapi parasparasāmyaṃ syāt, jñānasvabhāvasāmyena ca teṣāmapi parasparaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:1637: anyārthasya pratyakṣatvena pratyatirasambhavaiva, yato hi abhyupagamamātreṇopacaritatvād viśeṣo na prasidhyatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1638: anayacca, anyārtho yadi pratyakṣatvena prasidhyati tadā jñānaviśeṣastāvattatsadṛśastadudbhūto vā sādhanīyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1639: kathaṃ jñānenānyārtho gṛhyata ityevaṃ vicāryamāṇe 'nyārtho yadi pratyakṣato 'siddhastadā kathaṃ tāvadasiddhena svabhāvabiśeṣeṇa siddhā mārgaviśeṣāḥ setsyanta iti yāvat /
T04ksmadhlu:1640: tadvijñānakṣaṇikatvasyāpi samanantarapratyayārthānubalenopapannatvād yathā jñānāni pūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣatayā samudbhavanti tathā janmāntarāṇyapi sambhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1643: svasiddhāntānusāraṃ ca yathā taddarśanopacāraṃ kurvanti tathā pratyakṣatayāvabhāso nāstyeva
T04ksmadhlu:1648: ariṣṭanīlākṣapītākṣatimirādyapahatanetreṣu dūrasamīpasthita ekasminnapi vastuni vibhinnāni viṣamākārāṇi jñānānyutpadyante, ato bāhyāvayaviviṣayakaṃ kalpanājālaṃ citte nāstyeva vidyamānam, tathātve tasya pṛthaggrahaṇaprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1653: nīlādyābhāsijñānānāṃ pṛthaganubhavo bhrānta evaṃ, na cākāravaśena arthāntaragrahaṇavyavasthā yuktimatī /
T04ksmadhlu:1654: ye khalu paramāṇvātmakalīādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamāmanvate teṣvapi tāvat
T04ksmadhlu:1659: na samavāyibhinnaḥ samavāyaḥ samasti, nāpi samavāyakalpanayā tadupacāraḥ sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:1660: yadi sañcitānekavastugrahaṇāt sthūleṣu bhrāntirupajāyate, tadā tadānīntanajñānasya aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ, bhrāntatvāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1665: yasthūle bhrāntaṃ tattathāgrahaṇataḥ pūrvamapi na [abhrāntaṃ] sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:1667: purataḥ pramāṇairyadi pramāṇyaṃ sidhyati tadā yā sthule bhrāntiḥ sā grahaṇapūrvikaivaikā sidhyati, yadi na tathā sidhyati tadā sā bhrāntirgṛhītetyeva na sambhavati
T04ksmadhlu:1668: / svapnādiṣvanyapramāṇāni na gṛhyante, tathāpi sthūle bhrāntistu [tatra]
T04ksmadhlu:1671: tatra dūrādūrabhedena spaṣṭāṣpaṣṭāvabhāsabhedo 'pi naiva bhavati, tasyaikavastutvena tatra tādṛśākārā naiva sambhavantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1672: api ca, yādyākārā yāthātathyenābhyupagamyante tadā yathā vividhānāṃ rekhādīnāṃ vistārastathā jñānākārāṇāmapi ākāravat pṛthaktvam prasajyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:1673: siddhāntavaividhyasthāpanārtham anekajñānānāmutpādamavagacchato vijñānasya viṣayeṣu yathā prasārastathābhāso 'sambhāva eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1685: api ca, yadi jñānasādṛśayaṃ sarvātmanā bhavati, tadā arthānusāriṇo 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:1689: yadi viparyaye hyupacārat karturekadeśa eva tadā sarvatra vastusādṛśyasambhāvanayā sarvajñātṛtvaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1693: tatsādṛśyate 'pi na tatpratyakṣatvena grahaṇaṃ yujyate, viṣayasya hetutve tadanubhavakāle sāmīpyābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1697: yadi sa eva [anubhavaḥ] tadarthākārānubhavatvena gṛhyata iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1707: atyantaparokṣatvādarthāntarāṇāṃ te [arthāntarāḥ] tadīyajñānākāravantaḥ santīti naiva sidhyati
T04ksmadhlu:1709: nāma, svakīyavijñānānāṃ cakṣurādidvārā bhrāntatvāt, śabdādijñānāntaraṃ cakṣurvijñānotpādena śabdādyābhāsicakṣurvijñānotpādasambhavācca /
T04ksmadhlu:1712: tadā yadi sāmīpyād vijñānenārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate tadā sarvāṇyapi vijñānāni sarvasamīpaviṣayakāṇi syuḥ sarveṣu tatsattāyā bhedābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1715: tataśca 'idaṃ nīlaṃ pītamidam' iti vibhāgo naiva syāt, kasyacanāpi vibhāgaviśesyānabhyupagamāt
T04ksmadhlu:1717: kalpanāsvarūpamātre jñānābhinnātmake sādṛśyātiriktatayā na kaścanāpi bhedo
T04ksmadhlu:1719: sāmīpyavaśājjñānasya yadi nārthāntarādanubhavastadā kathamiti praśne tadutpattyaiveti vaktavyaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1726: viṣayatvābhāvādevendriyaṃ na gṛhyata iti cennaitāvatā tadaviṣāyatvam ,
T04ksmadhlu:1729: ataḥ aviṣayatvānnāsti tadviṣaya iti kathamiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1730: tadevaṃ nirākāreṇa tāvajjñānena nārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ yujyate, nāpi tadanyena sākāreṇa [jñānena], vyavasthāyā evābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1733: yasmādarthāntaragrāhaka ākārāntaro 'pi nāsti, tasmāt kāryakāraṇātmako 'pi nākārāntaraḥ sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1738: iti yaduktaṃ tadapyasiddham sākārabuddhayā arthāntaraparicchedābhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniśrcāyakapramāṇābhāve, sati jñānadvayābhāvakathane nāsti
T04ksmadhlu:1739: kimapi bādhakam, anayā tāvad yuktyā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cittamātratākāyapramukhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1741: tadapi ca kāryakāraṇabhūtamevetiḥ, kāryakāranabhāvastu pratyakṣasiddha iti
T04ksmadhlu:1742: cennaiva tad yuktimat, yathā tathatā tathānubhavābhāvād, yathā cānubhavastathā tathātāyā abhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1743: evaṃ yadi vijñānasya grāhyagrāhakākārarahitatve 'pi tasya vastusattvamabhyupagamyate tadā
T04ksmadhlu:1745: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarvasyaiva tathatādarśanaṃ syāditi
T04ksmadhlu:1746: / tajjñānamapi yathānubhūyate na tathā sthitaṃ bhavati, ekasmin svarūpadvayavirodhāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1747: yadi bhrāntatvāt tattathā jñānamiti cet? kā nāma bhrāntiḥ? yadi jñānaṃ tadā naiva sā pratyakṣam,
T04ksmadhlu:1753: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāsvabhāvaṃ tadā na tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayakam, kalpanāyāḥ samānyalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1754: api ca, yaḥ kalpanāsvabhāva ucyate, tena svatastadātmano 'bhivyaktirucyate, grāhyagrāhakākāro 'pi svata evābhivyajyate, ataḥ kalpanāsvabhāva evaiṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1755: yadi sa [grāhyagrāhakākāraḥ] mithyā tadā tadabhinnaḥ kalpanāsvabhāvo 'pi tathaiva mithyā, tathātve kathaṃ sa
T04ksmadhlu:1757: yadi viśeṣo [viśeṣyaḥ] mithyā tadā kalpanāsvabhāvasya sāmānyasya vastutā asambhavinī, anyavyavacchedena sāmānyaṃ viśeṣeṣu vyavahriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1758: tadevaṃ tattvajñānasya yathāvadanubhavābhāvānnaiva tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam
T04ksmadhlu:1762: apekṣāviśeṣeṇa tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ parikalpyeta tathāpyarthāntaratvādapekṣāyāḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣābhāve sā naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1763: phalatastadapekṣayā vyavasthitasya tatsvabhāvasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na yuktiyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:1764: kāryātmakasya kāraṇātmakasya ca svabhāvasya arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñānamapi bhinnaṃ bhinnam, ato hyekasmin jñāne
T04ksmadhlu:1766: yadyekasmin jñāne nānubhavastadā na kenāpi sambandhagrahaṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:1767: ekajñānāvabhāse 'pi 'idaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cedam' iti pratyakṣe na
T04ksmadhlu:1769: sambandhagrahaṇābhāve naiva tāvat kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇ, anyathā hyatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1770: tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayākarṣiṇā jñānenāpi paramārthatastad dvayaṃ naiva yujyate, tena tadanubhavasyābhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1771: anyānubhavasyānyena niścayo 'pi naiva śakyate kartum, atiprasaṅgādeva /
T04ksmadhlu:1772: ekasantāne ekānubhavasya prajñaptirapi naiva yuktimatī, ekasantāne prajñaptasya vastūno hyasattvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1774: niścāyakajñānakāle tāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ cāpyatītam, ataḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇāpi na kāryakāraṇābhāvaḥ prasidhyatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1775: yadi pratyakṣeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvo nānubhūyate kathaṃ tadā smṛtisvabhāvo
T04ksmadhlu:1777: na ca paramārthatastatsvabhāve 'rthāntarānubhavaḥ sidhyati, yathoktaṃ prāk /
T04ksmadhlu:1786: api ca, kāryahetunāpi sa vastutvena sādhayituṃ na śakyate, anyo
T04ksmadhlu:1793: dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvapi paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye nāstyeva kutrāpi hetovyārptiḥ, sarvatra viruddhatvāt tulyaparīkṣaṇīyatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:1794: yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī'tyucyate, tadāpyetad bhrāntameva /
T04ksmadhlu:1795: taddhetukāle cāśeṣajagato vidyamānatvād 'asmin satī'ti tasya kāraṇatā naiva sarvathā sambhāvyate
T04ksmadhlu:1799: kasyāpi kāryakṣaṇasya sattvaṃ kasyāpi karaṇakṣaṇasattvād yadi kalpyate tadā tatsamakālaṃ sarvasattvāntargaśeṣavidyamānakṣaṇānāmapi sattvaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1800: yathā tatsvahetukṣaṇā vidyamānāḥ, yadi dṛśyante, na vidyamānā yadi na
T04ksmadhlu:1802: vidyamānā yadi dṛśyante, na vidyamānā yadi na dṛśyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1803: evaṃ sati teṣāṃ kathaṃ na hetutvam /
T04ksmadhlu:1804: api ca, 'yadasti tat sat' ityuktau tacchabdena yadyanyo hetubhūto dharmītyevaṃ gṛhyate tadā so 'pi paramārthataḥ pratyakṣe naiva
T04ksmadhlu:1806: nānumānenāpi dharminaḥ sattvasiddhiḥ sambhāvyate, sarveṣāmapi sattvasādhakānāṃ hetūnāṃ doṣatrayānatikrāntatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1807: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā sato dharmasya hetutvaṃ naiva sambhavi nāpi cāsato dharmasya yaktam, viruddhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1811: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadāparasyāpi sattvaṃ naiva sidhyati, tadapekṣitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1816: tatrāpyunupalabdhiśabdastāvat taditarasya upalabdhātmakapratyakṣasyābhiprāyeṇa prajujyate, nānumānamabhipretya yathā tadapramāṇaṃ tathoktatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1817: api ca, yā khalu upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā
T04ksmadhlu:1818: samupalabdhiphalā, īdṛśonānvayena yā karyakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ tatrāpi paramārthataḥ sandehaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1819: kiṃ tattvataḥ sadityataḥ sat atavā adṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ samīpavartitvāt athavā dūredeśasthitasya vastvantarasya samīpavartino balādevaṃvidhaḥ samdehaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1820: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhyā deśāntarāt tadāgamanasya pūrvato vā tatsattvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate, nānyaphalasyeti /
T04ksmadhlu:1821: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1823: ye cānye tatsamarthahetavaḥ teṣāṃ nivṛttau tatphalasyāpi nivṛttau vyatirekena yā tatsiddhiruktā, sāpi paramārthato naiva sandehavigatā, piśācādīnāṃ dūradeśasthitānāmapyanyeṣāṃ sattve 'pi tadasattvasandehāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1825: sambhavati, yathā mātṛvivāhasaṃskāravati deśe janmādānam yatra ca nāsti mātṛvivāhastatrāsat
T04ksmadhlu:1826: tatsamarthakāraṇāntarāṇi santītyevaṃ viśeṣābhāvānna syāt sandeha iti cet? na, teṣāṃ sāmārthyaviśesyāsiddhatvāt,
T04ksmadhlu:1828: kāryakāraṇayoḥ sandehe sati tannaiyatyārthaṃ yadyapi tatkāraṇaṃ samarthaṃ tathāpi prajñākṣetre viśeṣatastadasiddhivacanāni kathaṃ vidvadbhirnirākriyantām /
T04ksmadhlu:1829: anvayavyatirekau vyatīricya vastuni tatsiddhiniścāyakahetūnāmabhāvāt tatrānavasthādoṣaḥ syāt
T04ksmadhlu:1830: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate, kintu sahakārivastūnāṃ pṛthaksvabhāva iva anyebhyastadutpattyāśaṅkā kathaṃ nivarteta /
T04ksmadhlu:1832: nārvagdarśināṃ parebhya utpattiniścayasya spaṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1833: yadi parebhyo 'pi tadutpattistadā na bhaved hetubhedād bheda iti cet? na,
T04ksmadhlu:1835: / yadi pṛthak tadviśeṣeṣveva te sahakāripratyayā upayujyante, na tu kāryamātre iti cet? na, paramārthato viśeṣāṇāmapṛthaktvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1836: yadi tadaṃśenāpi [kāryāṇi] utpādyānīti cet? na, naikasmin aṃśabhedaḥ sambhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1837: yadi viśeṣasya pṛthagviśeṣe upacaryamāṇatvāt sa tattvānyatvābhyāṃ cintayituṃ na yujyata iti vyāharanto naiva viśeṣān vyāharanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1838: prājñaptikasya kadācidapi hetāvayujyamānatvāt samūhamātreṇaiva tāvadutpattirvibhaktiścāpi vidhīyate, na tvekaikeneti cet, tadapi naiva yujyate, na ca kāyaṃ vyatiricya samūho bhavati ataḥ ekaikaḥ samūha eva hetutvenābhyupagamyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1839: phalataḥ paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam, kāryakāraṇabhāvasya sāṃvṛtikatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1840: ata ācāryaiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yathāprasiddhi siddha ityuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1842: ityevaṃ paramārthato 'nityasvabhāvam sādhayituṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam, paraparikalpitaśabdānāmapramāṇatvāt, pramāṇasya caitatpramāṇadvayasaṃgṛhitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1843: nityasvabhāvamapi tāvat paramārthataḥ sādhayituṃ nāsti pramāṇam, pratyakṣeṇaivaṃ tāvattadasiddhatvāt,
T04ksmadhlu:1845: ātmādinityavastūnyapi yathā svasiddhanteṣu vijñapyante tathā pratyakṣajñāne naivāvabhāsante
T04ksmadhlu:1849: yujyate, anādheyātiśayatvād apekṣāyā ayogāt, ahetukānāṃ ca viṣayatvānupapannatvat /
T04ksmadhlu:1851: tasya [vijñānasya] vijñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇāt saḥ [vijñeyaḥ] api tad [vijñānaṃ] anusarati, anyathā tena jñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇamapi na kṛtaṃ syāt, tadvijñeyasya tadapekṣitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1852: nānumānenāpi tat sidhyati, kenāpi hetunā saha tasyāsambaddhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1857: ata ātmādīnāṃ sukhādiphalena saha kutrāpyanvayo na sidhyati avikalakāraṇatvena na tataḥ kādācitkasukhotpatiriti
T04ksmadhlu:1862: ye tāvad rupādayaḥ prasiddhadharmiṇaste 'pi paramārthato 'siddhā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1864: anupalabdhyāpi tāvannaiva tatsattvasiddhiḥ pratiṣedhasiddhau samarthatvāt pratiṣedhamātraṃ sā sādhayatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1869: phalataḥ vastusvabhāvaparīkṣaṇārthaṃ nāsti kimapi sādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1870: ataḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ paramārthataḥ sattvena sa naiva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1871: tatra tāvadayaṃ payogaḥ - yasya paramārthaḥ sādhane nasti kimapi pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:1872: kalpanānirmitatvāttasya tathaiva samyaktāyā grahaṇaṃ naiva karttavyam,
T04ksmadhlu:1874: uparyuktayorubhayoḥ samyaksvabhāvayoḥ prasiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:1875: vyāpakānupalabdhestāvat pratiṣedhamātraphalatvāt, prekṣāvatāṃ sadvyavahārasya ca pramāṇavyāptatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1876: nāsti hetorasiddhatvamiti yaduktaṃ tat pūrvaṃ vistareṇa vicāritam /
T04ksmadhlu:1879: sadasadvyavahārayoḥ pramāṇavyāptatvābhyupagatatve bhāvasiddhireva [nūnaṃ] syāt, tādṛśasya khalu vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya
T04ksmadhlu:1882: yat sat tat kathamasaditi tannivṛttyā vyatirekī bhavituṃ śaknoti, sambandhābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1884: yadi sa svīkriyate tadā kvacittadeva saditi sadavyavahārapramāṇaṃ yat yat sattānuvidhāne prasiddhaṃ tadevāsmākaṃ vastuni prasiddhamiti cet? tannaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1885: evaṃ sadvyavahārapramāṇavyāptamapi pramāṇamātreṇa paramārthatayā naiyatyena sadviṣayitvena naiva setsyati, vyāpakasaṃnidhānena vyāpyaviśeṣaniścayasya karttumaśakyatvād anyatrāpi sambhavācca anyathā vṛkṣeṇāpi śiṃśapādiviśeṣā niścayeṇa jñāsyanta iti, kimatenāsti pratikūlam?
T04ksmadhlu:1886: evaṃ tāvad vṛkṣastvaśeṣaviśeṣasādhāraṇatvānna tena devalādiviśeṣā nirṇetuṃ śakyāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1887: pramāṇaṃ hi naiva tāvad bhāvātikrānte 'parasminnapi sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:1889: sarvapramāṇāni bhāvābhivyañjakāni tadvyāptapramāṇabalabhāvivyavahārapravartakānyapi pramāṇāvajñātavastumātre pravṛttatvād vṛkṣādivat kutaḥ sādhāraṇānīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1893: bhaveyuḥ, tataśca sarve tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ, tattvadarśināṃ kṛte āryamārgabhāvanāyāścāpi nairarthakyam, vaktṛṇāmapi tattvaviṣeye kaścana
T04ksmadhlu:1894: vivādo na syāt, sarveṣāṃ tattvadarśitvāt teṣu saṃśayābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1896: mohanivartanaphalatvāteṣām, tattvajñānārthameva taiḥ sarveṣāṃ mohāvakāśo dūrīkriyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1897: lakṣaṇakārairlakṣaṇeṣu parasparavirodho bhinnasiddhāntapraveśo vā na kariṣyate, tattvasyaikasvabhāvatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1898: ato vyavahārapramāṇaṃ yannaiva paramārthaviṣayi tadapi vyavahārapramāṇaṃ sambhavatyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:1903: dehadhāriṇo ye vastusvabhāvasya yathāvat parijñānena saṃsārakārāto mumukṣavasteṣāmavidyā viṣayebhyo vinivṛttavabhāvā, te ca [viṣayāḥ]
T04ksmadhlu:1905: abhīṣṭārthakriyāsādhakarthaprāptimātreṇa puruṣā naiva muktāḥ syuḥ sarvasya muktiprasaṅgāt
T04ksmadhlu:1906: ataḥ avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti yaduktaṃ tat pramāṇasādhāraṇalakṣaṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:1908: ataḥ kathaṃ tasmin samyag vastu aviparītatayā setsyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1913: yāni tāvat svato vā parato vā aviparītayā sadvastūni, tāni sarvāṇyapi tathaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:1914: atra nāsti pramāṇāsiddhatvamapi, yato ye tāvat sāṃkhyādayaste hetuṃ satkāryaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1916: svata eva vastūni jāyanta iti bruvāṇā naiva yuktisaṅgatāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1917: na hi sad vā asad vā vastu svataḥ svahetau niṣpadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1920: phalataḥ ko hi nāma kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1923: tadātmanā siddho 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt kastāvat kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1927: yadi sa svabhāvena siddhastadā tasmin aṇumātramapi upakāryasvabhāvasyābhāvāt kathaṃ sa utpādyaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1928: aviśeṣaṇīyatve 'pi yadyutpādyatvamahetukatāyāmupakalpyate tadā sajjñānamapi tathaiva kiṃ na parikalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1930: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ "ābhyātmikāyatanāni na svata utpannāni, sattvāt, sajjñānavat"
T04ksmadhlu:1932: dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ, kecicca viruddhahetutvaṃ nirupayanti, tatra teṣāmajñānasyaiva doṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1933: ityaṃ pareṣu parasparavirodhaṃ pratipādayiṣayā pareṣu siddhāni sajjñānādīni tāvadudāhriyante
T04ksmadhlu:1935: sajjñānamapi pareṣu nāsiddham, ato dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ hetorviruddhatvamapi na staḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1937: aparataśca parasparāpratibaddhābhidhānaṃ tāvadabhidhānābhilāṣamātrameva, na tu svasantatervastudharmatāyāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1939: yadi sa siddhaḥ syāttadā tadvirodhābhidhānamucitam, tatra hetudṛṣṭāntayoraprasiddhatvāt tadabhidhānaṃ tāvadapratibaddhameva /
T04ksmadhlu:1940: pariniṣpannabhāvātmakatve 'pi yadi tadupakāraḥ svīkriyate tadā tadbhinnaḥ sa upakāro na svata utpadyate, arthāntarabhūtasyopakārasya utpannatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1941: yadyabhinnastadopakārasyāpi tathaiva siddhatvāt sa kathamiva setsyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1943: api ca, yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'yaṃ vṛkṣadrumavat paryāyatayocyate tadā na tathā lokaprasiddhiriti
T04ksmadhlu:1946: yadi hetvabhivyaktau vipariṇāme vā sati phalaṃ bhavatīti nirdiśyate tadā evamayaṃ pṛthagvyasthitaḥ saddhetureva /
T04ksmadhlu:1947: naivaṃ cintanaṃ yujyate, yato hi sa yadi abhivyaktervipariṇāmasya vāvabhāso niścayena tadbhinnastadā kevalādanyasmādutpattirevābhyupagatā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1948: yadi nāsti bhinnastadā kāryakāraṇaviplavadoṣaḥ prasaktaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1951: parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇadharmasya itarapratiṣedhakatvād anyatrāsiddhatvācca anubhayapakṣakalpanamapi naiva yuktīmat /
T04ksmadhlu:1952: api ca, yadyabhīṣṭe taddhetau abhīṣṭaṃ vastu ātmanaḥ purvasvabhāvamaparityajya abhivyaktādyavasthāṃ prāpnoti tadā avasthāvikṛtiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1955: yadi parityajyeti pakṣastadā niraṃśasvabhāvatvāt kaścidapyanvayasvabhāvo na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1956: paścād vyaktāvasthāyāmapi dravyāntarasyotpādānnaiva svata utpādaḥ, nāpi kācidabhivyaktiḥ pariṇāmo vā syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1957: api ca, vyaktamapyanābhāsitaṃ saditaralakṣaṇatvād itarābhyāmabhivyaktipariṇāmābhyāṃ prabhāvitatvāt parikalpitameva /
T04ksmadhlu:1961: etadaviparītatvena paricchede sati na tat paricchedayogyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1962: yasya paricchedakāle yo vicchedyo na bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:1964: ye parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva yuktarupāḥ, yathā
T04ksmadhlu:1971: ataḥ yo hi vastubhedaḥ prāgavasthāvilakṣaṇaḥ parikalpyate, sa eva anyastattvavilakṣaṇa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1974: atha yaścāsya svabhāvaḥ paścādupalabhyate, sa pūrvamapi paramārthato
T04ksmadhlu:1975: vidyata iti? tadā sa tadānīṃ kathaṃ nopalabhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1976: athānābhāsasvabhāvatvāt pūrvaṃ nopalabhyata iti cet? tadā haitāvapi tasya
T04ksmadhlu:1978: iṣyamāṇe 'pi copalabdhisvabhāve prāgvat paścādapi anupalabdhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1981: dugdhādīnāṃ śatadhā vināśe 'pi yā hi dadhyādirupeṇa
T04ksmadhlu:1983: api ca, yaḥ kaścid dṛḍharupeṇa bhāvasvabhāvastatsya kathamanyathā vikārānubhavaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1984: yadi sa tāavadadṛḍhasvabhāvastadāpi bhaṅguratvānniranvayaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syāditi tasyāpyanyathā vikārānubhavo naiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1985: ato 'bhivyakteḥ pariṇāmasya cāyujyamānatvād yā hi tābhyāṃ svata
T04ksmadhlu:1987: yadi ākasmikī tavat svata utpattistathāpi yaddhi vastūnāṃ deśakālasvabhāvaniyatattvam, tasya kiṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1988: nirapekṣeṣu tāvad vastuṣu tathāvidhā naiyatyāmbhāvanā naiva yuktimatī /
T04ksmadhlu:1989: yadi hi parasāpekṣatvaṃ tadā parata utpattiḥ syāt, na hi upakārābhāve apekṣā nomopapadyate sāpi paścānniṣetsyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1990: apekṣāyā api tāvat sadā saṃnihitasvabhāvatvāt sarvadaivotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1991: ityevaṃ vyavahāre 'pi tāvat svata utpādo 'sambhava eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1993: yadi tataḥ [parataścet] utpādaḥ, tadā sa [parākhyaḥ pratyayaḥ] nityo vā bhaved, anityo va /
T04ksmadhlu:1994: nityāttāvad vyavahāre 'pi notpādo yuktiyuktaḥ, kramākramābhyām arthakriyāyāstatrānu papannatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:1995: / apratīhatasāmarthyahetuto 'pi na bhavati kadācitkakāryotpattiḥ, nāpi cāvikalahetuto 'pi kādācitkakāryotpattiḥ [sambhavati] /
T04ksmadhlu:1996: phalataḥ kathaṃ nāma tasmāt kramaśo 'rthakriyā sampasyate? parairanādheyaviśeṣasya
T04ksmadhlu:2003: tatpratibaddhātmabhāvasya prāpyamāṇatvād buddhiparikalpitā apekṣā tāvad vyavasthāpyate, kintu tadabhinirhārāya yo hi apratisāmarthyavān hetuḥ, sa eva tasyānupakārakatvāt [sā] tadapekṣitā bhavati, na tvanyān [apekṣate] /
T04ksmadhlu:2004: ato nityatvena yadabhīṣṭaṃ vastu sadaivopakaroti tadapratihatasamarthyaṃ hetuṃ parityajya kathamanyān apekṣiṣyate? kāryāṇi hi sahakārikāraṇānyapekṣante, tathāpi ye tāvadīścaradayo hetavaḥ, yadi te 'pratihatasāmarthyavantastadā kathamapekṣāmarhanti, yena tebhya utpattimasvīkurvadbhirbalena "naivotpādyante" ityevam ātmabalopadarśanaṃ kariṣyate, nānyatra /
T04ksmadhlu:2006: evameva kāryāṇi yadi hetudharmān nānusaranti tadā tadabhinnatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādeveti /
T04ksmadhlu:2008: akramādapi hetoḥ kramiṇaḥ kāryasyotpādo na virudhyatīti cet? naitad
T04ksmadhlu:2009: yujyate, yataḥ 'kāryāṇi sarvān hetudharmān nānuvidadhate' ityevaṃ tatkathanaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2012: kimapi kāryaṃ nityasya vastano vyatirekaṃ naivānuvidhatte, nityasya tāvad vyatirekābhāvādeva
T04ksmadhlu:2015: avikale 'pi kadācit kāryotpādābhāvāt yad yatra anvayavyatirekau nānuvidhatte, na tat tatkāryaṃ yujyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2016: sataḥ kāryasya tāvat [kvacidapi] apekṣā naiva yujyate, sarvātmanā siddhatvāttasya /
T04ksmadhlu:2018: itthaṃ nitye tāvat kramaśo 'rthakriyā na yujyate, nāpi ca yugapadapi, yato hi tasya
T04ksmadhlu:2019: tathāvidhārthakriyāyā vinaṣṭasvabhāvamanusṛtya kāryotpattirvā tadviyogo vā na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2020: yadi tatsāmarthyasvabhāvaṃ paścatkāle 'pi anusarati tadāpi tena sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yāni pūrvotpannani tāni naiva punarutpādayituṃ śakyante, pūrvotpannatvādeva /
T04ksmadhlu:2021: yadanyat tatsadṛśaṃ tatkathaṃ notpadyata iti virodhaparīkṣāpi tāvannaiva
T04ksmadhlu:2023: sāmarthye sati pūrvotpannameva syāditi cet? naiva tāvattad yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2024: tata utpādyasya kāryasya anutpattāvapi tadutpattisāmarthyasvabhāvānusaraṇaṃ pratihataṃ syāt
T04ksmadhlu:2025: yo yadā yadutpādayati tadā tasmin apratihatasāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti kathanaṃ naiva yuktimattaram
T04ksmadhlu:2026: tasmādayaṃ pūrvamapi paścātkāla iva anutpādaka eva
T04ksmadhlu:2028: tataśca paścātkāle 'pi pūrvavad utpādaka eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2029: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā viruddhadharmayogād asmaikatvahāniḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2033: ato parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhāntaro na sidhyatīti cet? asanneva tadā sa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2036: ataḥ kalpakalpāntareṣu aviśeṣatayā sthitatvāt pūrvavat paścādapi tasya vināśo naiva yujyate
T04ksmadhlu:2037: kāryotpattistāvadatītād [hetoḥ] bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ, yathā te atītādapi
T04ksmadhlu:2038: vipākahetoḥ kāryotpattiṃ varṇayanti, anāgatāṃ vā, yathā tata eva
T04ksmadhlu:2040: evaṃvidha upacāro vā vartamānakriyākramo vā atītāddhetorbhavatīti vādo naiva sarvathā yuktaḥ, atītasyāsattvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2041: yadi tata utpattiraṅgīkriyate tadā ahetuta eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2043: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā vartamāna iva anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvāt kathaṃ hi sa atīta iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2047: na tu svabhāvaparihāṇyetyucyate, evaṃ sati vinaṣṭāyāḥ kriyātaḥ kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2049: kathaṃ hi kāryotpattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ kriyāvināśa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2050: ekasvabhāvātmake vastuni kriyāvanti akriyāvanti ca kāryāṇi na yujyate, bhinnatāyāḥ prasaṅgāt, niraṃśatvāddhi tasya /
T04ksmadhlu:2051: ākṣepamātrā hi kriyā, na cānādhāyikā, abhinnatvāt sa ākṣepakāla evādhānaṃ kariṣyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2052: anyathā pūrvavat paścādapi sā tathā bhavituṃ na śaktā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2053: api ca, kriyā nāma sā kiṃ samarthasvabhāvā yaduta karmasvabhāvā? yadi tat svabhāvadvayaṃ vastunaḥ sakāśād bhinnaṃ tadā kathaṃ nāma tad [vastu]
T04ksmadhlu:2055: yadi tadupahatasvabhāvaṃ tadā samastavastuno nityasattāvādasya hāniḥ prasajyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2056: arthāntaravināśe satyapi vastuno hyacalasvabhāvasya vināśo naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2058: devadatte yajñadattasya anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvānmṛta sa iti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2060: anavasthānāt, yato hi kriyāyāṃ kriyāntarasadbhāvo nāstyet /
T04ksmadhlu:2061: tasyāmapi tulya eva virodhaḥ parīkṣā ca /
T04ksmadhlu:2063: anyārthatve sati kriyāyāḥ vastu tāvad ahetukameva syāt, kevalaṃ kriyāta eva kāryasyotpādāt
T04ksmadhlu:2066: anyārthakriyāntarobhayasvabhāvātmakatvād yadi vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā svabhāvata evotpādayati tadā vastvapi tathaivotpādakaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2070: kriyā' - iti sambandha eva na siddhaḥ syād, upakārasāpekṣatvāt sambandhasyeti /
T04ksmadhlu:2071: upakārakatvameva yadi vastutvenāṅgīkriyate tadā kriyātmakatvād vastunaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2072: kriyāmupakarotīti cettadā kāryamapi kathaṃ na tathaivopakaroti? kena tāvat kāraṇena kriyāntaratvenopakalpyate? yadi kriyā hi sanmātravastusāpekṣaiva tadā avikalahetutvāt sadā talsamīpavartinī eva, ato vināśo 'pi tāvannaiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2073: yadi sā arthantarabhūtā tadā sambandhastāvadasiddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2074: kriyāṇāmeva parasparayogād vastu tāavad gauṇameva sthāsyapi /
T04ksmadhlu:2076: [vastunaḥ] utpādasamanantarameva asthāyitvāt [tasya kasyāmapi] kriyāyāṃ karmasvabhāvatvaṃ naiva yujyate ye tāvadakṣaṇikāste sadā ekasvabhāvatvenāvasthitvānnaiva kriyāvanta ākāśavat ataḥ keṣvapi 'karma
T04ksmadhlu:2080: kriyā, yā vastvabhinnatvenobhayasvabhāvā, sā vinaśya yadi
T04ksmadhlu:2084: vastunaḥ svasvabhāva iva kriyāyā api avināśaprasaṅge sati kriyāyā naiva
T04ksmadhlu:2088: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti kalpyate tadā prajñaptisattvāt sā avastveva /
T04ksmadhlu:2096: yadi aprāptakriyastāvadanāgata ityucyate tadā tadānīṃ tasmādapi kāryotpattiḥ ātyantikatayā
T04ksmadhlu:2098: yadi vastu sarvadā vidyamānaṃ tadā tasyāḥ prāpteravikalakāraṇānāṃ sadbhāve 'pi kimiva kriyā naiva prāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2099: nāpi kriyā vastunaḥ sakāśādarthāntarabhūteti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2100: yadi nāsti arthāntarabhūtā tadā kriyāvat svabhāvo 'pi naiva aprāptaḥ syādabhinnatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2102: vastunaḥ svabhāva iva tadabhinnā kriyāpi sarvadā sadeva, ataḥ sā aprāptetyapi naiva sidhyati ataḥ anāgatānnāsti kāryotpattiḥ tasyāsattvādeva /
T04ksmadhlu:2104: yadi tataḥ [vartamanāt] kāryaṃ samutpadyate tadā samakālaṃ vā samutpadyatām,. viṣamakālaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2107: kāryotpattitaḥ pūrvaṃ śaśaśṛṅganibhād asatkāraṇād utpādo naiva yuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2108: yasmin kāle ca hetorātmabhāvaḥ [kāryotpadane] samarthastasmin kāle kāryasyāpi samakālaṃ sattvāt siddhameva tat [kāryam] iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2113: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva bhaṅgaḥ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2114: viṣama [bhinna] kālamiti pakṣo 'pi naiva sambhavati evameva yadi kāryaṃ [utpādāt] pūrvameva sat syāt
T04ksmadhlu:2117: yadi [kāryaṃ] kṣaṇāntaravyavadhānenotpadyate tadā tadatītādevotpadyata iti naiva yuktamityuktapūrvam
T04ksmadhlu:2119: athāpi syāt, yadyapi avyavahitatvena kāryasyotpādastathāpi nāsti samakālikatāprasaṅgaḥ, dvitīye kṣaṇe kāryasattāyā abhyupagamāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2121: / atra bhagavatāpi - "asmin satīdaṃ bhavati" iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2123: kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā, samakālike kāryakāraṇe vā,
T04ksmadhlu:2124: kṣaṇāntaravyavahitatvaṃ vā, avyavahitatve sati dvitīyakṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ vā
T04ksmadhlu:2126: tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2132: tṛtīyakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamapio hetuto notpadyate, dvitīyasattve kāryasyāpi sattvam /
T04ksmadhlu:2133: tṛtīyakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamapi hetuto notpadyate, dvitīyakṣaṇa eva vināśāt
T04ksmadhlu:2135: ityaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe vidyamānaṃ kāryameva hetoḥ samutpadyate, prāthamakṣaṇikasya hetoḥ svakāle sattvādeva /
T04ksmadhlu:2142: prathame kṣaṇe kāraṇasya avinaṣṭātvāt tadavyavadhānenaiva ca kāryasyotpādāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2143: tṛtīye kṣaṇe tāvat kāryotpādo 'sviti cet? naitadapi
T04ksmadhlu:2146: vidyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kālāntarāvyavahitaṃ ca kāryaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate, naiva tatkāryaṃ tadā svanirbharam /
T04ksmadhlu:2149: niraṃśe tāvad vastuni kālāntareṇāvyavahite ca sati samakālikatvaṃ muktvā nānyā gatiḥ sambhavati, tayoḥsarvātmanā avyavahitatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2150: yadi nāsti madhye kālāntarāstitvaṃ tadā avaśyaṃ pūrvāparatoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃsparśaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2151: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ [kṣaṇānāṃ] ekasminneva kṣaṇe samanupraveśaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2152: [phalataḥ] yathā paramāṇoḥ sarvātmanā saṃyoge piṇḍasya aṇumātratāprasaṅgaḥ, tathaiva kalpasyāpi kṣaṇamātratāprasaṅga iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2153: yathā khalu deśakramaḥ pramāṇairavabhāsamānatvāt saṃvṛtau svīkriyata tathā kālakramo 'pio tatsadṛśa eva, svapnādau kalpādīnāmapyavabhāsamānatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2155: pūrvāparakālabhedo na sambhavati, dakṣiṇavāmaśṛṅgavat kāryakāraṇayorapi sarvātmanā kālāntareṇāvyavadhānamiti, svabhāvahetuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2156: athaikadeśenāvyavahitatvam, naiva sarvātmaneti cet? tadā kṣaṇasyāpi sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2159: athāpi kāryotpattikāle hetorabhāvād, abhāvena ca saha sarvātmanā vā ekadeśena vā avyavahitatvamiti cintā na pravartata iti cet? tadapi naiva yujyate, tayormadhye kasyā api kālāntarasadbhāvasambhāvanāyā abhāvānnaiva tadā hetvabhāvayogaḥ sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:2160: punaśca, kāryotpattikāle yadi kāraṇaṃ nāsti, tadā kāryamahetukameva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2161: vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt yadi kāryamabhyupagamyate, na tu vartamānāt [vartamānasya
T04ksmadhlu:2162: tadānīm] asattvāt, tadā tasya vartamānamayuktam, yadi tad vartamānaṃ tadā
T04ksmadhlu:2164: yadi tat sadityabhyupeyate tadā avyavahitatvadicintā kathaṃ na pravṛtā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2165: yadi punaḥ kāryotpattikāle kāraṇaṃ vidyamānameva, kintu kāryasattākāle tadasaditi hetoḥ avyavahitatvādicintā naiva kāryeti cet? naitadapi yujyate, sattāto
T04ksmadhlu:2167: itthaṃ tu bhavantaḥ kāraṇasya nirantaratve satkāryasyotpattiṃ varṇayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2170: nirantaratvam avyavahitvaṃ saṃspṛṣṭatvamityādīnāmabhinnārthakatvāt tadabhyupagamasāmarthyena kāryakāraṇaikatvamapyabhyupagataṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2172: api ca, vinaṣṭahetoḥ kāryotpattiprasaṅgasya ayujyamānatvād bhavantastaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2174: tatra tāvat kiṃ sarvātmanā kāryotpattiṃ svīkurvanti yaduta ekadeśeneti cintā pravṛttaiva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2177: tatra ca ye nāpyekadeśena na ca sarvātmaneti bruvanti, tena taiḥ kimucyata
T04ksmadhlu:2178: iti vicāryamāṇe avyavahitamapi nāpyavyavahitamiti kathanaṃ paryavasyet /
T04ksmadhlu:2180: api ca, yadi vidyamānakāryakāle kāraṇaṃ nāstyeva, tadā 'avinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt
T04ksmadhlu:2181: kāryamutpadyata' iti naiva kathanīyam, tasmin kāle kasyāpyavinaṣṭakāraṇasyāsadbhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2182: yasmin kāle kāraṇam avinaṣṭaṃ tasmin kāle kāryamapi nāsti, atastat [kāryaṃ] avinaṣṭāt kathamutpadyate
T04ksmadhlu:2183: evaṃ cintyate - svayaṃ vināśavyavahite 'pi vastuni nāsti samakālikatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:2185: tathaivātrāpi kāryakāranayorasamīcīnarūpatve 'pi samakālikatvaṃ nāstītyayaṃ vicāraprakāro na yujyate, virodhāt tulyaparīkṣaṇīyatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:2186: evaṃ tatra sadasadbhāve yadyekadeśenāvyavahitatvaṃ tadā avayavisadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2188: tathaiva chāyātapayorudakadharāyāṃ cāpi yadi sarvātmanāvyavahitatvaṃ tadaikadeśatvameva syāt
T04ksmadhlu:2192: avyavahitatvādisamudbhūto 'sadbhāva iti nāsti kaścana vyavahārastathāpi dvipīye kṣaṇe vastūni svasvabhāvanirodhamātraṃ prajñapayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2195: nirodhamātraṃ tāvanna kiñcit, atastena saha paramārthato
T04ksmadhlu:2197: kāryakāraṇayostu paramārthataḥ sattvabhyupagamād ekadeśenāvyavahitatvādicintā tāvat pravartata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2198: āryaśālistambasūtre yo hi bhagavatā tulādaṇḍopamayā avyavahitatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'bhihitaḥ, sa tāvaducchedadṛṣṭiparhārārthaṃ sāṃvṛtikakāryakāraṇabhāvatvena draṣṭavyaḥ, na tu paramārthataḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2201: 'vayavī dṛṣṭāntatvena pradaśryate, tadā sa khallavasiddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2206: yadi vijñānāvabhāsisvabhāvatvena tulādaṇḍastāvannirdiśayate, tadā parikalpitasvabhāvatvena mithyaiva saḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2210: laṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu bhagavatā kāryakāraṇabhāvaniṣedhastāvat sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇeṣvevāvagantavyaḥ yadapi bhagavatā 'asmin satīdaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2211: bhavati' ityuktaṃ tena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthaṃ eva vikalpo
T04ksmadhlu:2212: 'bhyupagamyata iti yaduktaṃ tad vakṣyate kiṃ 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' iti vacanena vikalpatrayaṃ niṣidhya caturthavikalpābhyupagam āgamena nirdiṣṭo yaduta yuktyā? āgameneti cet, tannaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2213: yato hi yau chāyāṅkurau dīpaprakāśau vā samakālavidyamānau tāvapi dīpe sati prakāśo bhavatīti na vyavahāraviruddhau /
T04ksmadhlu:2214: evameva vidyamānakāryaṃ vidyamānakāraṇasāpekṣamiti śabdamātreṇa nirdiśyate, na tu vidyamānakāryakāle kāraṇaṃ nāsaditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2215: yadi hi vastutvaṃ pramāṇāntaraiḥ paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikatvena sādhyate tadā tadapi parikalpitamātrameva, na tvāgamena [siddhaḥ] /
T04ksmadhlu:2218: atha yuktyeti pakṣaḥ, tadā bhagavato vacanāni [pramāṇatvena]
T04ksmadhlu:2220: atha kevalayā yuktyaivaikayā kathanīyamiti cet? etadapi naiva vaktuṃ śakyate, yato hi yathā yuktyā vikalpatrayaṃ na sambhavati tathā caturtho 'pi vikalpaḥ paramārthato naiva sambhavatīti [pūrvaṃ] vistarena nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2221: lokaprasiddhimatikramya nityatvadravyatva svātantryādiguṇopetamātmānamabhyupetamātmānamabhyupetya karmafāsambandhādisaṃvṛtiṃ nirākurvatāṃ dṛṣṭiparihārārthaṃ bhagavaduktena idampratyayatāmātreṇevāvasthiteṣu saṃvṛtimāśritya asmin satīdaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2222: bhavatītyuktam, na tvāgamena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
T04ksmadhlu:2224: phalataśca sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyeva prajñāptyā utpādādibhya eva santuṣyatām , mithyātvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2229: ato ye ācāryāḥ "na paramārthata adhyātmikānyāyatanāni praratyayataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2230: samutpadyante, paratvāt" ityādyabhidadhate, [teṣāmapi] te hetavo naiva
T04ksmadhlu:2238: samyagvastutvāddhetvādīnāṃ na vyavahāraḥ kutrāpi sidhyatīti nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:2240: tairthikāḥ ye hi parādivyavahāravaśāt parādīni santīti kathayanti tān ācārya āha -
T04ksmadhlu:2244: parādayaḥ śabdā ye tāvatprajñāptigocarāstānapi paramparayā vastusaṃsargiṇa ityabhidadhatāṃ teṣāṃ 'vastusabhāvaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2246: pratyayādiṣu sattve paramārthato vastusvabhāvasyānutpādāditi vistareṇa khalvabhihitam /
T04ksmadhlu:2247: ato yadā sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ parata utpādo naivopapadyate tadā pratyayādibhyo 'pi anutpādādasiddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2248: ato nāstyeva paramārthataḥ śabdasaṃsargi kimapi vastu /
T04ksmadhlu:2249: phalato 'siddhe 'pyevaṃvidhe vyavahāre vastu tāvadabādhitameveti yaduktaṃ tanna yujyate
T04ksmadhlu:2250: [30] ye sāṃkhyādayaḥ pradhāneśvarādikaṃ manvānāḥ pradhāneśvarādibhyo vastūnāmutpādamabhyupagacchanti, teṣāmapi mataṃ svato vā parato vā
T04ksmadhlu:2252: anye ye kadācit svātantryena ubhayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti , te
T04ksmadhlu:2254: apare ca ye tāvat - 'ubhayātmakasya vastunaḥ pramāṇaviruddhatvānna ko 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:2255: tadabhyupagacchatīti hetoḥ ubhayata utpattiṃ dūṣayitvā bhavantaḥ kevalamātmānameva mohayanti, tattu [bhavatāṃ] śabdamātrameva" iti kathayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2256: te tāvad vidvāṃsaḥ svayaṃ śāstrāṇāmaparijñānāt śabdārthayośca samyaganavagamāt [kevalaṃ] śabdaśa upahasanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2257: kecana tāvat kaṇṭakāditīkṣṇatādṛṣṭāntena sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'hetuta
T04ksmadhlu:2258: utpadyanta iti kathayanti, tatra vastūnāṃ paramārthato 'hetuta utpattiṃ sādhayatāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntastāvannaiva siddhaḥ, paramārthato 'nutpannatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2260: saṃvṛtau suddha iti cenna, tatrāpyasiddha eva, kaṇṭādīnāṃ svabījata utpādaḥ pratyakṣato niścitatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2261: anenaiva teṣāṃ taikṣṇyādīnāmapi niścitatvānna ko 'pi [dharmaḥ] ahetuta utpadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2262: evaṃ kādācitkatvāt sarveṣāmeteṣāṃ vastūnāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ niścitameva anapekṣitasya tu sadā aviśeṣāttasya kādācitkatvaṃ nopapadyata eveti /
T04ksmadhlu:2263: yatteṣāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ tadeva hetuḥ, anupakāriṇi apekṣāyā anupapannatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2264: tatra yadupakārakatvena prasiddhaḥ, sa eva tasya heturiti sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2265: ahetukatve sati sarvatra abhinnatvāt kaṇkādiṣvapi tīkṣṇatāyā nirdhāraṇaṃ na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2267: ye bījādayaste loke kāryakāraṇātmakatvena pratyakṣataḥ siddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2269: api ca, hetutaḥ sādyasya sādhanāvasare anyataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2273: naiva pratijñāmātreṇa tāvadiṣṭārthasiddhiḥ, tathā sati sarvataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2275: ato 'hetuvādī khalu vyavahāre pratyakṣādibhirbādhitatvād vidvadbhiḥ sāvadhānatayā pariharttavya eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2277: prasiddhāstathā teṣāmaniṣedhād anutpattirityucyate, pratyakṣāditaścāpi sāṃ naiva bādhitā
T04ksmadhlu:2281: atasteṣu vyāpterutpatteḥ samyaṅ nivṛttyā tasyāpi [sasvabhāvatvasya] nivṛttiḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2287: tatrāpi paramārthatastathākāro naiva sambhavīti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2289: tadutpattyā sasvabhāvatvādīnāṃ vyaptatve 'pi utpattau satyāṃ samyaksvabhāvo naiva niyatarūpeṇa sidhyati, vyāpakasāmīpye sarvavyāpyāṇāṃ sāmīpyaṃ navaśyaṃbhāvīti niścitamityuktameva pūrvam ataḥ sādhāraṇamevaitad /
T04ksmadhlu:2290: paramarthato na kasminnapyutpattiḥ pravartata iti sādhitameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2291: yanna kaiścidapi pratyayaiḥ samutpadyate tad vastu kutaḥ prādurbhavatīti kathayadbhirabhivyaktimātrameva ato 'naikāntika eva heturiti cet tatasyāpi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt tyājyamevaitaditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2292: atha pratyayairvastu abhivyajyata eveti cettadā ki sā abhivyaktiḥ svalakṣaṇopacayasvabhāvā vā tadāvaraṇasaṃkṣayātmiokā vā indriyaiḥ sukṛtā vā tadviṣayakavijñānotpattilakṣaṇā veti vicāraḥ samupajāyante /
T04ksmadhlu:2293: tatra naiva tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kathamapi yujyate, nityatāyā hāniprasaṅgat /
T04ksmadhlu:2294: yadā anupacayasvabhāvaḥ svato vinaśya abhivyañcakapratyayairutpadyate tadā ekasyāparasyānupacayasvabhāvasyotpādavaśāt svalakṣaṇopacayo bhavatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2295: na, tatpūrvasvabhāvo yadi na nirudhyeta tadā dvau parasparāvirudhau upacayāpacayasvabhāvau niryuktitayā ekasminneva svīkāryau syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:2296: yadyapūrvaḥ kaścana svabhāvo notpadyate tadā abhivyañcakāḥ pratyayāstāvannirarthakaḥ syuḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2301: tadā sarve te pratyayā ye yadā arthamabhivyañcinti tadā ananyārthabhūtā kriyā tatra naiva sambhavati, pūrvata eva tasyāvidyamānatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2302: nityasya bhāvasya tvāvaraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāṇāmavināśād anutpādācca kadāpi na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2305: yujyate, svaviṣayakajñānotpattau samarthatvāt, vidyamāne svavijñāmavijñeyasvabhāve 'vikalavijñānaṃ tāvat kenāpi vighnayitumaśaktvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:2306: yadi nāsti sa samartho vā svavijñānavijñeyo vā tadā svahetuvikalatayā tadvijñānotpattireva na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2310: asāmarthyāt tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvābhāvācca abhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayairāvaraṇaṃ kriyata ityasyāpi nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtameva
T04ksmadhlu:2313: yadi sāmarthayamabhyupagamyate tadā āvaraṇakārake satyapi avikalahetoḥ sadbhāvāt sadaiva vijñānotpattisambhavād vyañjakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ kriyā nirarthikaiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2314: ato nityasya tāvadakiñcikaratvāt kathamapyāvaraṇaṃ na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2315: anityatā tu kadāpi kenāpi hetuviśeṣeṇa vijñānānutpādakasyānyasya kṣaṇasyotpādād āvriyata eva
T04ksmadhlu:2317: yadi tatsukṛtvaṃ [vastu]svabhāvabhūtaṃ tadā anityātāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ, pūrvasadṛśatvāttasya
T04ksmadhlu:2318: yadi tadanyārthabhūtaṃ tadā sukṛtatvaṃ naiva yuktiyuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:2321: kasminnapi vastuni kenāpi kimapi karaṇaṃ tāvannaiva sambhavamiti [pūrvaṃ] nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2322: indriyaiḥ sukṛtatve 'pi yadi abhivyañcakairbhāvaiḥ tadindriyavijñānotpādāsāmarthyam athavā
T04ksmadhlu:2323: tadā tadvijñānotpattirasambhavinī, ato nirarthakameva tāvat sukṛtatvamiti prasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2324: yadi vidyata eva sāmarthyaṃ tadvijñeyasvabhāvo vā tadā indriyaiḥ sukṛtakatvataḥ pūrvameva tasmin [viṣaye] vijñānotpādasya prasañgaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2326: atastamin viṣaye vijñānotpādalakṣaṇamapi na saṅgataṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2327: yato hyevaṃ tad vyaṅgyaṃ vastvapi yadi asamarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyavabhāvaṃ vāpi nāsti tadā vijñānotpāde 'pi na pad [vastu] tasya [vijñānasya] viṣayaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2329: [tad vastu] samarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvaṃ vā syāt tadā
T04ksmadhlu:2330: svasvabhāvavat sāmīpyāt tatsattāmatreṇaiva vijñānasya samutpādo bhaviṣyatītyato na tena vyañjakavijñānotpādaḥ kriyata iti [sidhyati] /
T04ksmadhlu:2331: api ca, bhavatāṃ tāvanmate sarvesāṃ vastūnāṃ jāyataḥ sadaivāvatiṣṭhanta
T04ksmadhlu:2335: sadaivābhīvyaktiprasaṅgo 'pi sarvavastūnāṃ dūrnivāra eva, sarvadā avikalasamagrīkatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2337: nityasya ca sarvasāmarthyavirahiotatvānnaiva hi vastutvaṃ kathamapyupapadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2339: ityevaṃ yadi sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ tasya abhāvarūpatvameva, yathā - vandhyāputra iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2347: asaṃskṛteṣvapi tathātvāt kathaṃ tāni vastūnīti? ityevaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo ye sarvasāmarthyaśūnyāsteṣāṃ vandhyāputrādyabhinnatve 'pi ye khalu tān vastutvena parikalpayanti ,
T04ksmadhlu:2349: pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo yadi kasyāpi jñānasya viṣayāstadā avaśyaṃ te
T04ksmadhlu:2352: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasya nityatāyā hāniprasaṅgaḥ, vyavahāre 'pi tasya kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyākāritvānupapannatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2354: yadi vijñānena vijñeyasvabhāvasya abhāvād viṣayatvaṃ kalpyate, tathā sati yadi vijñānaṃ vijñeyasvabhāvamanusaratīti tadā tadvijñānasyāpi tadanusaraṇena nityatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2356: yadi sarvajñajñānaṃ taditi na kasyāpi vastunaḥ sāmīpyamiti
T04ksmadhlu:2357: kalpyate, tadāpi prekṣāvadbhistasmin vastusattāyā vyavahāro nopapadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2359: yena kāraṇena tato vibhaktaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādiṃ ye jñeyatvenopacaranti, teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ svabhāvarāhityāda viśeṣo 'bhidhātavyaḥ, abhāvād vibhaktasya rāhityasvabhāvasya vastūtvena jñānāsambhavāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2362: vandhyāputrādisadṛśe tadabhitnne 'pi yadi vastviti nāma prajñapyate, tadā nāsti vivādaḥ, kintuṃ kathaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'hetukā iti nocyata ityucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2364: ata evoktaṃ laṅkāvatārasūtreḥ asadbhāvasamāropaḥ punarmahāmate, yaduta ākāśanirodhanirvāṇākṛtakābhiniveśasamāropaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2365: ye tāvannityānityābhyāmanabhidheyatvena pudgalādināmubhayathāpi siddhiranaikāntikīti pratipādayanti, tanna yujyate, sadvastuni kathamapi anabhidheyatvāsambhavāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2367: yadi tāni kramaśa ekasiddhinisedhāmyām aparaniṣedhasiddhibhāñji na syustadā asadeva syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2368: phalata ekasya niṣedha evāparasya siddhiriti hetoḥ kathaṃ tāvadanabhidheyaṃ vastvityabhidhīyate
T04ksmadhlu:2369: anyathā [yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā] anabhidheyatvāt sarvāṇyeva vastunyanabhidheyāni syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2370: phalataḥ svaparoditānām aśeṣavastuviśeṣāṇāṃ vilopasambhavād mahātmabhirvajrakaṇādiyukticatuṣṭayasyābhidhād ebhyo mārgebhyo naiva viruddham /
T04ksmadhlu:2372: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2373: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
T04ksmadhlu:2375: ityevaṃ sarve dharmā nirātmāna iti sādhyante /
T04ksmadhlu:2376: ata eva bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāsūtre vastuṣu nityānityagrāhasya tāvanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2381: cet? yadā tad rūpaṃ sadeva nāsti tadā tannityābhidhānasya tu kathaiva kā?
T04ksmadhlu:2384: ata evātrāpi parataḥ kāryotpāde tāvat ko virodhaḥ, kathaṃ hi tato 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:2386: bādhakapramāṇānyapītyādi yaduktam, etat sarvaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2387: satkāryotpādaniṣedhāryamapi bhavatāṃ savidhe nāsti ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaścetyādi yaduktam, tāpi naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2388: tathā hi - kiṃ tat yat sadityucyate? aṃśaistāvanniraṃśasya siddhirasambhavinīti yasya
T04ksmadhlu:2389: svabhāvaḥ sarvātmanā niṣpannaḥ, yaśca niṣpannasvabhāva iti tasya
T04ksmadhlu:2390: paraiḥ[hetupratyayaiḥ] apūrva ityākhyaṃ bhedaṃ kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2391: yasyāpūrvamiti bhedaṃ naiva śakyate kartum, sa kadāpi kenāpyutpādayituṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2395: vicchinnamātre sādhye tathaiva ca hetornideśe na te abhūtadharmito viruddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2396: yathā sati naiva āśrasiddhādidoṣāḥ, pūrvameva tannirdiṣṭatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2401: yasya kenāpi bhavati bhedaḥ, sa tasya prakṛtiḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2403: yaśca svabhāvataḥ pūrvameva sthitaḥ, sa hetusannidhānāt pūrvamapi tathaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ 'hetubhirutpannaḥ' iti kathayituṃ śakyate? ato nāstyanaikāntikatvamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:2406: evameva yadi savabhāvato 'bhāva ekaprakṛtika eva, tadā paścādapi kathaṃ sa satsvabhāvaḥ syāt, sadasatoḥ parasparaviruddhātvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2407: yaśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sa tadviruddhadharmiṇi kathaṃ nāma yuktaḥ syāt, yathā amūrtadhārmāntarbhūtaṃ tāvadākāśaṃ kathaṃ nāma mūrtaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2409: utpattyākhyo hi prasiddhaḥ satsvabhāvastāvad asatsvabhāvaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ hi nāma paramārthato 'bhāvena
T04ksmadhlu:2411: evaṃ vicāryamāṇe yadsat, tasya utpattikriyāvatyāmutpatau kimapyupadeśanaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2413: pṛthaksāmarthyavataḥ kasyāpi bhāvātmakasya hetoranantaraṃ prādurbhāvasya sampratibhāsābhāvāt taddhetorasadutpadyata iti loke utpattiviśeṣaviṣayikāyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ abhidhānasya ca vyavahāraḥ pravartate
T04ksmadhlu:2414: / vyavahāramātreṇa tu vastusattve bādhāleśo 'pi naiva sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:2416: yadi tat sat, tadā naiva tadasat /
T04ksmadhlu:2417: yo hi paścādapi utpattisvabhāvaḥ, sa tāvadanya eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2420: 'asadutpadyate' iti yadktaṃ tadabhāvato bhāvasiddhiriti naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2423: yadyetad vastu hetoḥ sāmīpyāt pūrvamudbhūtaṃ nāsti, tadā tasya kaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2425: yadi tadā kiñcidapi nāsti tadā tat kadācid vastutvenābhidhāsyata iticintā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2426: yadi nāsti vastunaḥ kimapi bhāvātmakamastitvaṃ tadā tasya svabhāvo 'sadeveti suspaṣtamabhidhāsyate
T04ksmadhlu:2428: evaṃ yo hi pūrvamasan, sa paścādbhāvī kaścana bhāvasvabhāva eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2430: pūrvaṃ nāsīdityasadutpattervyavahārasyāpi hetupratyayābhāsāḥ kathaṃ samyagityabhidhātuṃ śakyāḥ? evamabhūtasya bhūtasiddhistāvadasataḥ satsiddhireva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2431: yato hi yadi nāstyanyastadā abhūtādanyo bhūto nāsti satsamīpavarttyapi /
T04ksmadhlu:2437: ekasmin krameṇa sattvāsattve aviruddheityabhidhānamapi naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2440: yadi samakāle te aviruddhe tadā krameṇāpi kathaṃ te na tathā, abhinnatvāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2443: yathā yugapadanekaviruddhadharmānvitatvād ekatvahāniprasaṅgaḥ, tathaiva krameṇāpi tadanvitatvāt tatpravṛttiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:2444: anyathā parairapi pradhānādīnāṃ kramaśo mahadādigaṇe parivartanam abhivyaktim vā upakalpayatāṃ vyaktāvyaktādidharmavirodhaḥ kathamabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2445: krameṇa vastūnāmutpādakeṣu īśvarādiṣu kathaṃ nāma samarthāsamarthādivirodhodbhāvanaṃ yujyate
T04ksmadhlu:2446: ye kecana parvatakāyavajrādīn dṛḍhasvabhāvān teṣāṃ śītoṣmādyavasthābhedena kramaśo bhedaṃ vyavasthāpayanti, te 'pi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sisādhayiṣavaḥ kathaṃ krameṇa prādurbhavatsu teṣu śītoṣmādiviruddhatvamabhidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2447: yadi vastūni tāvad abhūtvā utpadyante, bhūtvā cābhāvatvenāvabhāsanta iti
T04ksmadhlu:2448: vicāraṇād ekasmin kramaśaḥ sadasattvaviruddhatvena vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti kathayantīti cennedaṃ yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2449: yato hi tāmrādiṣvevaṃ dāḍharyamārdavaśaityauṣṇyādīni krameṇa dṛśyanta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2454: yato hi māyāsvapnādisamā alīkā api [padārthāḥ] abhūtvā bhavanti, bhūtvā ca vinaśyamānāḥ pratibhāsante /
T04ksmadhlu:2455: kintu svabhāvataḥ sadasatostu krameṇāpi tayoḥ sadasatorvirodha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2464: kāryakāraṇabhāvo yadi paramārthata syāttadā evamabhidadhānānāṃ [sā] dṛṣṭistāvat samyag mārgānusaraṇād muktimārgānukūlaiva strānnatvananukūlā /
T04ksmadhlu:2465: ato laṅkāvatārasūtre yaduktaṃ tadapyaviruddhamevaṃ, tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:2469: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2470: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:2473: pratiniyatasāmarthyato viruddhamapi svabhāvaṃ kartuṃ naiva pāryate, tathā sati śaśaśṛṃṅgādīnāmapyutpādaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi vidvāṃso bruvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2474: ato hetūnāṃ niyatasāmarthyena vyavasthāpi niyatā bhavedityabhidhānamapi tāvadasambaddhameva
T04ksmadhlu:2475: saṃvṛtāvapi khalvasata utpattiḥ kathaṃ na vitudhyata iti vicāraṇāpi tāvannaiva yujyate, vastunyeva virodhasya vyavasthāpannānmithyāvastuni [avastuni] tadvyavasthānamasambaddhameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2477: api ca, yā khalu vastūnāmutpattiḥ saṃvṛtimāyāvadavasthitā,
T04ksmadhlu:2479: evaṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthasadutpattirnopapadyate, na santi ca tāni [vastūni] asadbhūtānyapi
T04ksmadhlu:2481: ata eva sarvāṇi khalu vastūni māyāvadeva vyavasthitāni /
T04ksmadhlu:2482: ataśca bhagavatā - mahāmate, sato 'sataścānutpannatvāt sarve dharmā anutpannā evetyanekadhā sadasatorniṣedhaṃ kṛtvā anutpāda eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2483: bhagavata 'pi parikalpisvabhāvamabhipretya sadasatorutpattivirodho vyavasthāpitaḥ na tu tattvata ityevaṃ yeṣāṃ kathanaṃ tadapyagre 'bhidhāsyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2484: yo hi vastvātmā paramārthato 'nupanna so 'pi tattvata utpanna ityevaṃbhūto yo parikalpitaḥ svabhāvastamapi ye
T04ksmadhlu:2487: grāhyagrāhakārasvabhāvenānuppannatvāt sa parikalpitasvabhāva iti cintyate tadā parikalpitātmakayoḥ sadastoryathā utpattivirodhastathaiva paramārthātmakasyāpi kathaṃ notpattivirodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2488: tattvatastu utpatteḥ sadasadākārātirikttvena anyākāratayānutpannatvāt sādhāraṇameva taditi
T04ksmadhlu:2489: ato yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa paramārthataḥ śūnyaḥ, māyādivaditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2492: yo hi hetupratyayānapekṣya samutpadyate tasya kṛtaka eva svabhāvaḥ, na tu pāramārthikaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2494: ya eva kṛtakastasya naiva prakṛtyā svabhāvo yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2497: ato yo hi pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvaḥ, yaścābhūtvā bhavati, bhūtvā ca vigaccati
T04ksmadhlu:2503: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
T04ksmadhlu:2504: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //"
T04ksmadhlu:2505: nityānityasvabhāvayorupakalpitatvād vastūnām antadvayadarśane prasaṅgamāpādayitum uttam āryaśrīmālāsūtre
T04ksmadhlu:2508: 'anityāḥ saṃkārā iti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syāducchedadṛṣṭiḥ sāsya syānna samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2509: nityaṃ nirvāṇamiti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya
T04ksmadhlu:2515: ataśca sapakṣe sadbhāvānna viruddho 'pi hetuḥ, yato hi vipakṣe yasya
T04ksmadhlu:2516: sadbhāvaḥ, sa eva viruddhaḥ, na tu yasya sapakṣe sadbhāvaḥ, sa viruddha iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2519: na hi jñānajñeyābhyāṃ bhinno vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2521: pratītyasamutpādasvabhāvastāvat samyaktayā yujyata eveti ye kathayantītyanenāpi [kathanena] naiva [hetoḥ] viruddhatvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate 'sambaddhatvāt, vyāpakapravṛteḥ vyāpyasādhane 'śakyatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:2522: māyādiṣu hi mithyātvena [tatra] naiva pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2526: yato 'smābhirapi paramārthata utpattimabhyupagamya naiva hetornideśaḥ kṛtaḥ, sa tu kevalamubhyasiddhapratibhāsamādāyaiva
T04ksmadhlu:2527: na hi siddhāntāpekṣayā dharmihetvādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyata iti tu pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2528: yadi māyādayo vyavahāreṇāpyanutpannā ityabhyupagamyate tadedaṃ lokasyāpi nirvartakatvād asmābhirasyāṃ nivṛttau prayatno naivāstheyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2530: svasthamanāḥ puruṣo yadi 'yathā māyādīnāṃ pratyayā mantrauṣadhyādayaśca
T04ksmadhlu:2531: dṛśyate, tathā teṣāmutpattirnaiva dṛśyate' ityevaṃ kathayati, tattu teṣāṃ [kathanaṃ] viduṣāṃ kṛte 'tyantaṃ hāsyāspadamapamānakaraṃ ceti /
T04ksmadhlu:2534: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04ksmadhlu:2535: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:2537: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattannasti svabhāvataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2538: niḥsvabhāvā hi te bhāvāḥ kadācit sambhavanti na //
T04ksmadhlu:2540: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattacchāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2542: punaśca yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣyahe /
T04ksmadhlu:2544: [31] yadi vināśādayo hi vikalpāḥ paramārthata utpāttau bādhitā ityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2546: yā ca bādhābhidhīyate, kāsau? yadi mithyātvena sidhyantītyucyate, tadā vayamapyabhyupagacchāmaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2548: yadi yuktyā te prasidhyanti tadā paramārthata eva bhaveyuḥ, na tu saṃvṛtyā /
T04ksmadhlu:2549: yadi prasiddhā tāvad bādhā nirākṛtaivetyucyate, tadapi naiva yujyate, na hi pramāṇabādhitā mithyāsvabhāvā api māyādayo loke 'prasiddhāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2550: / ato vastusthitaṃ bhrāntaṃ vijñānamapi māyādivalloke prasiddhamityucyamānamapi na yujyate
T04ksmadhlu:2551: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva māyādisvamiyucyamānamapi na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2552: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva bhāyādisvabhāvaḥ sambhavati, loke
T04ksmadhlu:2554: māyādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi jñānasya tadabhinnatayā gṛhītāmithyākāratvenāvabhāsitatvāt tadapi tadvanmithyaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:2555: anyathā satyāsatyasvabhāvayostāvat ko hi sambandhaḥ syāt
T04ksmadhlu:2557: asti bādhāvirodha ityucyate, tadapi na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2558: yadi nāstyātmanā virodhastadā kathaṃ sa pramāṇena sādhayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2559: yadyastyāmani virodhaḥ, sa ca pramāṇaiḥ sidhyatyapītyucyate tadā sādhananirbharaḥ saḥ kathamasvīkāryaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2561: ityucyate cet, tadāsya visarjanaṃ pūrvamevāsmābhiḥ kṛtam /
T04ksmadhlu:2562: api ca, antarjñeyavādināṃ matānusāraṃ yadadvayajñāne ākāradvayaṃ sāgaraparvatabhūmijalādikaṃ tadaṃśatayopacaryate, tadekasmin kathaṃ viruddhāvabhāso 'nuvidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2564: anyathā sarve 'pi tattvavedino jāyeran, na ca prativādibhiḥ saha vivādā api jāyeran /
T04ksmadhlu:2566: na ca satyātmakasya jñānasya pratibhāsamārnairmithyākāraiḥ saha kaścanāpi sambandhaḥ, satyāsatyoḥ parasparaviruddhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2567: na hi bhavatāṃ mate virodho dṛśyata ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣatastattvadarśitvasambhavād muktyatthināṃ kṛte tattvabhāvānāyāḥ pratyatno nirarthaka eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2568: yadyevaṃ cintyate yad 'bhrānte vijñāne vividhāvabhāsānāṃ viruddhatve 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:2572: yadyevaṃ na syāt tadā tadanumānaṃ vastubalapravṛttameva na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2575: nābhidhīyate ' - yadyevaṃ vicāryate tadā sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇabhāvasya kathaṃ virodhaḥ pratipādyate, mithyābhūte tasmin vastubalapravṛttānumānaviṣayatvāsambhavāt sa viruddha iti nābhidheya eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2576: yadi [virodhaḥ] kriyate tadāvaśyamasmākamevesṭasiddhiḥ, na tu yuṣmākam /
T04ksmadhlu:2577: yato hi bhavatāṃ tathāvidhena virodhena mithyātvasiddhireva
T04ksmadhlu:2579: yadi sa mithyātvena prasādhyate tadāsmākameva pakṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ syād, yato vayamapi kāryakāraṇadeśakālahetupratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ satyāmapyapekṣāyāṃ [taṃ]
T04ksmadhlu:2580: pramāṇabādhitaṃ ca mithyā caiva manyāmahe, ata eva [saḥ] saṃvṛtau vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2581: tathāvidhavirodhakaraṇena bhavadbhiranyeṣāṃ vastugrahanivṛttiḥ kathaṃ nāma na svīkriyate, kintu nirdoṣābhidhānāttāvad bhavatāmeva bādhā syāt asmākaṃ tu pramāṇānāmapravṛttirapi nāsti, anyathā kathaṃ nāma saṃvṛtau sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2582: yathaiva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sidhyati tathaiva samyaktvena abhyupagatavatāṃ mithyāropanivṛttaye kevalaṃ vayaṃ pramāṇāni prayuñjamahe, nānyatra /
T04ksmadhlu:2583: pramāṇānāṃ prayoge satyapi naiva pratyakṣabādhā pravartate /
T04ksmadhlu:2584: pramāṇaistāvat kevalaṃ vastutattvasya yathāsthitireva svīkriyate, na tu prasiddhivirodho 'pi /
T04ksmadhlu:2589: abhrāntapramāṇena yo hi bādhyate, tasya naiva viṣayatvaṃ yujyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2591: yadhevaṃ na syāttadā spaṣṭāvabhāsitayā bāhyārthasya pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi na sa pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2592: phalata ekānekasvabhāvavirahitatve 'pi na sa niḥsvabhāvaḥ sidhyatītiḥ sidhyatīti syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2595: ataḥ svānurūpakāryakāranabhāvena anādikālikaparamparāagatānāṃ sarveṣāṃ janmanāṃ deśākālahetuviśeṣāpekṣitatve 'pi māyotpādavat saṃvṛtāveva vyavasthā
T04ksmadhlu:2597: ye khalu yathāprasiddhaṃ vyavasthāpayanti, teṣāṃ yadā samakālikāsamakālikavyavasthāyāṃ nāsti virodhastadā akṣaṇikatvādidoṣā api teṣu naiva prarvatante, alīkeṣu virodhasyāpravṛtteḥ māyāsvapnādisadṛśeṣu dharmeṣu paramārthatastāvat kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvādayo naiva hi yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2599: ye rūpasya nityatve 'nityatve vā ācaranti te nācaranti prajñāpāramitāyām tat kathamiti? tad rūpaṃ yadā nāsti tathā sat tadā kathaṃ tannityamanityaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2602: katipayeṣvanyeṣu [sutreṣu] yā khalu saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatā deśitā, sā prasādasaṃskārebhyo mānasamudvignaṃ kṛtvā kramaśo nairātmye praveśāyaiva deśitā /
T04ksmadhlu:2607: yadi māyādivadaṅkurotpādādiṣu bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyamabhyupagamyata iti cintyate tadā vastunaḥ svīkṛtireva syāt, yato hyevaṃ yāni sāṃvṛtikāni bījākhyāni tāni sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttānyevābhidheyāni /
T04ksmadhlu:2608: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā kathaṃ bhavadbhirlokāgavirodhaparihāraḥ kartuṃ śakyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:2609: vayaṃ tu yattāvat sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇebhyaḥ śaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttaṃ tadeva vastviti kathayāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2610: 'yadi bhavantastathāvidhamapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmnābhidhātumabhilaṣante tadā saharṣaṃ bravantu,
T04ksmadhlu:2611: saṃvṛtiparamārthaśavdairabhidhīyamānānāṃ vastūnām arthakriyākāritvābhedādi'tyevaṃ cintyate? tadapi naiva yaktum, yato hyevaṃ svapnādau gajāśvagnibhūmivṛṣabhādayo mithyābhāvā ye vividhārthakriyāṃ kurvāṇāḥ parasparabhinnaśarīrānugatā dṛśyante te yathaiva bhinnadeśakālavasthāsu dṛśyante tathaiva kiṃ sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttakāyāḥ santi? na vā? te yadyekāntena vinivṛttakāyāstadā tevāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2612: yadi te vinivṛttakāyā ityucyeta, tarhi kathaṃ bhavantaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2613: prasiddhivirodhasya parihāraṃ kariṣyanti? yadyucyeta yathāvabhāsaṃ tatsvabhāvo nāvatiṣṭhatītyataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2614: vastutaḥ santīti? etadapi naiva yujyate, yato hi tadā
T04ksmadhlu:2618: yadi jñānasvabhāvastāvad śuddhasphaṭika iva niraṃśaḥ kkacanāpyanavasthito nīlādivividhasvabhāveṣvanavabhāsamāna ityabhyupagamyate, tadā svapnādiṣu gajāśvādīni vastuni tatsvabhāvatvena na samudbhaviṣyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:2620: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā tathāvabhāso naiva śakyarūpaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2621: ata eva vayaṃ jñānasvabhāvātītaṃ viparītākāreṇāvabhāsitaṃ mithyātvāllaukikamabhyupagacchāmastathā parikalpitasvabhāvenocyamānameva vastutvena bhrānto viṣaya iti kathayāmaḥ, na tu jñānasvabhāvatvena so
T04ksmadhlu:2623: evaṃ vastvātmanā prasiddhamapi pramāṇena yathāvat sfuṭamavabhāsite 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:2624: paramārthatayā vastusvabhāvatvena na vyavasthāpayāmaḥ, yathā - tṛṇapuruṣaṃ puruṣatvena /
T04ksmadhlu:2625: ataḥ paramārthato vastuvapuṣābhūtaṃ yanmithyā tasmin pāramārthikasarvadoṣavirahitaśaśaśṛṅgadibhyo nivṛttamanivṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ naiva praviśatītyucyeta tadevaṃ yathoktaḥ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaḥ pramāṇena mithyāsvabhāvatvanokto 'pi na tathaiva cintanīyaḥ, yathā -
T04ksmadhlu:2626: māyāsvapnādyabhinno vastusvabhāvaḥ pramāṇena suspaṣṭīkṛtaḥ ayamapi paramārtha iti prajñapyate tadā saharṣaṃ prajñapyatāmutsavaścānubhūyatām,
T04ksmadhlu:2629: ācāryaḥ khalvatyantagambhīrasāgare paramārthanaye praveṣṭumasamarthānāṃ śāśvocchedādyaparadarśanānāṃ malaviśuddhayarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca pravṛttyarthaṃ ye paramārthanukūlāṃ yathāprasiddhāṃ puṇyajñānasambhārādyarthakṛyāṃ kurvanti, tānevātra paramārthataḥ saditi
T04ksmadhlu:2632: hi] te naiva santi paramārthataḥ saditi tu pūrvamevāveditam etadarśamaktaṃ vārtike - "yathāvaktu tathaiva" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2636: bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharmaṃ nirvāṇam, sarvasaṃskārāśca mithyā moṣadharmāṇaḥ' iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2638: bhavatīti kathaṃ na śaśaśṛṅgādayo 'pyavabhāsanta iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2639: bhavadbirapyasyottaraṃ dātavyaṃ syāt, yato hi keśādivanmithyāvabhāse 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:2641: yadi timirādihetupratyayādīnāṃ pratīniyatasāmarthyena tathā pratiniyatatvamityucyeta tadā asadvastuni kathaṃ nāma hetupratyayādīnāṃ pratiniyatasāmarthyamiti kathayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2642: yadi taddarśanena tathā bhavatīti cet? tadā tathaiva apareṣvapi pratiniyatahetupratyayatvena pratiniyatasāmarthye 'pi kimiti naiva tathā vyavasthā svīkriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2643: iyanmātreṇa vastutve 'pi naiva prasaṅgaḥ, tathā sati taimirikadṛṣṭakeśādīnāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi pūrvamevāveditam /
T04ksmadhlu:2644: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā taimirikairadhyālambitānāṃ mithyākeśāṃdīnāṃ hetupratyayā api kathaṃ nāma niyatāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2645: taimirikakeśādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvenāpi satyatvaṃ naiva yujyata iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2646: api ca, yadi jñānasvabhāvaḥ satyatvena siddhaṃ syāttadā keśādayo na tato bhinnā iti teṣāmapi satyatvenāvabodhaḥ syāt, kintu tadasiddhamiti pūrvamevābhihitam /
T04ksmadhlu:2647: keśādayastu mithyātvena lokena pramāṇena ca siddhā eva
T04ksmadhlu:2648: / ato jñānamapi keśādimithyāsvabhāvenābhinnatvāt tathaiva mithyāmātramiti kathaṃ keśādīnāṃ tatsvabhāvatvena satyatvaṃ syāditi /
