T04ksmadhlu:2649: yathā sarvaṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni tathaiva saṃvṛtāvapyutpannāni bhavituṃ na śaknuvanti, tathā hi - ye tāvat paramārthato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ saṃvṛtāvapi notpādaḥ, yathā - śaśaśṛṅgādaya iti ye bruvanti teṣāṃ māyādibhiranaikāntikatvam, sādhyavaiparītye sati heturapi sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ na hi dṛṣṭamātreṇeṣṭasiddhiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2651: ataḥ paramārthato 'sato yadi saṃvṛtāvapyasattvaṃ tadā saṃvṛtisatyasyaiva vināśaprasaṅgaḥ, phalataḥ ko 'pi viparyayo na syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2653: saṃvṛtāvapi adṛṣṭotpadāḥ śaśaśṛṅgādayo na tathāvidhakarmaṇāṃ sañcayābhāvāna tu
T04ksmadhlu:2656: na hetupratyayanirbharatāmātreṇa vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ māyādimithyāvastūnāṃ hetupratyayasamūhabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2657: na hi darśanamātreṇa vastūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ sanniti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2663: ye paramārthataścatuṣkoṭikotpādarahitāste niḥsvabhāvā e, yathā gagananalinam /
T04ksmadhlu:2664: [32] vivādādhikaraṇāśca sarve padārthāstatsadṛśā eva, evaṃvādinaṃ kaścit 'kathaṃ nāma ekasmādekasyānutpattibodhaḥ' iti pṛcchatīti cet? na hi pramāṇanivṛttyā vastusvabhāvanivṛttiḥ, tasya tadutpādakatvatadātmakatvābhāvāt yadi kecit 'tadanaṅgīokārāt kaścit tatkhaṇḍayatīti 'kathayantīti cet? tadayuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2665: yadi kecana' īśvarādinā ekena jagad utpadyata iti kathayantīti cet? etadapi na yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2666: yadyekamādekasyotpattiriti tadā sā nityād vā anityād vā bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:2673: nityatāyā hānisadbhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tasyotpādakatvaṃ vistareṇa nirākriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2677: na hi nityānityābhyāṃ vyatiriktastasya kaścanotpādaka iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2678: ye cānyaiḥ [vādibhiḥ] ekasvabhāvā īśvarādayo jagato 'sya hetavo manyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2681: ata ekasmādekasyotpattirna bhavatīti kathanakāle bhrāntatayā īśvarādikaṃ yannirdiśanti, tattu arthasthiterajñānamevodghoṣayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2682: na hi īśśvarādayo hetutvena astitvabhājo bhavanti, paraistasya nityasvabhāvatvenopajñapitatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2683: nityastāvat sarvasāmarthyaśūnya iti ca pūrvameva prasādhitatatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2684: yadi punaḥ paraiste [īśvarādayaḥ] kevalamanityatvenopakalpyante, tadāpi tasmādekasyaiva phalasyotpattirnaiva yuktimatī, yato hi tato yadi bhinnasantānavartināṃ phalānāmutpattirbhavati, tadā tasya anyasajātīyakṣaṇasya pratisandhānābhāvād dvitīya eva kṣaṇe samucchedaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2686: yadyevaṃ tadā tataḥ sadā vijātīyaphalānāmutpattikāle sarveṣāṃ pūrvasajātīyakṣaṇānāṃ paścādvartini kṣaṇe pratisandhānābhāvād ye tāvadanityasvabhāvā īśvarādisaṃjñakā jagato hetutvenopajñāpyante, te ke?
T04ksmadhlu:2688: svabhāvenābhidhīyante, tadapi naiva yuktam, hetorabhāvena tasyotpatterasambhavāt athavā sampūrnameva jagat tadvadahetukameva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2689: yato hi pūrvamapi paścādapi taddhetutvena [sarvathā] kimapi nāstīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2692: yadi tasyāparo 'nyo hetuḥ parikalpayate, tadā sa eva kathaṃ na tasya
T04ksmadhlu:2696: abhinnasantāne vidyamāno sa heturanādikālāt tasyāmeva santatau pravṛtta eveti, naivānyasantāne vidyamānaḥ sannutpattikāraka iti kalpyate tadā tasmin paramārthato 'samakālatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:2697: anyatra ca sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirapi naiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ bahuśo nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2698: ataccāpi hetubhedasya abhinnakārake prasaṅgaśca paścāt pratipādayiṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2700: yadyante cakṣurādayastāvat phalasyaikasya niyatotpādakā iti manyante, tadā andhavadhiratvaprasaṅgaḥ durnivāra eva syāt, yato hi cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi
T04ksmadhlu:2703: samuha eva tāvad vijñānaphalamutpādayati, ato naikasmādekasya phalotpattiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2706: yadyevaṃ tadā hetubhedo bhedaniyāmako naiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2707: yo hi ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2708: sa khalu hetubhedenaiva kṛtaḥ, na tu prakṛtyā janita iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2709: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ahetukānyeva tāvad vastūni syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2710: tatra hetubhede 'pi yadi phalabhedo na syāttadā hetorbhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedau na kṛtau
T04ksmadhlu:2713: itthaṃ naiva te samūhād vyatiriktāḥ sidhyanti, naiva ca te samūhāt pṛtham kartuṃ śakyante
T04ksmadhlu:2714: parantu parasparabhinnasvabhāvāt pratyekasmādutpattisāmarthayavato yadi phalamudbhuyate tadā abhinnameva kathaṃ nāmodbhūyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2715: yadi sarva evaikaphalotpādane samarthāḥ, na tvanekaphalotpādana ityevaṃ cettadapi na yuktam
T04ksmadhlu:2716: yadyevaṃ tadā sajātīyaphalapratīsandhānābhāvād dvītiye tāvat kṣaṇe cakṣurādisantānānoccheda eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2717: yadi teṣu sajātīyakṣaṇotpāde sāmarthyamityucyate tadā tadanyadeva tāvad vastu syāttataśca sāmarthyameva hetuḥ syānna na khalu vastu /
T04ksmadhlu:2719: upakurvantyeveti cet, samarthāntarasya tatrāpekṣitatvādanavasthākhyastāvad doṣa eva syāt
T04ksmadhlu:2720: yadi te svabhāvabhūtaṃ samarthamuparkurvantīti manyate tadā phalamapi tathaiva kiṃ na kurvantīti
T04ksmadhlu:2725: ataḥ kathaṃ nāma phalaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2727: ekaikahetunirbharamityataḥ [phalaṃ] bhinnaṃ syāditi cintyate, tadapi naiva yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2730: ataḥ phalasya sajātīya vijātīyatayorbhedo naiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2732: prasaṅgasya ko hyarthaḥ? yadi khaṇḍaśo notpādayatītyarthastadā
T04ksmadhlu:2733: vastusvabhāvasya niraṃśatvād aśaṃtaścotpādasyāsvīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ nāma prasaṅgaḥ syāt, tallakṣaṇasyānupapannātvāditi
T04ksmadhlu:2734: yadi viśeṣako [bhedako] na bhavatītyevamartho gṛhyate tadā asiddhamevaitat /
T04ksmadhlu:2735: hetubhistāvadanekebhyo vijātīyaphalebhyo viparītameva jantaya ityabhidhānamapi naiva yuktam, yato hyekasya aṃśata utpatterasambhavāditi prasaṅgo naivocyate, parantu bhavanto ye vastuṣu parasparaṃ vyatirekaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2736: viśeṣaṃ vā manvate, sa vividhairhetubhireva kriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2737: yadi vividhahetūnaṅgīkṛtyāpi phalamekavidhameva svīkṛyate tadā bhrāntisadbhāvād vastūnāṃ tāvad bhedo vividhahetubhirakṛta eva syādityevaṃ prasaṅgo nūnamabhidhānīyaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2739: phalaviśeṣasyābhilāpaḥ, so 'pyasambaddha eva, yato hi ye viśeṣātmakatvena
T04ksmadhlu:2741: sajātīyalakṣaṇotpattito 'pi nivartante, tadā tebhya utpadyaṃ sajātīyaṃ phalaṃ vijātīyaṃ ca naiva parasparanivṛttaṃ syād,
T04ksmadhlu:2743: yadi hetavaste nivṛttisvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ sajātīyaphalanāṃ bhedakā api
T04ksmadhlu:2744: bhaviṣyantītyucyate, tadā tathaiva te sāmānyaphale 'pi kathaṃ na bhedakāḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:2745: yato hi tatra sarve ekaikā hetavo bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2746: ye tāvadekotpādakasvabhāvā eva te tato viparītaṃ kamapyanyaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktāḥ, yato hi
T04ksmadhlu:2747: utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttyā anyārtha iva bhavanti, nānye utpādakasvabhāvā iti
T04ksmadhlu:2748: / punaste parasparanivṛttasvabhāvāḥ kintu naiva te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2750: kathyate, kintu ye ekenotpādyasvabhāvāste nānyeneti kathyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2751: api ca, te svasvabhāvanaivotpādayanti, na tvanyasvabhāvena,
T04ksmadhlu:2752: atadātmakatvāt, te ca yathāsvaṃ bhinnā api /
T04ksmadhlu:2753: svasvabhāvenotpādayantītyasmin kathane ko virodhaḥ? ekasvabhāvasyābhāvo naiva tasya svabhāvo bhavituṃ śaknoti, akārakatvāttasya /
T04ksmadhlu:2754: tenaiva tatphalaṃ niṣpādanīyamiti yaduktaṃ tatra kā yuktiriti cet sāṃkhyaireva tatsamādhānaṃ vidheyamiti śobhanaṃ pratibhāti /
T04ksmadhlu:2755: yato hi te khalu bhinnabhinnasvabhāvaṃ jagaditi pratipādayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2756: atasteṣāṃ yattatra grahaṇaṃ tannivṛtyarthameva ācāryeṇa bhinnavastunirdeśakānāṃ kṛte vyavahāravaśāduktam tāni [vastūni] pratītyasamutpannatayā naiva paramārthata ekārthāni nāpi ca bhinnarthānīti manvānāṃ kṛte naiva kimapyuktamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:2757: teṣāṃ tāvadanusāraṃ tu māyāsadṛśatvāt sarveṣu teṣu na kimapyekaṃ vastu bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2758: api ca, yadi vastuṣu paramārthataḥ svabhavadvayam, ekaścotpādakalakṣaṇaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2761: yasmin samaye sarva evotpādakasvabhāvastasmin samaye yadi te parasparanivṛttasvabhāvā api tadā utpādakasvabhāvato nivṛttatvāt kathaṃ nāmotpādakāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2763: ekamutpādayanti viruddhasvabhāve 'pi ca sati naiva parīkṣāyogyā iti yadi
T04ksmadhlu:2764: bhavadbhirucyate tadā pādau prasārya tathātāparīkṣātaḥ parāṅmukhabuddhayo ye vyavahāramātramanusaranti te sukhenāsituṃ śaknuvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2765: ye tu tathātāparīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtabuddhayasteṣāṃ kṛte tathaiva sukhāsanaṃ naiva yuktarūpam /
T04ksmadhlu:2766: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā īśvarādistāvadekaḥ sannapi svabhāvabhede
T04ksmadhlu:2767: 'pi ca sati krameṇa yugapad vā vicitrasyāsya jagato heturupeṇa naiva
T04ksmadhlu:2768: kathamapi viruddho bhaviṣyati, tatsvabhāvasya tathaiva svabhāvasiddhatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2769: / svabhāvabhede 'pi nāsti parīkṣāyogya ityabhidadhatāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāmottaraṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2770: dattaṃ syāt? tenaiva phalamutpādanīyamiti pratipādayatāṃ tatra kā yuktiriti ye kathayanti teṣāṃ kṛte agnyādikamapekṣyotpadyamāno dhūmastāvad śakramūrdhato 'uputpadyata iti kathanaṃ yathā ahetukatve yuktyā prasaṅgatayocyate, tathaivātra kimiti nocyate? vyavahāre 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:2771: ekasamūhāntargato yadyekaphalasyotpādako bhavettadā naiva viruddhaḥ, kintu samūhāntargatastu viruddha evetyevaṃ kathayadbhiḥ saha nāsti kaścana bhedaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2772: atrāpi agnyādibhireva phalamutpādanīyam, na tu śakramūrdhādyanyairiti ye
T04ksmadhlu:2774: samuho 'pi bhinnaḥ svabhāvataścotpanna ityevamabhidadhānaiḥ saha ko virodha iti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2775: tatra yathā ekasamūhamāśrityotpadyamānaṃ phalaṃ samūhāntareṇāpyutpadyate tadā tenotpādyasya svabhāvasyāniyatatvād ahetuka ityucyate, tathaiva ekasminneva samūhe vijñānādayo yadā ekahetumapekṣyāpi tadvilakṣaṇahetuta utpadyante tadā kimityahetukatāyāḥ prasaṅgo noktaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2776: hetoryathātmakena prayogeṇa nirduṣṭāt svabhāvaviśeṣād hetubhedo bhedakaśca viruddhāveva syātām
T04ksmadhlu:2777: yato hi cakṣurādinā bhinnasvabhāvena cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ phalānāmutpattikāle sākṣād bhedābhāve
T04ksmadhlu:2778: pratītisvabhāvād rūpādayaḥ pṛthagviṣayatvena niyatā bhavanti, tadvikāreṇa ca tathotpadyante
T04ksmadhlu:2779: te cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samantarapratyayena ca pratītisvabhāvāḥ syuḥ, na tu cakṣurādayastathā niyatāḥ santi /
T04ksmadhlu:2783: indriyeṣu samanantarapratyaye cāpi nāsti viṣayagrahaṇasvabhāvaḥ, viṣayeṇa ca samantarapratyayena cāpi pṛthaktayā viṣayagrahaṇaṃ naiva niyatam /
T04ksmadhlu:2784: evaṃvidhayā niyatavyavasthayā niścayena hetubhedo bhedaka eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2785: bheda eva bhinnaviśeṣa ityasau vicāro yadi vyavahāratayā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthamevocyate tadā tu sutarāṃ yajyate, na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2786: atha ye tāvad bhedāstee aprajñaptimātrātmakā vā nivṛttiviśeṣeṇa prajñaptisvabhāvātmakā vā? yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastadā vijñānasya ālambanādasvabhāvādabhinnatvena tathaivānekatvaprasaṅgaḥ ālamanādisvabhāvo 'pi vijñānavannaiva tāvadekatvanivṛttaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2789: tathaivābhinne 'pi rūpādibhya utpadyata ityucyata iti cedekasmin ekadā
T04ksmadhlu:2790: parasparaviruddhāvutpādānutpādau kathaṃ nāma na viruddhau syātāmityayaṃ doṣo naiva yujyatāmiti vicārya ye viśeṣān vijñānato bhinnārthatvena kalpayanti teṣāṃ tadā vijñānamahetukaṃ syād anyasminneva tadā cakṣurādīnāṃ yogāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2792: yadi prajñaptisvabhāva iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ svīkriyate tadāpi vijñānasyāhetukatvaṃ prasajyata eva, prajñatyātmakatve cakṣurādīnāmupayogābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2793: prajñaptyātmakatve kasyāpi yogo naiva bhavatītyataḥ sarveṣāmahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2794: phalataḥ paramārthato 'nekebhya ekasya phalasyotpattirnaiva sarvathā yujayata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2796: itthaṃ cakṣuryadisvaviśeṣatayā tajjātīyakṣaṇasyotpādakatvāt svavijñānamutpādayatiti, tadā hetubhedābhāve 'pi phalasya bhinnatvāt phalasya tāvad bhedābhedau kathaṃ nāhetukāviti /
T04ksmadhlu:2797: yena khalu kāraṇena tatra phalāntarotpattimattve nāstyanyaḥ [kaścana]
T04ksmadhlu:2798: viśeṣaḥ, niraṃśatvāt sarvavastūnām, ato hettuatāvat svabhāvapracyuto
T04ksmadhlu:2799: bhūtvā phalaṃ notpādayatīti, tathāpi tasmin hetvātmakatve bhedābhāvāt tannirvṛte phale 'pi tāvad bhedo na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2800: ekasmādanekasya anekasmādekasyotpattiryā kathyate, kiṃ sā naiva dṛśyate?
T04ksmadhlu:2801: [arthāt dṛśyata eva], atastasyāḥ parihāraṃ kartuṃ śakyata ityabhidhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate
T04ksmadhlu:2803: darśanamātraṃ tu naiva tāvat pramāṇamapi, svapnavanmithyābhāsamānatvāat /
T04ksmadhlu:2804: yad yathā dṛśyate tattathaiva sadityabhiniviśamānānāṃ kevalaṃ mithyākalpanānāṃ nirākaraṇāya svapna iva sādhyamānatvānnāsti tāvad virodho 'pīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2805: api ca, cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ yānyanekasmādutyadyamānāni dṛśyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2806: teṣāṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvastāvadekatvena naiva kathamapi siddhaḥ, sadā vibhinneṣvākoraṣvavabhāsamānatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2810: ekasya cānekaṣāṃ ca vastūnāṃ paramārthata utpattistāvat kutra samavalokyate?
T04ksmadhlu:2812: ekaikasya phalasya stāvadanaikairhetubhiḥ kriyamāṇatvādayamapi pakṣastāvadanekasmādekasyaivotpattipakṣaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2815: yadhekasmin phale ekaikasya hetoryogaḥ kriyate, tadā pakṣo 'yam
T04ksmadhlu:2818: ato nāstyayamasiddho heturapi koṭīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo 'pi kaścanotpattipakṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2822: ācāryo 'pi saṃvṛtau kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitiṃ svīkṛtya yathā vyavahāre ekasmādanekasya cānekasmādekasya
T04ksmadhlu:2824: cakṣurādibhiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmutpattiviśeṣaṃ jñātvā bālāpṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ kāryahetvorbhedakāle yadi heturbhinnastadā kāryabhedo 'pi sutarāṃ syādityuktavān, na tu paramārthadaśāyām, paramārthato 'siddhatvāttasya, yathā vicāritaṃ prāgeva
T04ksmadhlu:2825: / ekasmād hetoranekaphalānāmutpattirayuktetyādikaṃ yaduktam, teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ samādhānamapi pṛthakpṛthasmāmiḥ pūrvameva kṛtam /
T04ksmadhlu:2826: [33] 'pratītyasamutpannātvād" ityayaṃ yo hetuḥ, sa anaikāntika iti ye kathitavantasteṣāmapyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2827: [34] yadi vastūni paramārthato na sasvabhāvāni, tadā naiva tāni
T04ksmadhlu:2828: saṃvṛtāvapi bhavituṃ śakyānīti yaduktam, tasyāpyutaraṃ pūrvaṃ pradattameva
T04ksmadhlu:2829: / ' ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvāt' iti hetoryadasiddhātvādikamuktam, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi samādhānaṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pūrvaṃ samyaktayā kṛtameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2830: tathāpi ye tāvat kecana dveṣavaśād dūṣaṇāni prayuñjate, sā teṣāṃ vipratītirevetyabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2831: [35] yadi te prasaṅgaṃ sādhayanti, tadā naiva hetorasiddhiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2834: tatra yaistāvat kadācid īśvarādayo nityaikatvasvabhāvena parikalpitāstaisteṣu kramotpādadharmayogo 'pi yataḥ svīkriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2836: yato hyekasvabhāvatāyāmanutpādāsthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvakālavat paścātkāle 'pyutpādakasvabhāvatā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2837: yadyutpādaka eva svabhāvaḥ syāttadā pūrvāvasthātaḥ svabhāvasya bhinnalakṣaṇatvādekatvahānireva syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2838: te [īśvarādayaḥ] tāvadanekatve 'pi naiva yujyante, yato hi tattvatāyāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2839: samakālikatvamaparasmiṃśca svaparapratisandhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva
T04ksmadhlu:2840: ye tāvadākāśādīnāṃ trayāṇāmasaṃkṛtānāmekasvabhāvatvaṃ phalapratisandhānābhāvaṃ ca teṣāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2841: svīkurvanti, tairapi jñānasvabhāvasya kramodbhūtatvaṃ tāvat svīkriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2842: atastatsāmarthyastairapyekasvabhāvarahitataiva svīkṛtā syāt, yato hi pratyekajñānāttajjñeyasvabhāvastāvad bhinna eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2843: yadi na syāttadābhinnatvāt pūrvavat tajjñāne jñeyasvabhāvo naivopapannaḥ syādata ekasvabhāvastāvannaiva yujyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2845: ye tāvannityaikasvabhāvāḥ kālapuruṣapradhānabrahmādayaśca vicitrāyā asyā jagadvyavasthāyā hetutvena parikalpyante, te yadi satyāsatyādivividhasvabhāvāṃ vastusāmagrīṃ krameṇa yugapad vā gṛhṇantīti
T04ksmadhlu:2846: svīkriyate tadā tatsāmarthyata ekatvarahita eva svabhāve te niyamena te niyamena svīkṛtāḥ syuḥ, yato hi vividhasvabhāvasya jagato grahaṇe ekasvabhāvā naiva yujyante /
T04ksmadhlu:2848: tadānekatvamapi teṣāṃ sutarāṃ naiva yujyate, saṃghātasvabhāvatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2849: ye tāvat pudgalāmidhaṃ padārthaṃ nityānityatvenānirvacanīyamiti parikalpayanti te 'uyenam ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvena sākṣāt svīkurvantyeva, phalata ekasvabhāvasya tāvannityatve 'nirvacanīyatā naiva yuktimatī /
T04ksmadhlu:2852: kāyaḥ bhūmiparvatādayo ye 'nityāḥ sāvayavāḥ pṛthaksvabhāvāstān ekadravyatnena parikalpayanti, te 'pi tadavayavadravyaṃ bhinnānekaviṣayavyāpakamiti svīkurvantyata ekatvarahitataiva teṣāṃ svīkṛtā
T04ksmadhlu:2853: syāt yato hi yadi tasya pratyekasminnavayave nāsti bhinnasvabhāvastadā naiva tasmin vyapakatāpyupapadyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2855: ye tāvad dehādīnāṃ paramāṇusañcayātmakatvāt tān paramāṇūn pṛthakśaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2856: parikalpayanti, te 'pi teṣu saṃyogasaṃghātādīn svīkurvantyevetyatastaistatsāmarthyātteṣāmekatvarahitatāpi svīkṛtaiva syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2857: yato hi niraṃśasvabhāve [vastuni] yatraiva hi saṃyogādayo 'nubhūyante, tatra tādṛśo nāstyeva kaścana pakṣaḥ [bhāgaḥ],
T04ksmadhlu:2858: yasmin pakṣeṇa kenacit saha saṃyogaḥ sañcayo vā na bhavanti, tādṛśeṣu
T04ksmadhlu:2861: paramāṇuṣu cāvayavidravyeṣu cobhayeṣu tāvadanekasvabhāvatvamapi na yujyate, yato hi sañcitasvabhāvātmakatvātte yadā naivaikasvabhāvatve yujyante tadā tatparatantratayā vyavasthitatvena teṣāmanekasvabhāvatvamapi naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2862: itthaṃ yadā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi dravyamekānesvabhāvarahitaṃ siddham, tadā tadādhārena kalpitanāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2863: guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghātasya cāpi siddhiḥ sutarāṃ naiva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2866: jñānamapi tāvat kāmamekasvabhāvamityupakalpyatāṃ kintu tatsvarūpaṃ vividhasyabhāvagrāhakamiti svīkṛtatvāt tatsāmarthyata ekasvabhāvarahitameva taditi svīkṛtaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2867: yato hi tajjñānaṃ tāvat sākāramityavaśyaṃ svīkarttavyam, anyathā viṣayākāreṇa yo nākāritastasya jñānakāyasya viṣayaġrāhakarūpeṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ nopapannaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2868: yadi sākāratvena svīkriyate tadā tasyaikasvabhāvarahitatvamapi spaṣṭatayā svīkṛtameva syāt, vibhinnātmakatvājjñānakāyasya /
T04ksmadhlu:2870: ataḥ sarvāṇyeva tāvajjñānāni vibhinnānāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayitvena svīkriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:2874: citradarśanakāle citrākāraṃ vijñānamupajāyamāanamanubhūyate, ataḥ sarvajñānāni citrākāratvena prasidhyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2878: guṇakarmasamavetānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ tāvajjñānena yugapadgrahaṇasvīkārād apare 'pi [siddhāntavādinaḥ] jñānaṃ citrākāratvenaiva svīkurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2879: ye hi dravyaparyāyādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvaṃ vastu tāvanmecakamaṇivadityāmananti, teṣvapi tadviṣayimanaso
T04ksmadhlu:2884: ye 'pyatītādiviṣayakaṃ manovijñānamātramanālambanamiti manvate, teṣāmapi mate 'bhidhānākāreṇa yuktatvāttadekākāramiti na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2886: svapnādijñānānyapi nīlādivibhinnākārān anubhavantīti tanyekasvabhāvānīti naiva yuktāni /
T04ksmadhlu:2887: ye khalu vijñānamātrasvabhāvaṃ jagadityāmananti, te bāhyapadārthānāmaviṣayibhūtatvāttat svasaṃvedanasvarūpaṃ paryantaṃ ca jñānamiti svīkurvanti, te 'pyanādikālīnabhrāntavāsānāparipākavaśād
T04ksmadhlu:2888: rūpādivibhinnaviparītāvabhāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiṃ svīkurvantyato vijñānamekasvabhāvamiti naivābhyupagacchanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2889: phalato darśaneṣu kasminnapi vijñānaṃ naikasvabhāvamiti sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2891: sidhyati, tadā anekasvabhāvo 'pi na sidhyatīti bahuśaḥ pūrvamāveditam /
T04ksmadhlu:2892: ata eva svātantryeṇa sādhako hetirapyayaṃ nāsiddha iti yathoktanayena vādiprativādyubhyeṣu sarve dharma ekānekasvabhāvarahitā eva siddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2893: ye va vyavacchedamātrātmakāsteṣu sādhyasādhanānugato dharmeyeva avastubhūtaḥ sidhyatīti pūrvamanekadhā nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2895: punaśca, heturapyayaṃ kathaṃ sidhyati? yadyunupalabdhyeti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2898: pratyakṣeṇānupalabdhisiddhirapi, pratyakṣasyāviṣayatvādityapi kathanaṃ nirākṛtameva, yato hi yathoktanayenaiva te hetuṃ sādhayantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2899: ityevaṃ ye kecidindriyairagamyā ātmādayaste tadvyāptakramikakāryayogādidharmāṇāṃ svīkṛtyā ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvenaiva prasiddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2900: yadi dharmyeva tāvadasiddhastadā tadrāhityacintanamapyayuktam, tādṛśānāṃ vastūnāṃ pratiṣedhāya dharmiṇaḥ parīkṣāyāḥ sarvatrānivāryatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2902: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] tadā tanniṣedhāya bhavatāmapi arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogalakṣaṇo hetustāvat kathaṃ siddho bhaviṣyatīti codanā kathaṃ na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2903: paraparikalpite dharmiṇi tathāvidhakramikakāryāṇāṃ svīkṛtyaiva tadvyāptadharmāṇāṃ niṣpattestanmatamātrāśritatvād dharmiṇastasya tāvat parikalpitatvameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2904: anumānena tathā jñāne satyapi nāstyevānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, svataḥ pramāṇatvāttasya /
T04ksmadhlu:2905: vyavahāreṇāpi tāvat sādhyavyāptasādhanasya siddhatvāditi pūrvameva samyaguktatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2906: rūpādayastāvad dhārmiṇaḥ, ye khalvaparokṣāste 'pi pratyakṣata ekasvabhāvarahitā eva, vividheṣvākāreṣu sarvadā pratibhāsanādaviśeṣeṇa
T04ksmadhlu:2908: ekasvabhāvahitatvena siddhe satyanekasvabhāvarāhityamapi sutarāṃ pratyakṣataḥ siddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:2913: yadi pratyakṣamapi tathaivetyucyeta, evaṃ satyasambaddhatvādanaikāntikatvamevāsya hetoriti
T04ksmadhlu:2916: tathaiva jñeyaḥ, kintu naiva sa paramārthato 'san, marīcikāsu jalajñānādṛśatvāttasya /
T04ksmadhlu:2917: āropasvabhāvātmakatvāt sarvapratyakṣāṇāṃ kathaṃ hi tairekānekasvabhāvayuktatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyata iti cintāyāṃ heturyamatra māyākārāpratyakṣānumānābhyāmanaikāntika eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2918: yato hi māyākārajñāne tāvad yo 'yaṃ gajādyākārāropastasmin svabhāve paramārthato nabhiniveśo jāyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2920: evaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣasya nirākṛte 'pi bhāntikāraṇe kadācidanyāropākārasvabhāvavataḥ [jñānasya] utpattirbhavatīti paramārthatastatsvabhāve 'nabhiniveśena hetunā niyatena tāvattadviviktaviṣayitvena vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2921: tathaivānumānajñānamapi yaddhi sāmānye tāvad vastulakṣaṇe samāropākāram, tadapi vastutathatāyā yathāvajjñānasvabhāvatvāt tadviṣayakaṃ bhavatīti
T04ksmadhlu:2923: nāsti tadviṣayīti kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yuktm, aścaśṛṅgavad vastūnāmabhyupagamābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2924: tarhi kathamiti cet? māyādisvabhāvavaditi, māyādivat pratyakṣatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2929: vividhaprakārādiliṅgaiḥ sarve yadyekasvabhāvarahitatvena sādhyante tadā te
T04ksmadhlu:2933: vyavahāre ghaṭādiviṣayaparicchedena puruṣā atulyasambaddhān vyavahārayogyānatyantaṃ paricchedayanti
T04ksmadhlu:2938: paricchedo yadi naiva viccinnastadā sa nāstyeva, parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāttayoḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2939: ye tāvat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste sarvatra vyāpinaḥ, ye hi sarvatra
T04ksmadhlu:2942: vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛtterniyatatvānnāsti tāvad heturapi sadigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ, apareṣāṃ skandhānāmabhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2943: vyāpyasya vyāpakasya vā vastunaḥ svato 'siddhatvādasiddha eva sa heturiti
T04ksmadhlu:2945: tathaiva dharmiṇyeva kevale vyāpyasadbhāvasidhyarthaṃ vyāpakanivṛtyā vyāpyanivṛttirasiddhaivetyapare
T04ksmadhlu:2947: evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakādisarvavastūnāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃvṛttyāśritatvaṃ prasādhya paścād vyavasthā kṛtetyapi pūrvamāveditameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2948: atyantaṃ samīpavartini vyāpake niyataṃ vyāpyaviśeṣajñānaṃ naiva bhavatītyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam
T04ksmadhlu:2953: vyāpakanivṛttistu paramārthamāśrayate, ato vivādāspadībhūteṣu sarvadharmiṣu sāmānyena sādhayitumiṣyamāṇatvāt kathamimau dvau [vyāpyavyāpakau] ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritāviti cet? ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritatve 'pi [mithaḥ] sāpekṣatvād bhinnāveveti nāsti doṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2956: [36-37] yaḥ khalu sādhyaḥ, sādhako vā tau prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvau, na vā tathāsvabhāvau? prathame tāvatpakṣe tau naiva
T04ksmadhlu:2958: / ye sarvābhilāpavigatalakṣaṇāste na kathañcanāpi bodhyā bodhakāśca,
T04ksmadhlu:2963: [40] abhinnasvabhāvā api kecana na bodhyabodhakabhāvāpannāḥ, vṛkṣaśākhāvat
T04ksmadhlu:2968: ato 'vaśyaṃ vyāpakadharmanivṛttyaiva īśvarādīnāṃ nirākaraṇaṃ karttavyam, atyantaparokṣeṣu pratyakṣeṇa niṣeddhuśakyatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2969: atastasmin kathaṃ na sarva vivādā āpateyuriti /
T04ksmadhlu:2970: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2971: tathā bhāvā yatra vicāryante na te santi savabhāvataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2975: yadi niḥsvabhāvatā tatra naiva bodhyata iti cettadā aśvaśṛṅgasyāpi bodhābhāvaḥ kathaṃ nollikhyate
T04ksmadhlu:2976: bhavatāmabhilāpalakṣaṇarahitāḥ sarva bhāvā na manāgapi bodhyanta ityādiprayogeṣu vidyata eva sādhyasādhakayorniṣedhasvabhāvaḥ, ataḥ kīdṛśastāvadayaṃ bodhakabhāvaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2978: ato nāsti prayogakauśalamapi sarvesāṃ vastunāṃ niścetavyaprasaṅgālliṅgasyaiva vastuno bodho na kenāpi
T04ksmadhlu:2980: ato niyatameva liṅgaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bodhyate, sādhyākārasya niyamenotpādakatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2981: liṅgaṃ tāvat kalpanayā bodhakatvena vyavasthitamiti yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2982: ato niḥ svabhāvatve 'pi niayatatadākārasya sādhyakāraniścayotpattau hetutvād
T04ksmadhlu:2984: kevalasya vastubhūtaliṅgasyaiva sarvatra nollekho bhavati, ākāśaniṣedhakasya liṅgasya nitarāṃ kalpitatvādeveti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2986: yadabhihitam, tatrāpi yadi vastubhūtaḥ sambandha evaiko hetutvena
T04ksmadhlu:2990: dvayorniṣpannayoḥ [vastunoḥ] svabhāvaḥ śliṣṭa iti nopapadyate, svasvabhāve vyavasthitatvāttayoḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2993: ekatve sati naiva dvayāśritvaṃ tāvad yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2994: yadi sa sambandhibhyo 'rthāntara iti tadā svasvabhāvavyavasthitatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2996: yadi nāstyarthāntara iti tadā kevalaṃ sambandhināveva syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:2999: yāni hi sambandhodbhūtāni lakṣaṇāni tānyapi kalpanātmakānyeva, kāryakāraṇeyoryugapatsambhavā bhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3001: api ca, yadā kāryasvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ tadā apekṣāvirahānnaiva tasya
T04ksmadhlu:3003: ato nāsti tasya kenāpi saha sambandhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3004: apariniṣpanne 'pi tasmin kāraṇena saha sambandhakāle vidūre sthitatvādasambaddhameva tat syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3008: hetuṃ badhnāti kāryeṇa kāryaṃ na, tacca kīdṛśam //
T04ksmadhlu:3012: ataḥ kalpanāracitamūrtitvāt sarveṣāṃ sambandhānām, abhāve caivānupahatapravṛtterhetorasiddhireva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3013: asambaddhatve sati abhedābhāvāt kathaṃ tādṛśī yaktiḥ, prayujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3014: abhede sati tadātmaka eva sambandha iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3015: vastumātra eva tādātmyasambandhaḥ, na tvanyatreti cet? ayuktametad,
T04ksmadhlu:3020: tatra 'abhinnatvad' ityayaṃ heturyadi paramārthādhikāreṇocyeta tadā anekāntika eva, yato hi kṛtakatvānityatve
T04ksmadhlu:3021: yadyapi paramārthato naiva bhinne tathāpi bodhyabodhakavastuṣu tāvat te dṛśyete /
T04ksmadhlu:3022: yadi vyavahāre 'pi tayornāsti bhinnatvamityucyeta tadā asiddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:3024: evameva śabdādidharmiṇi yadā akṛtakatvādito nivṛttirniścīyate tadā nityādito 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3026: nivṛttiviśeṣāpekṣayā kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ bhinnavyavasthāyā upakalpanād bodhyabodhakavastuvyavasthā tāvat kriyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3027: itthaṃ yadā vastūni sāmarthyataḥ pratimbivad ekānekasvabhāvavinivṛttāni bhavanti tadā paramārthasvabhāvato 'pi teṣāṃ nivṛttirniyataiva /
T04ksmadhlu:3028: ato nivṛttiviśesāpekṣayā kṛtakatvaṃ bhinnaṃ vyavasthāpyate, ata eva ca tatra bodhyabodhakabhāvo 'pi sambhavatyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:3029: punaśca, yathā nityaṃ tāvd vastu arthakriyāsāmarthyavirahād vastusvabhāvena rahitaṃ sādhyate, tathaiva anyatrāpi tatsadṛśatvānna virudhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3030: [41] yadapi atadvyāvṛttiviśeṣeṇānayoḥ kṛtakatvaṃ tad vastu syāt
T04ksmadhlu:3035: yathā nityavastuniṣedhāya arthakriyāsāmārthyarahitatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ ca vyāvṛttikṛtaviśeṣe satyapi naiva vastu, tathaivānyadapi tatsadṛśamiti jñeyam, ato gauṇamevedam /
T04ksmadhlu:3036: yatkhalu nīlātmakaṃ pītātmakamiti nidarśanaṃ tadapi paramārthe tāvad vastunyasiddhatvādayuktam
T04ksmadhlu:3040: kathanamātreṇa tāvat paramārthe vastuni na kimapi siddhaṃ bhāvati,
T04ksmadhlu:3042: tatra buddhau pratibhāsamāno yo hi pūrvodito dharmī, so 'pi asatā tāvannayena [asatpakṣeṇa] tathoktaḥ, kintu paramārthe vastuni sa naiva yuktarūpaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3044: ekānekasvabhāvarahitaṃ khalu paramārthaṃ vastu naiva kiñcit, tasya kalpanāviṣayatvenāpi bahirbhūtvāditi
T04ksmadhlu:3045: sarve khalu padārthāḥ ekānekasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptā iti tu pūrvameva prasādhitam /
T04ksmadhlu:3046: māyādibhiravyatiriktāḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvā hi bhāvāste yadi 'vastu'
T04ksmadhlu:3047: nāmnā vyavahriyeran, tadā nāsti kaścanāpi doṣaḥ, bhavatkalpitapakṣahānyā tāvattasya dūṣitatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3050: ekānekasvabhāvāni pratibimbādivastūni naiva paramārthato yukāni, jñānajñeyādisvabhāvena paramārthato 'siddhatvāditi pūrvamevoktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3051: [42] evaṃ yathā ekānekasvabhāvalakṣaṇo hetustāvannairātmyaṃ sādhayati tadvadabhāvadharmini dharmivyāvṛttisādhakatvād viruddho 'yaṃ heturiti yaduktaṃ tattu atyantaṃ pramāṇānabhijñatāmātrameva yadā vastusvabhāvo dharmī sādhayitumiṣyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3052: tadā tadvyāvṛttisādhakatvena sa heturviruddha ityucyate, kintu yadā sa
T04ksmadhlu:3053: [dharmī] niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhyate tadā siddhe 'pi vādino mate kathaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3055: niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ hi sādhayitumiṣṭāyāṃ vastusvabhāvo dharmī naiva sambhavati, ananurūpatvāditi pūrvamevoditam /
T04ksmadhlu:3056: ataḥ sādhyasādhanābhyāṃ yathokto dharmī avastubhūta eva sammat ityasmāt kāraṇāt tena hetunā tāvad vyāvṛttireva sādhayate /
T04ksmadhlu:3058: yathāyaṃ heturnairātmyaṃ sādhayati tathaiva abhāvadharmyapīti keṣāñcit kathanamasambaddhameva
T04ksmadhlu:3059: yato hi yena kāraṇena tāvannairātmyasya abhāvasya ca dvayordharmayorviruddhahetubhyāṃ siddhirucyate, tau vyāvṛttyāpi naiva
T04ksmadhlu:3068: dṛśayate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam //
T04ksmadhlu:3069: phalato niḥsvabhāvatāsādhanārthaṃ na ko 'pi heturiti yatkathanam,
T04ksmadhlu:3071: [43-44] yadi vijñānamapi itaradharmāṇāmiva niḥsvabhāvameva syāttadā mithyātvād yogibhiranyadharmāṇāmiva tasyāpi parityāgaḥ kariṣyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3072: yadyevaṃ kariṣyate tadā na ko 'pi yogino bhaviṣyanti, na ca teṣāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3075: anena khalu hetunā sarvāsāṃ vyavasthānāṃ vilopa eva syāditi yatkathanaṃ tadapi naiva yuktam, yato hi prasaṅgastāvadayaṃ yadi satyābhiniveśaparityāgārthamucyate tadā
T04ksmadhlu:3076: saharṣamucyatām, kintu tathābhyupagamya naiva prasaṅgaḥ prayuktaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3078: yadi sarvavidhaprasaṅgaparityāgārthaṃ tāvaducyate, tadā heturayamanaikāntikaḥ sādhyaviparītabādhakapramāṇābhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3079: / yanmithyā tat sarvathā parityājyamityetasya naiva kimapi
T04ksmadhlu:3081: ye hi mithyā svaparārthaṃ naivopayujyante, te yogibhiḥ parityājyā iti kathanaṃ tu yujyate, parantu ye tavat sākṣāt paramparayā vā
T04ksmadhlu:3082: svaparaprayojanaprasādhakāḥ, kṛpālūnāṃ parahitakaraṇopāyabhūtāsteṣāṃ kathaṃ sarvadā parityāgaḥ kartum śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3083: ato ye kṣetrapariśuddhinirmāṇakāyādayaste parārthamatyantamāvaśyakāḥ, te sarve viparītaparihāradvārā parityājyā api yāvatsaṃsāramaparityājyā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3084: te yadyapi māyākāra iva sarvān mithyābhūtān jānanti, tathāpi parahitopāyabhūtān tān na parityajanti
T04ksmadhlu:3087: yathoktam āryadharmasaṅgītau ḥ māyākāro yathā kaścinnirmitaṃ mokṣamudyataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3088: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3091: bhāvo 'pi tāvanna grāhyo na cābhāvo 'pi parityājyaḥ, yato hi śrāvakā api,
T04ksmadhlu:3092: ye vastusaṃjñinaste 'pio ādimaṃ satyadvayaṃ vivarjayanti, tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyamabhāvabhūtamapi parigṛhṇanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3095: tatra mahākaruṇāparādhīnatayā ye pareṣām aśeṣahitasukhopāyaśālinaḥ prajñālokena vidhvastasakalakleśāndhakārāḥ parahitābhilāṣiṇo matimantaste prahīṇeṣvapi sakalaviparyāseṣu pūrvapraṇidhānavaśatayā yāvat sattvakarmakleśāstāvadākāśaparyantaṃ sthātumevābhilaṣante /
T04ksmadhlu:3096: itthaṃ sameṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi hetupratyayasāmagrīpāratantryena māyāvat sambhavantyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:3099: mithyābhūtā hi ye svānurūpahetumantastāvannaiva bhavanti, te vyavahāre 'pyasanta eveti pūrvamevāveditam
T04ksmadhlu:3103: saṃkṣepato bhagavatām apratisṭhitanirvāṇahetustu karunā prajñā ca /
T04ksmadhlu:3104: kṛpayā hi tannirvāṇāvabodhe 'pi te naiva tasya sākṣātkāraṃ kurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3105: prajñayā tāvat sarvasaṃkleśahetoḥ sammohasyānavakāśāt saṃsāradoṣagandhenāpyaliptāḥ santo naiva saṃsāre patanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3109: ata eva ca sā bodhasattvānāṃ mārga ucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3112: "api ca, śāriputra, śūnyatānimittaṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mārgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3113: ye tāvat prajñāpāramitayā virahitāḥ, upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītāste yadi
T04ksmadhlu:3114: bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkurvanti, tadā nūnaṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā eva bhavanti
T04ksmadhlu:3117: acintyasāmarthyavattvād yogino yathā vastūnyavabhāsante tathā karatalāmalakavat saṃvṛtiparamārthākārābhyāṃ sarvākāraṃ pratyakṣatayā avabudhyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3119: sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ niruttaraṃ lokottaramaśesadharmanirābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ tattvāvabodhakaṃ bhavati, [tathāpi] vyavahāre sarvaṃ nirmāṇavat sadeva bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3120: ato yathā sarvākārajñānādau vastuvyavasthā kṛtā, sā na praṇaśyati, paramārthe 'bhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3122: bhagavan, sarve dharmā nirmāṇaniva bhavanti tadā bhagavati nirvāṇe ca kimantaram? bhagavān āha - na kimapīti /
T04ksmadhlu:3123: katham? bhagavataḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirmāṇavad bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3126: nirmaṇasya tāvannodbhavo nāpi parinirvāṇaṃ kimapi bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3127: itthaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sarvadharmeṣu nirmāṇamivādhimuktiṃ vidhāya prajñāpāramitāyāmācaritavyam
T04ksmadhlu:3129: [45] ye hi rūpādayo bhinnadeśakālāvasthāsu spaṣṭaṃ pratyakṣeṇāvabhāsante
T04ksmadhlu:3130: te niścayena svabhāvena yuktā ityataḥ pratijñā tāvat pratyakṣeṇa bādhiteti yat pūrvamuktam, tanna sarvathā samīcīnamiti cenna, yato hi bhinnadeśakālāvasthāsvavabhāsitatvamātreṇa pratyakṣāvabhāso naiva yuktaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3132: vastūnaṃ khalu paramārthasvabhāvatayā sādhayitumiṣyante, kintu naiva svabhāvaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3136: timirādyupahatalocaneṣu vidyamāne 'pi dvicandre na tena ekacandrādibādhā yuktimatī /
T04ksmadhlu:3137: yadyabhrāntapratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvena tthā [bādhā] abhyupeyate tadā tannaiva sidhyati, arvāgdarśināṃ pratyakṣasya tattvārthe
T04ksmadhlu:3139: na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇaṃ na jihṇa pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /
T04ksmadhlu:3140: pramāṇa yadyeta bhaveyurindriyā kasyāryamārgeṇa bhaveta kāryam //
T04ksmadhlu:3141: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jaḍāḥ svabhāvena avyākṛtāśca /
T04ksmadhlu:3142: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva arthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu karyam //
T04ksmadhlu:3147: te rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ tathāgatacakṣuṣā anupalabdheṣu sarvadharmeṣu sattvenābhiniviśante ".......iti vastaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3148: pratijñāyā anumānenābhāsa iti yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate, yato hi nānumānena kimapi vastu svabhāvataḥ sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:3150: [46] dhūmādihetubhiryo hi agnyādīnāṃ loke niścayaḥ, so 'pi tāvadagnirnaiva
T04ksmadhlu:3156: ye tāvadahetukotpādamabhyupagacchanti, teṣāmeva kādācitkatvavirodhaḥ, na tu sahetukotpādamabhyupagacchatām
T04ksmadhlu:3161: pratijñāyate, tadā kathamiti cet? māyāsvapnādivaditi brūmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3163: mahāmate, sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā ityapi bodhisattvairnaiva pratijñā
T04ksmadhlu:3165: tadā kimiti cet? ābhāsanirābhāsalakṣanatvād bodhisattvaiḥ sarve
T04ksmadhlu:3167: vyavahāre tāvad [vastūnam] ābhāsalakṣaṇam, paramārthe tu nirābhāsalakṣaṇamiti sūtreārtho 'bhivyajyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3169: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3171: ataḥ 'sarve dharmā vyavaharamātrāśritāḥ', ityasmin bhagavannirdeśe nāsti
T04ksmadhlu:3175: paramārthatastu bodhyarthamanuṣṭhīyamānāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā, saṃskārāḥ vijñānāni kānyapi na santyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:3176: evameva aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ, ṣaṭ sparśāḥ, ṣaḍ vedanāḥ, ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ dvādaśa
T04ksmadhlu:3177: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni, pāramitā, śūnyatā, smṛtyupasthānāni, samyak prahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ, indriyāṇi, balāni, bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgikamārgāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3184: kalpitatvāt, na tveteṣāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvam' - iti nirdeśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3185: rūpata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ ye tāvad dharmāsteṣāṃ na staḥ saṃyogaviyogāvapi /
T04ksmadhlu:3186: yato hi rūpaṃ adarśnam apratigham alakṣaṇameva asattvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3187: sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ te kevalaṃ tathāgatena lokavyavahārārthaṃ kathitāḥ, na tu paramārthataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3188: lokasaṃvṛtau ye pinaḥ prāptirabhisamayaḥ pañcagatibhedāste 'pi pūrvata eva paramārthato na santi /
T04ksmadhlu:3189: paramārthe tu karmāpi nāsti karmaphalamapi, saṃkleśo nāsti, nāsti vyavadānamapi /
T04ksmadhlu:3191: paramārthatastāvad bhagavān sarvatra saṃkleśavyavadānayorniṣedhaṃ kṛtavān, tathāpi vyavahāre tān aṅgīkṛtavān /
T04ksmadhlu:3193: / anyatra bhagavān spapne sarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchā tadabhāve saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca mithyaiveti kathitavān /
T04ksmadhlu:3194: [52] nāsti caturyasatyāpavādadoṣo 'pi, yato hi mahāyānāndanyatra bhagavān teṣāṃ [āryasatyānāṃ] upadeśaṃ kṛtavān /
T04ksmadhlu:3196: "yaduta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgadho mārgaśceti naiva santyāryāṇāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3197: satyāni, kintu brahmān, yadaniṣpannaṃ duḥkham, tadevāryāṇāṃ satyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3204: tattu śrāvakānadhikṛtya saṃsārodvignamānasānāṃ kṛte pudgalanairātmyapraveśāryaṃ tāvadanityādisvabhāvatvena kevalaṃ nirdiṣṭam, na tu nairātmyadvayanirdeśādhikāreṇeti jñātavyam" /
T04ksmadhlu:3205: [53] yaśca tāvajjanyajanakasvabhāvo janeṣvāgopālaṃ prasiddhastena prasiddhivirodhadoṣo 'pīti yaduktaṃ tadapyasambaddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:3207: yadi prasiddhastadā te naiva santi sādhāraṇajanāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3210: sā pramāṇāntargaveti cet? tadā tadvirodhaparihāreṇa tadbādhāyā api parihāraḥ kṛta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3213: niyatotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogānnaiva tataḥ paramārthato niyatotpattirabhyupagatā bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3216: paramārthata utpattiniṣedhenātra vastūnāṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva paramārthataḥ sādhayitumiṣyate, na tūtpattimātraniṣedhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3217: ato yadyapi hetubhyo niyatatayā pāramārthikī utpattirnaiva bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:3220: [55] yacca bhagavatā - "cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlam" -
T04ksmadhlu:3222: anyatra tu - "na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇam" ityādinā ṣaḍindriyāṇāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣiddhameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3224: lokasaṃvṛtau tu sarva [dharmāḥ] saṃvidyanta evetyevaṃvidhaṃ bhagavān
T04ksmadhlu:3229: bhagavatyāmapyuktam - kiyatā bhagavan, upalambhaḥ, kiyatā ca tāvadanupalambho bhavatīti? bhagavān āha - yāvad dvayatā tāvadupalambhaḥ, yadadvayaṃ tadevānupalambhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3230: apṛcchāt - kiyatā bhagavan dvayatā? bhagavān āha - yāvat sūbhūte, nāma rūpaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇam ityat ārabhya yāvad buddhatvam anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiḥ buddha iti tāvad dvatetyupadideśa punaśca, yāvad dvayasaṃjñā, naiva tāvadānulomikī kṣāntirityapyuktavān /
T04ksmadhlu:3233: ato vyāvahārikacakṣurādīnābhisandhāya draṣṭṛtvato jñātṛtvaparyantamātmaprasiddhestaddṛṣṭiniṣedhāryaṃ pudgalanairātmyapraveśābhiprāyeṇa cakṣurādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3234: ata eva cānābhāsina ākāśetpalasya nīlatvādivadime nīlādirūpāṇāṃ ye sāṃvṛtikā ābhāsāste 'pi na santyatyantābhāvarūpāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3236: ityamunānumānena samyaktayā kṣaṇikatvena sthitasya vastudharmiṇaḥ siddhirninirdaṣṭeti yaduktaṃ tadapyutpādavināśadharmiṇo jñānena nairātmyapraveśārthaṃ śrāvakānadhikṛtya pudgalanairātmyamabhipretya
T04ksmadhlu:3237: coktam, na tu bodhisattvānāmadhikāreṇa gambhīratattvālāpamapekṣya proktamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:3238: yato hi bhagavatā saṃskārāṇāmutpādavināśasvabhāvasya samyaganudarśanaṃ taduddeśaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāmiva nirmitasadṛśamityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3240: āryadharmasaṃgītau hi tathāgatena bhayasthānasya parihārārthaṃ vyavahāre cotpādanirodhau tāvaduktau
T04ksmadhlu:3244: yathā mayā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
T04ksmadhlu:3248: sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā nāsanna sat punaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3250: yacca tāvat saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvam, tadapi naivopapannamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3253: tatrātītāḥ saṃskarāḥ, ye tāvanniruddhāste bhūtakāla ityucyunte /
T04ksmadhlu:3255: ye ca pratyutpanne pṛthagutpannāste vartamānakāla ityubhidhīyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3256: vartamānakālotpannāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni na sthitāni nāpyasthitānīti parijñāyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3260: 'pyanyaḥ, sthitirapyanyā, vyayo 'pyanyo bhavatī, teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt sthitāsthitatvābhāvācca /" ityādikamabhihitam ataśca kṣaṇikatā tāvat kalpanāsvabhāvātmikaiva, tadādimadhyāntānāṃ bhinnasvabhāatvādityupadideśa tathaivācāryeṇāpyuktam -
T04ksmadhlu:3262: trayātmakatvāt kṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇaṃ sthitiḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3263: [57] yacca bhagavatā "dhūmena jñāyate vahniḥ" ityadikamuktam, tadapi sūtrāntareṣu sakalasāmagrīsamavadhānāt samutpadyamānānāmagnidhūmādīnāṃ sāmānyena niṣedhaparakameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3264: ato naiva tat paramārthamadhikṛtyoktamiti nirdiṣṭameva pūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:3266: samavāyād vinirmukto buddhayā bhāvo na gṛhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3270: samavāyāt pṛthaṅ nāsti na cānyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3272: na skandhā dhātavo naiva sarve dharmā alakṣaṇāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3279: ataḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpitasvabhāvatvāt tatsvabhāvasaṃgṛhītāstāvadagnidhūmādayo 'pi kalpitasvabhāvā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3283: [58] abhidharmādau yaḥ khalu hetupratyayādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ, so 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3285: paramārthastu yadā na kasyacanotpādastadāhetukatvaṃ tāvadanupapannameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam
T04ksmadhlu:3286: yatāvat skandhādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ, so 'pi vyavahārasatyāśrita evetyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam
T04ksmadhlu:3287: [59-60] āryadharmasaṃgītau tavaduktam - bodhisattvena tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yo vyāvahārikatvena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ, sa khalu daśādha boditavyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3295: [61] yacca tadā vastveva svīkṛtaṃ syādityuktaṃ tatpūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3296: [62-64] kā nāma saṃvṛtiryadi sarvamevāsaditi yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva
T04ksmadhlu:3299: tadā kathamiti cet? yacca samyaṅ niḥsvabhāvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3300: vastu tasya tannivṛttakāre yā samāropikā bhrāntabuddhiḥ, saiva saṃvṛtiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:3301: athavā yayā tattvamāvriyate [yayā vā tattvabodhaḥ] bādhyate, sā saṃvṛtiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:3303: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3307: tayā sarveṣu sattveṣu pāramarthikavastusvabhāva ivopadarśyate, atastadbuddhayadhikārena sarvaṃ hi mithyāvastu saṃvṛtisanmātrameveti /
T04ksmadhlu:3314: tattvānyatvayostāvat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tattvānyatvavirodha iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3317: ato bhāvamabhāvaṃ vā svabhāvamāśrita yattāvaccodyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nirādhārameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3318: vastunyeva tāvad vidhirvā pratiṣedho vā sambhavī /
T04ksmadhlu:3324: asāmarthādināṃ paramārthasatyāśritatvena sāmarthyādīnāṃ ca saṃvṛtisatyāśritatvena vyavasthīyamānatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3325: māyāpuruṣādivat sarvavastuṣu bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt krmaśaḥ satyadvayabhedo vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3326: māyāpuruṣādau bhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate, tathā sarvavastuṣu mithyākārena jñānena yadāropitaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3328: māyāpuruṣādau abhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate tathaiva sarvavastuṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ samyakpramāṇaiḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3330: ato māyādivyavahāra ivāpekṣāviśeṣena satyadvayaśritā ime sarvavyavahārā aviruddhā evetyavaśyamabhyupetavyam
T04ksmadhlu:3331: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā taimirikādyālambiteṣu keśādiṣu vijñānavādināṃ ca dvayābhāseṣu kimivemāni codyāni na syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3332: itthaṃ yadīme keśādayaḥ paramārthato 'santa eva tadā kathamiva te sadrūpeṇāvabhāsante, kathamiva ca deśakālāvasthānāṃ pṛthaṅ niścayaḥ parigṛhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3333: utpādānutpādādayaḥ sadasatī ca parasparamekasmin naiva yujyate, yato hi tatra yathā keśādiṣu dvayābhāseṣu ca bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthitasvabhāvasya saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyamāśritya saṃvṛtau sattvaṃ paramārthe cāsattvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3334: vyavasthāpyate, yathā ca tatrāpekṣāviśeṣastāvadaviruddha eva, tathaiva sarvavastūnāṃ sādṛśyena nedaṃ codyaṃ yujyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3335: ye ca saṃvṛtāvutpāda ityabhidadhate, teṣāmayamāśayaḥ - yena hetunā yathoktabhrāntanāṃ saṃvṛtasvabhāvānāṃ vastūnāṃ naiva samyagutpādo jāyate
T04ksmadhlu:3342: pratyakṣeṇa va paramparayā vā kṛta bhedā api santi /
T04ksmadhlu:3344: itthaṃ paramārthato 'nutpada iti samyagjñānena asiddhotpāda ityeva vakṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3345: ata ubhe api na sto 'sambaddhābhidhāne yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā bhavadbhirapi
T04ksmadhlu:3347: kathamupanīyate, kathaṃ vā bhavatāṃ satyadvayāśrito vyavahāraḥ pravartate
T04ksmadhlu:3348: / yadi niyataṃ śabdārthamatiricya mithyaiva pare dūṣyante tadā spaṣṭamasambaddhāmevābhidhānaṃ parilakṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3349: aparīkṣyaiva avikalpamātramityādi yaduktaṃ tadapyasambaddameva, yato hi cintanotpannasya prajñātattvasyāviparītatvena niyatacintanagatasamyakpramāṇabalotpannaṃ tathaiva bhāvanābalotpannamapi
T04ksmadhlu:3352: yāni khalu tattvarthaparāṅmukhani mithyākāropagṛhītāni jñānāni, tāni sarvāṇi tadviparītatvād akalpitānītyucyante, tāni naiva nirvikalpāni,
T04ksmadhlu:3356: 'pi na tāvannirvikalpajñānam, na cānumānaprasiddhārthasya parihāraḥ, naiva ca vastutattvasvīkāraḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3364: ataḥ karmaphalādīnāṃ pṛthakśo niyatavyavasthā yā atyantaparokṣā, sā sarvathā sarvajñajñānasyaiva gocarā, na tu sāmānyajñānaviṣayā /
T04ksmadhlu:3365: kecana śāstraracayitāraḥ prasiddhimatītya kalpanādisvabhāvatvenipakalpitaṃ vastu mithyāsaṃvṛtisaditi kathayanti, tattu prasiddhāvapyasaditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3366: yattu pratītyasamutpadānukūlatvena parikalpitaṃ tattu" nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ" ityataḥ saṃvṛtisadevetyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3374: nāpi cātra saṃkleśvyavadānāpavādadoṣo 'pi, tasya pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3377: mithyāsvarūpasyāpi satyatvenāvabhāse sati naiva jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3379: asatyasvabhāvasya mithyātvād bhrānte sati naiva jñānaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3384: [67] saṃvṛtiḥ śabdamātrātmiketyādi yaduktaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣarūpeṇa svamatopakalpitmeva
T04ksmadhlu:3390: ye tāvadabhidhānaṃ vastubhūtam, abhidheyaṃ ca tadatiriktamiti kalpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3391: teṣāmevaṃ kalpayatāṃ mataniṣedhāryamevābhidheyaṃ kalpanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitamityupadarśitaṃ saṃjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitamityādinā /
T04ksmadhlu:3395: kalpanājñāne 'vabhāsyamānamabhidhānamatra nāmaśabdenābhipretaṃ, na tu śrotravijñānavijñeyaḥ śabdaḥ tasyābhidhānatvābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3396: etāvanmātratve sati rūpadīnāṃ sarve vividhābhāsā na setsyanti, na ca skandhādīnāṃ vyavasthāpi setsyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3397: sūtre 'pi paramārthasatyanirdeśasāmarthyena sarveṣāṃ jñānajñeyābhidhānādīnāṃ saṃvṛtisatyatvena nirdiṣṭatvānnaiva te śabdamātratvena nirdiṣṭā iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3399: "yaduta devaputra, paramārthastāvat sarvavyavahārātītaḥ, yato hi nirviśeṣaḥ anutpannaḥ aniruddhaḥ abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādirahitaḥ sa iti /"
T04ksmadhlu:3403: "etadānukūlyena lokavyavahārastāvajjñānajñeyātmakaḥ akṣaraśabdairnirdiṣṭo 'bhidhānātmaka eva saṃvṛtisatyamiti veditavyam, na tu abhidhānābidheyamātrātmakamiti" /
T04ksmadhlu:3405: nāsti, evaṃvidhaḥ paramārthaḥ saṃvṛtisatyanivṛttasvabhāva iti nirdeśo 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3407: tatra paramārthatvena nirdiṣṭānāmārthānamavastubhūtānāṃ subhāṣitādivibhāgo 'pi naiva suśaka
T04ksmadhlu:3411: ataḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitatvena yadi tathatāsvabhāvo naiva vibhāgārhastadā naivāyaṃ kaścanāpi doṣa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3412: ityevaṃ ye tāthāgatāgamāḥ pratyakṣaparokṣatayā paramārtathābhidhāyakā dehavatāṃ ca hitasukhajanakāste subhāṣitānītyucyante, tadviparītāni na subhāṣitānīti teṣāṃ bhedaḥ sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3414: kriyate? asmin bhavatāṃ yaduttaram, asmākamapi tathaiveti gauṇamevaitat /
T04ksmadhlu:3415: yattāvacchabdārthetyādikamuktam, tadapi naiva yujyate, śabdārthayoḥ saṃvṛtimātratvābhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3419: tathaiva paramārthato niḥsvabhāvāni vastūni kathaṃ na vyavasthāpayituṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3420: śakyante? viśeṣataḥ kevalaṃ vastusvabhāva eva śabdārthasāmānyasvarūpo bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tatra kimapi kāraṇaṃ naiva paśyāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3421: anādīti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vastubhūtaṃ tasyāpyasaditi sāmānyavyavahāro dṛśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3422: sukhādīni svasaṃvedyāṃ - nittyādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃvṛtyantargatatvāditi pūrvaṃ kṛta eva nirdeśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3423: vastūni kevalamanidarśanasvabhāvāni eva bhaviṣyantīti yaduktaṃ tatrāpi nāsti kācana yuktiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3425: sūtre 'pyabhidhānābhidheyādayaḥ saṃvṛtikāḥ, na tu satsvabhāvā nirdiṣṭā iti pūrvamuktameva
T04ksmadhlu:3427: ye kecana paramārthaṃ yadyapi prasajyamātramityabhidadhate, [kintu] sa tathā prasajyamātro na bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3429: yatāvat paramārthe hyāropitasvabhāvaḥ sa saṃvṛtireva sa [paramārthastu]
T04ksmadhlu:3431: sūtre 'pyuktam - "mañjuśrīḥ, kiṃ tāvat paramārthasatyam? mañjuśrī - rāhadevaputra, yadi paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavākcittaniṣedhamātrasvabhāvaḥ syāttadā sa paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ na gacchet, tadā sa saṃvṛtireva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3434: teṣu vastuvāsanāyā api pūrvaṃ kṛtaniṣedhāt kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyantargatābyeva tānyoto 'nyataḥ pūrtirnaivāvaśyakī
T04ksmadhlu:3435: yadi pramāṇairabhāvo naiva māyādibhirbhinnastathāpi paramārthataḥ svataḥ saditi nāma kriyate tadā saharṣaṃ kriyatāṃ svairamutsavo 'pyanubhūyatām, kintu svamatānakūlyena kṛtāṃ vyavasthāṃ vastūni naivānuvidadhate /
T04ksmadhlu:3436: pratītyasamutpannatā svasaṃvedyatā ca naiva vastūno heturbhavati, māyākeśoṇḍukādīnāṃ bhrāntatvāt kutrāpi sambandhasyāsiddhatvācca /
T04ksmadhlu:3437: yadyapratītyasamutpannatve vastūni naiva dṛśyate tadā tadadarśanamanyatrāpi tathaiva syāditi kathanasambaddhameva, satyapi vyāpake vṛkṣe śiṃśāpāsattvasyānanirvāryatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3441: vastūnāṃ yadi samyaktvaṃ tadā sthitatvāsthitatvatoḥ parasparavirodho 'pyanupapanna eveti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3442: ataścalasvabhāvatvād vastūni tāvanniḥsvabhāvatvena pradarśyante, ata eva ca tāni saṃvṛtisvabhāvānyucyante
T04ksmadhlu:3444: tāni sarvāṇi calasvabhāvāni vastūni māyādivat prakṛtyā niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇarahitāni,
T04ksmadhlu:3452: samyaktayā asatye 'pi tasmin,satya iva prasiddhatvāt taccintanādhikareṇa satyeti nāmnā vyavahriyate
T04ksmadhlu:3454: tadāpi lokaprassiddhayaiva satyānītyabhidhīyante, na tu samyagjñānādhikāreṇa, śabdamātrasya apekṣāviśeṣavaśena prayuktatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3458: tayā vyavasthitaṃ jagat tadadhikāreṇa yataḥ satyamityucyate, ataḥ saṃvṛtiravaśyaṃ vastutayā svīkartavyeti yaduktaṃ tasyāpyayuktatvāt pratijñā naiva hāpayituṃ śakyā /
T04ksmadhlu:3459: [71] saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vā? yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ? yadyapramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ tayā nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam? -
T04ksmadhlu:3461: yato hi yathā anumānajñānasya mithyākāragrahaṇapravṛtatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvatve 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3469: siddhasādhanameva, yato hyeteṣāṃ svānurūpahetavastāvadanādisaṃvṛtirūpā iti svīkriyanta eva, nemānyahetukatvena pratijñāyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3470: yadi tad bījaṃ paramārthasiddhamekaṃ ceti tadā kutrāpi tadanvayābhāvādanaikāntikameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3471: vṛkṣādyaśeṣasaṃvṛtioināṃ yadyuttaropādānahetvānukūlyaṃ na parikṣiṣyante tadā ramaṇīyatāmātrameva dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3472: nāpi viruddho hetuḥ, yakṣānurūpabaleḥ sadbhāvāt sarvāstāḥ saṃvṛtayo 'satsvabhāvāḥ prasādhitā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3475: yadyasatsvabhāvāstadā vījānyapi tadanurūpāvastubhūtanyeva, na te vastubhūtāni, tadviruddhatvād asiddhatvāt pramāṇabādhitatvācceti tā gauṇā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3476: [73] vastusvabhāvastāvat svīkriyata iti yaduktaṃ tattu yena kāraṇena vastusvabhāvaḥ svīkriyate tena satyadvayabhedānudhānaṃ kutrāpi naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3478: teṣu ye utpādādayaḥ samāropyante te saṃvṛtisatyatvena vyāvasthāpyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3479: pramāṇaiḥ samyaṅ nirupya anāropitā ye tāvadanutpādādayaste paramārthasatyatayā vyāhriyante
T04ksmadhlu:3480: ataḥ paramārthato 'satyapi vastusvabhāve satyadvayaṃ vyāvasthāpyata eveti gauṇā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3485: aviparītasya jñānasya artha iti viṣaya iti kṛtvā sā paramārtha ityucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3486: yatkhalu viṣayi lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tadanyaśbdārthaprayogairapi vyavahriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3487: śravaṇamananabhāvanopajātāyāḥ prajñāyā anukūlatvād vyavahāreṇaiva sā evamabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3488: tatra yena kāraṇena paramārthatattvalakṣaṇabhāvanayā yogibhiraśeṣasaṃkleśān parihatya uttarottaraprajñādiviśeguṇāṃścadhigamya mahārthatvaṃ prasādhyate, tena 'parama' śbdaprayogaḥ sarvathā yujyata eva
T04ksmadhlu:3489: / tadapi lokottaraṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sarvakalpanāvigatatvāt sarvadharmanirābhāsatvācca svasaṃvedyamanupalambhātmakaṃ ca, na tūpalambhasvarūpam /
T04ksmadhlu:3492: anena vastuviṣayataḥ samyagatītatvena nirdeśādālambanadarśanasya niṣedha eva kṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3495: api ca, yadyasti tāvadekaḥ tāvadekaḥ kaścana gauṇaḥ paramārthastadā
T04ksmadhlu:3496: nirvāṇaṃ tāvat kīdṛśaḥ paramārthaḥ? tatra kasyāpi vastunaḥ samyaktayā arthasvabhāvasambhavābhāvāt tadapi kathamebhiścodyairanavamardanīyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3498: paramārthe vastūni tāvanna santīti yaduktaṃ tadapi paramārthamadhikṛtya jñānātmakatvaṃ samyagaviparītatvenāsadevetyuktam
T04ksmadhlu:3499: ekena khalu prakāreṇa paramārthastāvadasanniti yaduktaṃ tattattvato vicāreṇāsadevetyarthaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3500: [75] saṃvṛtiparamārthayorekatvamiti yaduktaṃ tatra bhagavān paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskāralakṣaṇena saha tattvato nānyaṃ nānanyamiti svayamevoktavān /
T04ksmadhlu:3502: "yaduta yadi paramārthalakṣaṇam saṃskārebhyo nānyaṃ [abhinna] syāttadā sarve bālapṛthagjanāḥ satyadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3504: yathā ca saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśalakṣaṇāstathaiva paramārtho 'pi saṃkleśalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3505: tathā ca yathā paramārthaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣvabhinnastathā saṃskāralakṣaṇanyapi[abhinnāni] syuḥ, kintu saṃskāralakṣaṇāni bhinnāni, phalataḥ paramārtho naivānanyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3506: bhūtārthaprāpteranantaraṃ yogibhiḥ paramārthagaveṣaṇaṃ naiva yujyata iti paramārthastāvat saṃskārebhyo nāstyanyo nānyo 'pīti /
T04ksmadhlu:3509: nimittabandhanairamuktatvānna ca te doṣṭhulyabandhanādapi muktāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3511: api ca, paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ yadi saṃskāralakṣaṇebhyo bhinnaṃ syāttadā na syāt paramārthaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam na ca paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā vā syāt, nāpi saṃkleśavyavadānayoḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ sidhyet /
T04ksmadhlu:3515: paramārthalakṣaṇe tu niḥsvabhāvatvena tattvānyatvābhyaṃ vastu nābhidhātuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3516: vastusattve hi tattvānyatvabodhasya sambhavānna tu niḥsvabhāve vastuni tatsambhavaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3524: jñānātmakastu paramārtho māyādibhirabhinnatvāt samyaksaṃvṛtisvabhāvaśca tattvāvabodhānukūlatvāt paramārthasvabhāvaśca /
T04ksmadhlu:3528: tadapi naiva yujyate, anenaiva tāvad darśanena sambhāraparipūrṇatāyā yujyamānatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3529: itthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭisamutthitā eva dānādayaḥ parisuddahetusamutthitatvādiṣṭaphalaṃ viśeṣaphalaṃ cābhinirharanti, na tu viparītasamutthitāḥ, mithyādṛṣṭisamutthitaśīlāṅgādivat /
T04ksmadhlu:3530: paramārthato dānādivastūnāmabhāvāt tadupalambho viparīta eva, marīcyādiṣu jalopalambhavat
T04ksmadhlu:3535: ato 'nupalambhasamāśritesu dānādiṣu samyadṛṣṭisamutthitatayā vidvajjaneṣu śraddhaivotpadyate, na tvanyeṣu /
T04ksmadhlu:3536: yena kāraṇena dānādiṣvapravṛteḥ puṇyābhāvastāni dātavyādīni naivātyantamasadbhūtāni, saṃvṛtau teṣāṃ sadbhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3537: naiva ca sarvadānupalambha eva, asamāhitāvasthāyāṃ māyādivat teṣāmupalambho 'pi /
T04ksmadhlu:3539: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhagavan, upākuśalā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parisampadayanti? bhagavānāha - subhūte, bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā parityajanti tadā māyābuddhireva ṭeṣāṃ dāne
T04ksmadhlu:3541: ata eva bhagavan ye bodhisattvā bhavanti, māyādivadadhimuktyā arthijanebhyaḥ putrādīnāṃ parityāgo rocate /
T04ksmadhlu:3545: kintu pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāṃ tāvat te pravartanta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3549: ata eva prajñāpāramitādiṣvapi śūnyatādhimuktasya anupalambhāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni paripūrṇāni cetyuktāni /
T04ksmadhlu:3551: "tatkiṃ manyate subhūte, sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya
T04ksmadhlu:3553: evameva subhūte, yo bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti, tasya subhūte, puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum /"
T04ksmadhlu:3557: upādātā ca niḥsvabhāvatvena jñeya, deyamapi niḥsvabhāvamiti jñeyam, pariṇāmanāpi niḥsvabhāveti jñeyā, yasya khalu pariṇāmanā kriyate, tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvena jñeyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3558: yadarthaṃ hi pariṇāmanā vidhīyate tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvenaiva jñeyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3561: tathaiva upādātā deyaṃ dānaphalaṃ pariṇāmanā bodhiśceti tattasvabhāvena śūnyā iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3562: evaṃ hi śūnyatādhimuktasyāprameyaiścintanairdānapāramitā pariśuddhā bhavati, tad dānaṃ ca dānapāramiteti saṃjñāṃ pratilabhate, na tu kadāpi malinā
T04ksmadhlu:3564: ityevamanupalambhasamāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni viśuddhāni ca bhānti /
T04ksmadhlu:3567: [77] sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti yaducyate, tasya tāvatko 'rthaḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:3568: yadyātmanāsattvānniḥsvabhāvāstadā siddhasādhanameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi yadyātmanā 'sattvānni' svabhāvatvena vyavastāpyate tadā na ca viruddhatvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3571: parāpekṣayā tatsattvam tatsattvam āditaścāsattvaṃ naivopapadyate, ekasmin sadasattvayoḥ krameṇāpi virodhāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3572: phalatastāvadimāni vastūni paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parāpekṣitānītyato niḥsvabhāvanyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:3573: na hi svabhāvasya kṛtakatvaṃ nāma yujyata iti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3574: na caisāṃ paramārthataḥ parāpekṣayāpi sattvamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam /
T04ksmadhlu:3578: evameva yadi vastvādīni prakṛtitaḥ sasvabhāvāni tadā svātmanāsattvaṃ svabhāvena ca sattvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3580: ekasmin vatūni sattvāsattvasthitāsthiotatvādayaḥ parasparaviruddhadharmā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3584: parikalpitātmanā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ tadā naiva siddhasādhanamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam, pramānabādhitatvāt parikalpitasvabhāvasyeti /
T04ksmadhlu:3588: yaccāryāṇāṃ paramajñānagocaraṃ vastūnāmaviparītaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi naiva saditi yuktyagamābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ pratipaditameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3591: [78] sarvāṇi tāvad vastūnyādita ev notpannānityato 'nupannānīti yaduktaṃ tatra naiva siddhasādhanādayo doṣāḥ pravartante, yato hi sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato 'nādikāladeva praśāntatvādanutpannā ityabhyupagamyante, na tu saṃsārasyānādimātratayā, na cāpi pūrvaniruddhasya anutpattikatayā api
T04ksmadhlu:3595: parikalpitātmanā svātmanā vanutpāde 'pi naiva siddhasādhanamiti nirdiśyate
T04ksmadhlu:3599: sarve tāvad dharmā dharmadhātulakṣaṇāyāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ samarasatvena tathātākāratayā naiva
T04ksmadhlu:3601: lokaprasiddhamapi svabhāvamālocya viśeṣotpattirnāstityapi naivocyate, ato nāsti darśanādivirodho 'pi /
T04ksmadhlu:3602: yadyapyutpattikriyālakṣaṇarahitatvād īśvarādito 'nutpannātvād vānutpattiḥ svīkriyante, tathāpi naiva tanmātratayaiveti, api tu yathā pūrvamuktaṃ tathātvenaivāsvīkriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3603: ye tāvadanekasūtravirodha iti kathayanti, tebhyaḥ pūrvameva dattamutaram /
T04ksmadhlu:3605: śraddhāviśeṣeṇa ca gotraviśeṣānumānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tenāpi yanatrayaṃ sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3607: punaścanena yānatrayasādhanānumitasya gotratrayasyāpi niścitāvabodho naiva kartuṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3609: sūtre 'pi - "evaṃ hi sati aparimitasya yānabhedasya yanabhedasyaprasaṅgaḥ syāt" - ityukyam
T04ksmadhlu:3610: yena khalu kāraṇena sattveṣu gotrabhedānumānasya niyatā siddhiḥ niyataśca śraddhabhedābodhaḥ pratīyate, te 'pyakalyāṇamitrasaṃsargeṇa akāraṇameva paraduḥkhamabhinandanto dṛśyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3612: paraduḥkhamabhinandanārthāmālambante, te 'pi kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3613: ye kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante
T04ksmadhlu:3614: / ye khalvalpamātrake svasukhe hite cāsajyamānāḥ pareṣu daurmanasyaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3616: ye tāvat bhavasukhabhilāṣeṇa puṇyāni sampādayanti, te 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3620: ato gotrabhedasyāpyaniyatatayā kathaṃ tāvad yānatrayaniścayaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3621: sattvanāṃ vivuidhāśayavaśenāpi gotrabhedo niścetuṃ na śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3622: yāni tāvat pañcābhisamayagotrāṇi tānyapi ekaniścayābhiprāyeṇaiva nirdiṣṭāni, na tvātyantikatāyā
T04ksmadhlu:3625: 'sarvakuśalamūlotsargecchantiko hi mahāmate, punarapi tathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt kadācit karhicit kuśalamūlān vyutthāpayati /
T04ksmadhlu:3626: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate, tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3629: naivādhārabhūtaḥ, yato hi tathāgatā lokasya vividhāśayavaśena vividhāni
T04ksmadhlu:3630: yānāni nirdiśanto dharmopadeśe pravartante, na tu yanatrayamātratayā /
T04ksmadhlu:3632: "śrīvairocanakhye lokadhātau tathāatasamantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājena abhisambodhiradhigatā, tadanantadameva tena aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3643: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ bodhisattvamārge pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ" iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3644: bhagavatāpi bālajanapraveśārthaṃ yānabhedo vyavasthāpitaḥ, na tu nītārthatayā nidiṣṭaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3648: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
T04ksmadhlu:3649: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3652: ata eva āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtrādau ekayānanirdeśo naiva neyārtha iti pratipāditam tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:3653: "evaṃ rūpeṣu śāriputra, kalpasaṃkṣobhakaṣāyeṣu bahusattveṣu lubdheṣvalpakuśalamūleṣu tadā śāriputar, tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ upāyajauśalyena tadaivaikaṃ buddhayanaṃ triyānanirdeśena nirdiśanti" /
T04ksmadhlu:3656: na hi śāriputra, tathāgatānāṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃvidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3659: punaśca ye bhunti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
T04ksmadhlu:3661: upāyametaṃ kurute svayambhū bauddhasya jñānasya prabodhanārtham /
T04ksmadhlu:3662: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha //
T04ksmadhlu:3663: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
T04ksmadhlu:3664: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathañci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaścayam //
T04ksmadhlu:3665: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3666: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3667: pratoṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayambhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
T04ksmadhlu:3668: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhāpeti //
T04ksmadhlu:3669: mārtsaryadoṣo hi bhaveta mahyaṃ spṛśitva bodhiṃ virajāṃ viśiṣṭām /
T04ksmadhlu:3670: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattva na mametu sādhu //
T04ksmadhlu:3671: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtīyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
T04ksmadhlu:3673: tatra prajvalitagṛhāntaḥsthitān bālajanān bahirniṣkāsayitumupāyabhūtasya vāhanaviśeṣasya dṛṣṭāntadvārā, tadvadeva ratnadvīpasthitaṃ nāyakapuruṣaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3675: bhagavān upāyabhūtāni yāni trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭavān, sa tāvanneyārtha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3678: "mañjuśrīḥ, tasmin buddhakṣetre yānenaikena niryāstīti tad yānaṃ tāvat sāravat syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3681: cet? tathāgatā hi nānātvasaṃjñāvirāhitā iti hetoḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3682: yadi mañjuśrīḥ, tathāgatāḥ kasmaicinmayānaṃ nirdiśeyuḥ, kasmaicit
T04ksmadhlu:3683: pratyekabuddhayānam, kasmaicicca śrāvakayānaṃ nirdiśeyustadā tathāgatasya tāvaccittam apariśuddhamabhiniveśajuṣṭaṃ ca syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3684: prādeśikī ca tasya mahākaruṇā syānnānātvasaṃjñā ca /
T04ksmadhlu:3687: mañjuśīḥ, yebhyaśca sattvebhyo 'haṃ dharmamupadiśāmi te sarve bodhiniyatā mahāyānaparāyaṇāḥ sarvajñatābhinirhatāḥ pakṣaikaniṣṭhāśca bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3690: mañjuśrīḥ, yā hi yānavyavasthābhidhīyate, tayā sarvajñena bhūmervyavasthā
T04ksmadhlu:3691: kṛtā, pudgalānāṃ vyavasthā kṛtā, alpasattvasamūhasya aprameyasattvasamūhasya ca vyavasthā kṛtā /
T04ksmadhlu:3694: prasthānanirdeśo 'pi tāvat saṃvṛtireva, na tu paramārthaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3697: "yacca parinirvāṇaṃ yāni ca trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭāni tatsarvaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3698: tathāgatānāmupāyamātram, ekayānāvabodhena anuttarasamyaksaṃbodheradhigamāt /" ata eva ekayānanirdeśastāvadābhiprāyika iti vacanasya dharmadhātulakṣaṇe sarvayānānāṃ samatvādekayānamiti kathanaṃ tāvannāstyāryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādyanukūlamiti niyataṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3700: āryadaśadharmādau yānatrayanirdeśastu upāyasvarūpatvād vineyajanebhyaḥ sa ekayānanirdeśābhiprāyeṇaiva vihita ityeva niśceyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3701: ato yānatrayanirdeśastāvad buddhanāmupāyamātram, na tu vāstavika ityato vineyajanā naiva teṣu pravartante /
T04ksmadhlu:3702: mahāyānasūtrākaṅkāre hi - ekasya yānasya ca yā hi deśanā tadānukūlyena prayojanena sā /
T04ksmadhlu:3703: iti yaduktaṃ tacchrāvakāṇāṃ yadyanuśayasamucchedo jāyeta tadā jāterapi sarvathopacchedād anekajanmaparamparāsamudāgataṃ buddhātvaṃ kathaṃ nāma sādhyaṃ syāditi kathanaṃ tu teṣāṃ jāteḥ sarvathopacchedasyāsiddhatvānnaiva yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3705: "arhato 'pi vināśasadbhāvāttatsaṃtrāsena tāvadarhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā api bhagavataḥ śaraṇaṃ pratipadyante, sopadhiśeṣadharmitvād bhagavan śrāvakārhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānām, janmakṣayābhāvācca bhagavan, teṣām /
T04ksmadhlu:3707: bhavantyeva te sopadhipeṣāḥ, naiva janmatā, apitu karmaṇāṃ pāripūrerabhāvād bahukaraṇīyāvaśeṣācca
T04ksmadhlu:3708: yadi naiva te teṣāṃ parihāraṃ kurvīran tadā santyaneke nirvāṇadhātorapasārakāsteṣu
T04ksmadhlu:3710: yaśca jātikṣaya ityādinā kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ samudbhavastasya neyārthatvaṃ tu taminneva sūtre nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3712: "bhagavan, arhantāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vimuktiṃ yāvad yat pratyekṣaṇājñānaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3713: yāścāśvāsādhāyikāścatastro 'nusmṛtayastat sarvamābhiprāyikam, yānānāṃ neyārthatvena vibhāgaṃ kṛtvā vyākaraṇāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3715: dvidhā bhavati cyutiḥsamucchedikā ca acityapariṇāminī ceti /
T04ksmadhlu:3718: bhagavan, arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptabodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayakāyasya cyutistu bodhimaṇḍaparyantam acintyapariṇāminyeva bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3719: bhagavan, anayordayoścyutyoḥ samucchedacyuteradhikāre tāvadarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jātikṣayo
T04ksmadhlu:3724: evameva bhagavan, avidyāvāsabhūmipratyayā anāstravakarmahetukā arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ sambhavanti.....iti" vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3725: āryalaṅkāvatārasūtre cāpi nirdiṣṭaṃ yad dhātutrayātikrānta api te
T04ksmadhlu:3727: atastathāgatādhiṣṭhānena jātivaśitāṃ prāpya sambhāradvayaṃ ca paripūrya te buddhatvamavāpnuvantīti
T04ksmadhlu:3730: punarapi lokottarānāstravadhātuparyāpannān sambhārān paripūrya acintyadharmakāyavaśavartītāṃ pratilapsyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3732: tathā hi śravako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate //
T04ksmadhlu:3735: niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti na ca bhūyo nirvartate /
T04ksmadhlu:3738: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam //
T04ksmadhlu:3739: atra khalu kāṣṭhodadhyupamayā bhavasāgare pravahamānatvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3740: taraṅgopamayā tāvad dharmalakṣaṇaṃ prati abhiniveśavaśāt parinirvāṇaṃ na prāpyata iti saṅketitam
T04ksmadhlu:3741: 'vāsanākleśasambaddhāḥ' ityādinā tu avidyāvāsanābhūmibandhanenāvimuktāḥ, kleśaparyatthānaiśca visaṃyuktā iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3746: yaccāpyāryalaṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu nirmitaśrāvakānadhikṛtya śrāvakavyākaranaṃ kṛtaṃ taddhīnādhimuktasattvānāṃ bhayaparihārārthaṃ yānatrayanirdeśopāyapradarśanārthaṃ ceti jñātavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3751: ataste ekayānoddeśyaṃ naiva paripālayanti, na ca tasminnadhimucyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3753: 'nayā yuktyā te sattvā buddhatvaṃ pratyabhimukhīkriyanta iti /"
T04ksmadhlu:3754: āstravāṇāṃ kṣayādarhanto yadi na pratisandadhate, ato
T04ksmadhlu:3755: 'nekajanmaparamaparāsādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ na pratilabhanta iti tadā bodhipariṇāmitānāmapyarhatāṃ na pratisandhirna ca teṣu buddhātvādhigama
T04ksmadhlu:3757: yadi praṇidhānabalena tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena ca teṣāṃ pratisandhirabhyupagamyate, tadā kathaṃ nāpareṣvapi tathā?
T04ksmadhlu:3760: anumodayiṣyāmi, nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalamūlanāṃ vighnaṃ kariṣyāmi /
T04ksmadhlu:3762: yadi te sarveṇa sarvamanuttarasamyaksaṃbodheye abhavyā iti tadā kathaṃ nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ vighnaṃ na kariṣyāmītyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3764: avasthāviśeṣābhiprāyeṇaiva śāntasyaikāyanasya kathanaṃ niyatam, na tu sarvadaiva niyatābhiprāyeṇeti jñeyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3766: "bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vārhattvaṃ pratijānīyādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ parigṛhyocchinno 'smi buddhāyānāditi vadedetāvanme samucchrayasya paścimakaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadedābhimānikaṃ taṃ śāriputra,
T04ksmadhlu:3768: arhantastāvat kleśakṣayahetoḥ sarvathā naiva pratisandadhate, tathātvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3769: ye khalu satyadarśinaḥ śrāvakāḥ, ye ca kāmadhāturāgarahitā anāgāminaste buddhagotrakā iti
T04ksmadhlu:3770: dvividhā api te 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ acintyapariṇāminyā jātyā yuktatvātteṣāmiti yat kathanaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3772: / teṣu kevalamarhata eva pratisamdhirupadiṣṭā, na tvanāgāmināmiti /
T04ksmadhlu:3775: "arhattvaṃ samadhigamya yadi sa samyaksaṃbodhimabhilaṣate tadā kathaṃ nāma ajātiṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti, parijanatā khalu bhagavatā tasya jātervyākṛtatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3776: bhagavānāha - maitreya, nāhaṃ karmakleśavaśājjātiṃ prajñapayāmi, apitu acityaparinirvāṇe pariṇāmanayā tasya jātiṃ prajñapayāmiti" /
T04ksmadhlu:3778: "bhagavan, śrāvakāḥ kṣīṇāstravāḥ, parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanagotrakāstathāpi kathaṃ te 'nuttarasamyaksambodhimabhisamboddhuṃ śakṣyante? bhagavānaha -
T04ksmadhlu:3781: kṣatriyakule 'bhiṣikaḥ kaścana rājakumāro yadi sarvāsāṃ śilpavidyānāmadhyayanaṃ karoti /
T04ksmadhlu:3782: sa nāsti tīkṣṇendriyo 'pi tu mandendriyaḥ san paścādadhyeyasya pāṭhayasya prathamam, pūrvamadhyeyasya pāṭhayasya paścādadhyayanaṃ karoti, tadā kiṃ vicārayasi kulaputra, kimetāvatā sa nāsti rājakumāra iti kathayiṣyate? avocat - naiva bhagavan, naiva sugata,
T04ksmadhlu:3784: bhagavānāhakulaputra, tathaiva bodhisattvagotrakā api ye mandendriyāste pūrvaṃ bhāvanāmārgeṇa kleśakṣayaṃ kṛtvā paścādanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau abhisambuddhā bhaviṣyantīti /"
T04ksmadhlu:3786: yacca "sārvagatikā buddhā bhaviṣyanti" ityuktam, tadarthastāvat sarveṣāṃ buddhatvasāmīpyāpekṣābhiprāyeṇeti - yaduktaṃ tadapi svecchāmātropakalpitatvādayuktameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3787: sārvagatikānāṃ bhavyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathoktamityatra ko virodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3788: tathaiva cāryaratnameghādisūtreṣvapi bhagavataḥ śākyamunernāmaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikabījāropaṇād abhedena sarve sattvā avaivartikatve vyākriyante, na tu sāmīpyāpekṣayā /
T04ksmadhlu:3789: ato yena śrāvaṇaṃ yena vā śravaṇaṃ yaśca śrotā teṣavapi avaivartikabījāni vidyanta
T04ksmadhlu:3790: eva, yato hi bhavatāṃ mate 'pi malānāmāgantukatvāccittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaramabhyupagamyate
T04ksmadhlu:3793: sarve sattvāstathāgatagarbhā iti yaduktaṃ tena sarve
T04ksmadhlu:3794: 'pyanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhipadaprāptiyogyā evopadarśitāḥ, yato hi tathāgataśbdo dharmadhātuḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyalakṣaṇaḥ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraścetyeteṣvartheṣvabhyupagamyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3797: api ca, 'yānam' iti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirvāṇagaraprāpako jñānātmako mārga
T04ksmadhlu:3808: ato yattāvat pudgaladharmanairātmyatattvasākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tadeva nirvāṇaprāpakaḥ samyaṅ mārgo nānyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3810: eta eva bhagavatā nānyena tāvanmārgeṇa mokṣa iti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3819: "yad dvayaṃ tad vastu, advayaṃ tu avastu /
T04ksmadhlu:3820: avocat - bhagavan, kiṃ tāvad dvayam? bhagavānāha - sūbhūte, rūpasaṃjñaiva dvayam, tathaiva skandhadhātusparśavedanādhātuṣaṭkapratītyasamutpādadhyānārūpyaduḥkhanairātmyasukhasattvādīnāṃ saṃjñā" iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3826: ityanena prakrāreṇa dvayasaṃjñānukūlā kṣāntirapi tāvadasattvena jñānavyeti prakaṭitam /
T04ksmadhlu:3829: ata eva sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvabhāvanayaiva tāvat kleśāḥ parihartuṃ śakyante, nānyena kenacinmārgeṇeti kṛto nirdeśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3831: "kathaṃ mañjuśrīḥ, kleśā vinayaṃ gacchanti, kathaṃ kleśāḥ parijñātā
T04ksmadhlu:3842: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ, tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3843: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavanti
T04ksmadhlu:3845: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃṃ vinītā draṣṭavyā /
T04ksmadhlu:3847: yadā devaputra, kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato
T04ksmadhlu:3850: tatra yathāpi nāma devaputra, ya āśīviṣasya gotraṃ prajānāti , sa tasyāśīviṣayasya viṣaṃ śamayati /
T04ksmadhlu:3852: yaḥ kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti, tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3853: devaputra āhakataman mañjuśrīḥ, kleśānāṃ gotram? āha - yāvadeṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā, idaṃ kleśānāṃ gotram"
T04ksmadhlu:3856: atastadarthino ye kalyāṇamicchanti, taiḥ kumārgavicārān dūrata eva parityajya mahātmabhiryo hi yuktyāgamapradīpaḥ prakāśīkṛtaḥ sadbhiśca puruṣaiḥ [yaḥ] muhurmuhurāveditaḥ sa sādaraṃ nirantaraṃ ca sadā sevanīyaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3857: / ataśca ekameva yānam, sarve ca dharmāḥ paramārthato niḥ svābhāvā iti sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3859: bhāratīyopādhyāśīlendrabodhinā bhoṭadeśīyānuvādakena dpala brcegas mahābhāgena cānūditam /
